1a1(khri brgyad): @##/ /khri brgyad ka pa bzhugs so/ /
1b1(khri brgyad): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya aSh+Ta da sha sa
1b2(khri brgyad): ha sri kA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
1b3(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol
1b4(khri brgyad): t u phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa zhes bya ba theg pa
2a1(khri brgyad): chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
2a2(khri brgyad): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
2a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi
2a4(khri brgyad): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra
2a5(khri brgyad): b com pa zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa dbang dang ldan par gyur pa sems shin tu
2b1(khri brgyad): rnam par grol ba shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/
2b2(khri brgyad): khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas
2b3(khri brgyad): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig
2b4(khri brgyad): ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /grags 'dzin ma dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs
2b5(khri brgyad): pa dge slong ma lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rab tu mang po thams cad kyang chos mthong ba sha stag
2b6(khri brgyad): dang | byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa/ thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ stong pa nyid
3a1(khri brgyad): la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba/ ma brtags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos
3a2(khri brgyad): thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa thob pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa ma
3a3(khri brgyad): nyams pa/ gzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa'i sems
3a4(khri brgyad): med pa/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mi 'jigs pa
3a5(khri brgyad): thob pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ chos rab tu rnam par
3a6(khri brgyad): 'byed cing rnam par dbye ba ston pa la mkhas pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin
3b1(khri brgyad): 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ gsong por smra ba/ bzhin khro gnyer med pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis brjod pa la mkhas pa/ sems zhum pa med pa/ spobs pa mi
3b2(khri brgyad): chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas pas nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma
3b3(khri brgyad): dang | smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems
3b4(khri brgyad): kyi spyod pa dang / mos pa dang / phra ba mkhyen pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems thogs pa med pa bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du
3b5(khri brgyad): 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa thams cad rnam par bkod pa'i smon lam gyi 'jug pas yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na
3b6(khri brgyad): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/ lta ba
3b7(khri brgyad): dang / bag la nyal dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba 'bum mngon par bsgrub
4a1(khri brgyad): pa la mkhas pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / rin
4a2(khri brgyad): chen snying po dang / rin po ches byin dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / chu lha'i lha dang / phug sbas dang / dbang pos byin dang / blo gros dam pa dang / blo gros khyad par can
4a3(khri brgyad): dang | blo gros 'phel dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / mthong ba don yod dang / blo gros sgrib med dang / shin tu yang dag zhugs dang / rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par
4a4(khri brgyad): gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / rtag tu brtson dang / rtag tu sbyor dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / blo gros dpe med dang / spyan
4a5(khri brgyad): ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'jom pa dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / lag na phyag
4a6(khri brgyad): rgya rin po che dang / rtag tu phyag brkyang dang / snying rje cher sems dang / bkod pa chen po dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / lhun po'i rtse mo dang / byang chub sems dpa'
4a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa de dag dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig go /de nas de'i tshe
4b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng+ge'i khri bshams nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrang nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste bzhugs so/ /der bzhugs nas ting nge
4b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud pa dang 'dus pa dang 'ub cing yang dag par gzhol ba ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
4b3(khri brgyad): 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ lha'i spyan gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs so/ /rnam par gzigs
4b4(khri brgyad): nas sku thams cad kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs
4b5(khri brgyad): kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /de bzhin du zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang / byin pa gnyis dang / pus mo gnyis dang / brla
4b6(khri brgyad): gnyis dang / sta zur gnyis dang / lte ba khung dang / rtsib logs gnyis dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thugs ka'i dpal be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
4b7(khri brgyad): drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /de bzhin du phyag gnyis dang / sku phrag pa gnyis dang / mgur
5a1(khri brgyad): dang / tshems mche ba bzhi dang / tshems bzhi bcu dang / spyan gnyis dang / snyan gnyis dang / shangs kyi bu ga gnyis dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod
5a2(khri brgyad): spu dang / steng gi gtsug tor dang / zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu po de dag
5a3(khri brgyad): thams cad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams
5a4(khri brgyad): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po des khyab par snang bar byas so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho
5a5(khri brgyad): nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po des
5a6(khri brgyad): khyab par snang bar byas so/ /sems can gang dag gis 'od de mthong ba dang / gang dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
5a7(khri brgyad): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer bkye ste/ spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig
5b1(khri brgyad): 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung nas/ 'od zer de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ de dag gis shar phyogs su 'jig
5b2(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen pos khyab par snang bar byas so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang /
5b3(khri brgyad): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des khyab par snang bar byas
5b4(khri brgyad): so| |sems can gang dag gis 'od de mthong ba dang / gang dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
5b5(khri brgyad): gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od gang yin pa'i 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen
5b6(khri brgyad): pos khyab par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen po des khyab par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang /
5b7(khri brgyad): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
6a1(khri brgyad): dag snang ba chen po des khyab par mdzad do/ /sems can gang dag gis 'od de mthong ba dang / gang dag 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang
6a2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong
6a3(khri brgyad): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ljags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par
6a4(khri brgyad): mdzad nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de dag thams cad la rin po che sna
6a5(khri brgyad): tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam
6a6(khri brgyad): pa ka tsa li di ka ltar reg na bde ba sha stag kun tu gnas par gyur te/ pad+ma de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
6a7(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas kyang / 'di lta
6b1(khri brgyad): ste| pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang
6b2(khri brgyad): gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/ pha
6b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can gang dag gis chos bstan pa de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
6b4(khri brgyad): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan seng+ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du seng+ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
6b5(khri brgyad): nas| 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos
6b6(khri brgyad): te| g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/
6b7(khri brgyad): kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/
7a1(khri brgyad): dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/ 'jam pa dang / snum pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas skad cig thang cig
7a2(khri brgyad): yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par
7a3(khri brgyad): gyur/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang med par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /
7a4(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de nas mi de
7a5(khri brgyad): dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin
7a6(khri brgyad): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
7a7(khri brgyad): dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
7b1(khri brgyad): dag gi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par gyur/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang med par gyur
7b2(khri brgyad): te/ sems can de dag thams cad lha dang mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis sngon
7b3(khri brgyad): gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag
7b4(khri brgyad): gi drung du dong ste phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ thams cad thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen
7b5(khri brgyad): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can long ba gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis ni gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to/ /sems can 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur to//
7b6(khri brgyad): smyon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed par gyur to/ /sems rnam par g.yeng ba rnams ni sems rtse gcig par gyur to/ /gcer bu rnams ni gos rnyed par gyur to/ /dbul po rnams ni
7b7(khri brgyad): nor rnyed par gyur to/ /bkres pa rnams ni zas rnyed par gyur to/ /skom pa rnams ni btung ba rnyed par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad med par gyur to/ /dbang po nyams
8a1(khri brgyad): shing ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po yongs su tshang bar gyur to/ /lus ngal ba rnams ni lus ngal ba med par gyur to/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang /
8a2(khri brgyad): 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams ni/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba dang bral bar gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams
8a3(khri brgyad): cad la/ 'di lta ste/ pha ma dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang / phu nu dang / sring mo dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang
8a4(khri brgyad): mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sems mnyam par gyur to/ /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod la/ gtsang zhing nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog
8a5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad 'byor par gyur te/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs
8a6(khri brgyad): pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni legs pa'o/ /dul ba ni legs
8a7(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /legs par sdom pa ni legs pa'o/ /tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa ni legs pa'o/ /srog chags 'byung po rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni legs pa'o/ /zhes bya bar
8b1(khri brgyad): shes par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ kye ma sems can 'di dag 'di ltar sbyin pa ni legs pa'o/ /
8b2(khri brgyad): dul ba ni legs pa'o/ /legs par sdom pa ni legs pa'o/ /tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa ni legs pa'o/ /srog chags 'byung po rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni legs pa'o//
8b3(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar shes pa'i shes rab de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan seng+ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs
8b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yongs su dag pa'i nam mkha' la nyi ma stobs dang ldan pa dang / zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang /
8b5(khri brgyad): dpal gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang
8b6(khri brgyad): bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ gnas gtsang ma dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs
8b7(khri brgyad): so| |de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od dang / sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis zil gyis mnan
9a1(khri brgyad): to| |lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od dang /
9a2(khri brgyad): sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni de las gzhan pa'i
9a3(khri brgyad): ri thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go /'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis mnan
9a4(khri brgyad): te| mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni de las gzhan pa'i snang ba thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing lham me
9a5(khri brgyad): lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha dang bcas pa/ dbang
9a6(khri brgyad): po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gnas gtsang ma dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang
9a7(khri brgyad): nger bzhugs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi lus ci 'dra ba de dang mthun par sku tha mal pa
9b1(khri brgyad): bstan to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams nas/ tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga'
9b2(khri brgyad): dang / dga' ldan dang / 'thab bral dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris kyi bar ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog
9b3(khri brgyad): mi shes pa mthong nas/ de dag tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ lha'i me tog dag khyer zhing lha'i me tog phreng dang / lha'i spos dang /
9b4(khri brgyad): lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i bdug pa dang / lha'i ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / na li na dang / dri mchog dang / lha'i me tog klu shing gi me tog
9b5(khri brgyad): dang | ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha'i gos dang / lha'i rgyan dang / lha'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /stong gsum gyi
9b6(khri brgyad): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang snod du gyur pa'i mi gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas thang
9b7(khri brgyad): las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnams khyer te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas lha de dag dang / mi de dag gis lha'i
10a1(khri brgyad): me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan de dag dang / chu
10a2(khri brgyad): las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa'i me tog de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /de nas me tog dang / spos dang / bdug
10a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char dang / thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog gang dag bcom
10a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la gtor ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi
10a5(khri brgyad): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam gcig tu red de gnas par gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha'i me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi dag 'phyang / rab tu 'phyang / mngon
10a6(khri brgyad): par rab tu 'phyang ste/ me tog gi lda ldi dang / dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi
10a7(khri brgyad): 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu phyogs bcur 'phros pa des kyang phyogs re rer 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag khyab par snang bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen
10b1(khri brgyad): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ dzam+bu'i gling gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha dang mi de dag so so nas 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gi mdun na
10b2(khri brgyad): bzhugs shing chos ston to/ /snyam mo/ /de bzhin du nub kyi ba glang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi
10b3(khri brgyad): lha rnams kyi bar dang / de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang / mi de
10b4(khri brgyad): dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan seng+ge'i khri de nyid la
10b5(khri brgyad): bzhugs bzhin du yang 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'dzum pa'i snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gsal bar gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
10b6(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan
10b7(khri brgyad): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dag mthong bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis kyang 'jig
11a1(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
11a2(khri brgyad): khams mi mjed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyis lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og
11a3(khri brgyad): dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo / /'jig
11a4(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dge slong gi
11a5(khri brgyad): dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen
11a6(khri brgyad): can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /
11a7(khri brgyad): de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston to/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer
11b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog
11b2(khri brgyad): 'byung gnas gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di dang /
11b3(khri brgyad): dog sa cher g.yos pa 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
11b4(khri brgyad): dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
11b5(khri brgyad): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
11b6(khri brgyad): la chos kyang ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas la byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer gyis 'di skad ces gsol
11b7(khri brgyad): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
12a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de dag kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams
12a2(khri brgyad): cad la dbang thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song zhig /
12a3(khri brgyad): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer la pad+ma rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma
12a4(khri brgyad): stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la pad+ma 'di dag gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du spyod
12a5(khri brgyad): cig| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer
12a6(khri brgyad): gyis| de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas las/ rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems
12a7(khri brgyad): dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
12b1(khri brgyad): nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog
12b2(khri brgyad): phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub
12b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der phyin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas
12b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer gyis bcom
12b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol te/
12b6(khri brgyad): gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes snyun gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dkon
12b7(khri brgyad): mchog 'byung gnas kyis pad+ma 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das la bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+ma de dag bzhes nas/ shar
13a1(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ga la ba de logs su gtor to/ /pad+ma de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag khyab par
13a2(khri brgyad): gyur te/ pad+ma de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sku dag bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems
13a3(khri brgyad): can gang dag gis chos de thos pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba de dag
13a4(khri brgyad): dang | khye'u dang / bu mo de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/
13a5(khri brgyad): mchod pa byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams
13a6(khri brgyad): cad med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
13a7(khri brgyad): so| |de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug pas/ zhes bya ba nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /de
13b1(khri brgyad): bzhin du nub phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba da
13b2(khri brgyad): ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug pas/ zhes bya ba nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /zhes bya ba'i
13b3(khri brgyad): bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /byang phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po
13b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug pas/ zhes bya ba nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /zhes
13b5(khri brgyad): bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
13b6(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po che dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
13b7(khri brgyad): rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug pas/ zhes bya ba nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na 'jig
14a1(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan shin tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
14a2(khri brgyad): rgyas pad+ma mchog gi dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+ma zhes bya ba 'dug pas/ zhes bya ba nas
14a3(khri brgyad): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
14a4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgron ma mchog gi dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de na byang chub
14a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug pas/ zhes bya ba nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /nub byang gi phyogs
14a6(khri brgyad): mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba da
14a7(khri brgyad): ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug pas/ zhes bya ba nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /zhes
14b1(khri brgyad): bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i
14b2(khri brgyad): dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma mchog ces bya ba 'dug pas/ zhes bya ba nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod
14b3(khri brgyad): do| |zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /de nas steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba
14b4(khri brgyad): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa'
14b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/
14b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
14b7(khri brgyad): snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di dang / dog sa cher g.yos pa 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
15a1(khri brgyad): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
15a2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu/ 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
15a3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//
15a4(khri brgyad): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal la/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
15a5(khri brgyad): pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag
15a6(khri brgyad): par rig pa thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
15a7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin la pad+ma
15b1(khri brgyad): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la pad+ma 'di dag gis gtor cig/
15b2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir
15b3(khri brgyad): ro| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal las rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de
15b4(khri brgyad): dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig
15b5(khri brgyad): tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ steng gi phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad la me tog dang / bdug
15b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
15b7(khri brgyad): par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der phyin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
16a1(khri brgyad): pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang
16a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal/ bcom ldan
16a3(khri brgyad): 'das la snyun gsol te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes snyun gsol lo/ /
16a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i dpal gyis pad+ma 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das la bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+ma de dag bzhes
16a5(khri brgyad): nas| steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ga la ba de logs su gtor to/ /pad+ma de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag khyab
16a6(khri brgyad): par gyur te/ pad+ma de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sku dag bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston
16a7(khri brgyad): to| |sems can gang dag gis chos de thos pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang /
16b1(khri brgyad): rab tu byung ba de dag dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
16b2(khri brgyad): pa byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur te/ me
16b3(khri brgyad): tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa dang / pog phor nas bdug pa dang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa rgyan dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis yal ga'i
16b4(khri brgyad): rtse mo g.yur za ba dag dang / me tog gi shing ljon pa dag dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag dang / spos kyi shing ljon pa dag dang / me tog phreng gi shing ljon pa dag dang / phye ma'i shing
16b5(khri brgyad): ljon pa dag gis mdzes par byas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas me tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa
16b6(khri brgyad): dang | lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid che ba/ gzi brjid che ba gzhan dag kyang gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can
16b7(khri brgyad): bzhin du gyur to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// //de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten lha dang
17a1(khri brgyad): bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang mir bcas pa 'dus pa dang / byang chub
17a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'
17a3(khri brgyad): stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
17a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
17a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'tshal bas/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi/ de skad
17a6(khri brgyad): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas pa
17a7(khri brgyad): med pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa po dang / len pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yongs su btang ba med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i
17b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ltung ba mi 'byung ba dang / lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'khrug pa med pa'i
17b2(khri brgyad): phyir| bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus ma gtang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ro
17b3(khri brgyad): myang ba med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /
17b4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
17b5(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
17b6(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
17b7(khri brgyad): med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'du shes dgu bsgom par bya'o/ /dgu
18a1(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / phyed du chad pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /
18a2(khri brgyad): rnam par bsdos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes te/ de dag ni
18a3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dgu'o/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su
18a4(khri brgyad): dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /
18a5(khri brgyad): mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang / 'chi ba'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten thams cad la
18a6(khri brgyad): mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten thams cad la yid mi rton pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa
18a7(khri brgyad): dang | lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / yongs su 'dris pa shes pa
18b1(khri brgyad): dang | sgra ji bzhin shes pa dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa'ang med dpyod pa'ang med pa'i ting nge
18b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang / zad
18b3(khri brgyad): bar gyi skye mched dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / rnam par dgod pa bzhi dang / sa bcu dang / spyod pa bcu dang / bzod pa bcu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa nyi shu dang / thams cad
18b4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong shes pa dang / rig pa gsum dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma nyams pa'i mngon par
18b5(khri brgyad): shes pa lnga dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos drug dang / nor bdun dang / skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad dang / sems can gyi gnas
18b6(khri brgyad): dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /byang chub sems
18b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
19a1(khri brgyad): nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i
19a2(khri brgyad): rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag chags dang / mtshams
19a3(khri brgyad): sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
19a4(khri brgyad): pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'dod pa dang /
19a5(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang rnam par g.yo
19a6(khri brgyad): ba shes par 'dod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thob par 'dod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang
19a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
19b1(khri brgyad): bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil
19b2(khri brgyad): gyis gnon par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin
19b3(khri brgyad): dang | shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas shes
19b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
19b5(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub
19b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ched du sbyin pa chung ngu byin yang thabs mkhas pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos pas/ tshad med
19b7(khri brgyad): grangs med par 'gyur bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ched du
20a1(khri brgyad): tshul khrims chung ngu srung / bzod pa chung ngu sgom/ brtson 'grus chung ngu rtsom/ bsam gtan chung ngu la snyoms par 'jug/ shes rab chung ngu sgom yang /
20a2(khri brgyad): thabs mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos pas/ de dag grangs med/ tshad med par 'gyur bar byed 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /
20a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang
20a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
20a5(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas
20a6(khri brgyad): kyi sku mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bsgrub
20a7(khri brgyad): par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar 'dod
20b1(khri brgyad): pas| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i sa gnon par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
20b2(khri brgyad): dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis/
20b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mo bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i dge
20b4(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba de dag bdag la 'byor par 'dod pa des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' ba
20b5(khri brgyad): dang / btung ba dang / me tog dang / spos dang / gos dang / me tog phreng dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / khang khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru
20b6(khri brgyad): dang | na ba'i gsos sman dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / skyed mos tshal dang / rgyal srid la sogs pa'i yo
20b7(khri brgyad): byad rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'dod pa des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan
21a1(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i sems can thams
21a2(khri brgyad): cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
21a3(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
21a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa gcig kyang byang chub kyi snying po la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi zad par byed par 'dod pa des/ shes rab kyi pha rol
21a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu dag na/ sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag bdag gi bsngags
21a6(khri brgyad): pa brjod par 'dod pa des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa gcig gis
21a7(khri brgyad): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems
21b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa gcig gis lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs re rer yang
21b2(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
21b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag sgra gcig gis go bar byed par 'dod pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs
21b4(khri brgyad): mtshams rnams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag sgra gcig gis go bar byed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
21b5(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir gnas par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
21b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
21b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
22a1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
22a2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
22a3(khri brgyad): bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
22a4(khri brgyad): cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
22a5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed yod pa de dag shes par
22a6(khri brgyad): 'dod pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / khron pa dang / 'bab chu'i dngo'i chu'i rdul phra rab rnams shes par 'dod pa dang / me'i rdul phra rab
22a7(khri brgyad): rnams shes par 'dod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rlung gi rdul phra rab rnams shes par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
22b1(khri brgyad): pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bsreg pa'i bskal pa'i me 'bar ba
22b2(khri brgyad): kha'i dbugs gcig gis zhi bar bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'khrug
22b3(khri brgyad): pa chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor byung ste/ rlung gis 'jig pa na/ gang ri rab dang / ri rab chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po nas bzung ste/ ri thams cad dang / sa chen
22b4(khri brgyad): po thams cad g.yo bar byed pa dang / rnam par 'thor bar byed pa dang / rmeg med par byed pa'i rnam par 'khrug par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de sor mo gcig gi rtse mos gzhil
22b5(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
22b6(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams na/ ri rab dang / ri rab chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po la sogs pa ri gang dag yod pa de dag skra nyag ma gcig gis sbams te/ 'jig rten gyi khams
22b7(khri brgyad): grangs med dpag tu med par 'phang ngo snyam na'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong
23a1(khri brgyad): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa de thams cad skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par dgang bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi
23a2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi
23a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams bsod snyoms gcig gis khyad par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
23a4(khri brgyad): bya'o| |de bzhin du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin rnams
23a5(khri brgyad): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang / bla mar bya bar 'dod pa dang / ri mor bya bar 'dod
23a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho dang / nub dang / byang
23a7(khri brgyad): dang | byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs
23b1(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams bsod snyoms gcig gis khyed par bya bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog
23b2(khri brgyad): phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
23b3(khri brgyad): de dag la bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang / bla mar bya bar 'dod pa dang / ri mor bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// //
23b4(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
23b5(khri brgyad): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag tshul khrims kyi phung po la dgod par 'dod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam
23b6(khri brgyad): par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la dgod par 'dod pa dang / de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
23b7(khri brgyad): bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi bar la dgod par
24a1(khri brgyad): 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar
24a2(khri brgyad): lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang
24a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa byin pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ sbyin pa 'di ltar
24a4(khri brgyad): byin na ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la
24a5(khri brgyad): chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral
24a6(khri brgyad): dang | dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa 'di
24a7(khri brgyad): ltar byin na ni/ bsam gtan dang po thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa thob par 'gyur/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ bsam gtan
24b1(khri brgyad): bzhi pa thob par 'gyur/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang
24b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur/ sbyin pa
24b3(khri brgyad): 'di ltar byin na ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
24b4(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur bar shes so/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
24b5(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
24b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /zhes bya bar shes par
24b7(khri brgyad): bya'o| |de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
25a1(khri brgyad): sbyin pa ji ltar stsal na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa ji ltar
25a2(khri brgyad): stsal na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
25a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ sbyin par bya ba dang / gtong ba po dang / len
25a4(khri brgyad): pa po mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/ ltung ba mi 'byung ba dang / lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir
25a5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/ 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/ lus dang sems kyi
25a6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus ma btang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/ rnam par g.yeng ba dang / kun tu rtog pa med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol
25a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/ chos thams cad rab tu shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin te/ shA ri'i
25b1(khri brgyad): bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa de ltar byin na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pha rol
25b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no/ /de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
25b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan
25b4(khri brgyad): 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang
25b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/
25b6(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod pa dang / de bzhin du chos kyi
25b7(khri brgyad): dbyings skye ba med pa'i mthar phyin par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /
26a1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sngon du 'gro bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
26a2(khri brgyad): chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
26a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nang gi 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
26a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor mang po dang ldan par 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /
26a5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/
26a6(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'chal pa'i
26a7(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi sems mi bskyed par 'dod pa dang / gnod sems kyi sems mi bskyed par 'dod pa dang / le lo'i sems dor bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems
26b1(khri brgyad): dor bar 'dod pa dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems dor bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
26b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sems can thams cad sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dgod par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba dang / zhal ta bya
26b3(khri brgyad): ba dang ldan pa dang / rdzas las byung pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dgod par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
26b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga bskyed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab
26b5(khri brgyad): kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig ste/ de dag bskyed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
26b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
26b7(khri brgyad): bya'o| |de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi
27a1(khri brgyad): bye ma snyed dag lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston
27a2(khri brgyad): pa'i chos de lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha
27a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
27a4(khri brgyad): thams cad na chos ston pa de thams cad thos nas dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa gcad du mi chod pas yang dag par gzung bar 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
27a5(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du thams cad chud mi za bar bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
27a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams blta bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams dang /
27a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
27b1(khri brgyad): blta bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdo'i sde dang /
27b2(khri brgyad): dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang /
27b3(khri brgyad): shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde gang ci bstan pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
27b4(khri brgyad): kyis ma thos pa gang yin pa de thams cad kun chub par byed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
27b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang ci gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad gzung bar 'dod pa
27b6(khri brgyad): dang | bcang bar 'dod pa dang / bklag par 'dod pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'dod pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
27b7(khri brgyad): bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
28a1(khri brgyad): rnams kyis gang ci gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba de thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'dod pa dang / gzung par 'dod pa dang / bcang bar
28a2(khri brgyad): 'dod pa dang / bklag par 'dod pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'dod pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
28a3(khri brgyad): bya'o| |shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa gang na nyi
28a4(khri brgyad): ma dang zla ba'i 'od mi 'bab pa de dag thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang /
28a5(khri brgyad): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa gang na nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od kyang mi 'bab pa de dag thams cad 'od kyis
28a6(khri brgyad): snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
28a7(khri brgyad): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi
28b1(khri brgyad): sgra sgrog par 'dod pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho
28b2(khri brgyad): dang | nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ gang na sangs rgyas
28b3(khri brgyad): dang | chos dang / dge 'dun dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sgra mi grag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar
28b4(khri brgyad): 'dod pa dang / sems can dag yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
28b5(khri brgyad): chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can gang dag long bar gyur pa de dag bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur
28b6(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang / smyon pa rnams dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gcer bu rnams
28b7(khri brgyad): gos dag rnyed pa dang / sems can bkres pa rnams 'grangs pa dang / skom pa rnams skom ngoms pa dang / sems can ngan song na gnas pa rnams ngan song thams cad las thar
29a1(khri brgyad): te| mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshul khrims kyi phung po la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams
29a2(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / bden pa ma
29a3(khri brgyad): mthong ba rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang /
29a4(khri brgyad): rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang /
29a5(khri brgyad): byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can gang dag long
29a6(khri brgyad): bar gyur pa de dag bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'on pa rnams rna bas
29a7(khri brgyad): sgra thos pa dang / smyon pa rnams dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gcer bu rnams gos dag rnyed pa dang / sems can bkres pa rnams 'grangs pa dang / skom pa rnams skom ngoms
29b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / sems can ngan song na gnas pa rnams ngan song thams cad las thar te/ mir skye ba thob par 'gyur pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshul khrims kyi phung po la dgod par
29b2(khri brgyad): bya'o| |snyam pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung
29b3(khri brgyad): po la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / bden pa ma mthong ba rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
29b4(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
29b5(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam la slob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
29b6(khri brgyad): bya'o| |shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ nam zhig na bdag gis glang po che'i lta
29b7(khri brgyad): stangs kyis blta bar bya/ snyam pa dang / ji ltar na bdag sa chen po la rkang pa sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg par 'gro bar 'gyur/ snyam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
30a1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ ji ltar na bdag
30a2(khri brgyad): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs
30a3(khri brgyad): ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / gya nom
30a4(khri brgyad): snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / mi che dang / mi gdung dang / 'og min gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying por
30a5(khri brgyad): 'gro bar 'gyur/ snyam na'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
30a6(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ ji ltar na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha nas/ 'og min gyi ris kyi lha'i bar dag byang chub kyi snying po'i shing drung du bdag gi stan 'ding bar
30a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur/ snyam na'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
30b1(khri brgyad): pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal
30b2(khri brgyad): ba'i sa phyogs de rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur/ snyam na'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
30b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ ji ltar na bdag nyi ma gang la mngon par byung ba'i nyi ma de nyid la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
30b4(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ nyi ma de nyid la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can tshad
30b5(khri brgyad): med grangs med pa dag chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing / dri ma med pa rnam par dag par 'gyur/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las
30b6(khri brgyad): sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ snyam na'ang / shes rab kyi
30b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ ji
31a1(khri brgyad): ltar na bdag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshad med grangs med par 'gyur/ chos bstan pa gcig gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag stan gcig
31a2(khri brgyad): pa'i dgra bcom par 'gyur/ stan gcig pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
31a3(khri brgyad): dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med par 'gyur/ tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par 'gyur/ 'od dpag tu med pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ snyam na'ang / shes
31a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
31a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi sgra thams cad kyi thams cad du mi grag par 'gyur/ snyam na'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
31a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji ltar na bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can thams cad sbyin pa ni legs pa'o/ /dul ba ni
31a7(khri brgyad): legs pa'o/ /legs par sdom pa ni legs pa'o/ /tshangs par spyod pa ni legs pa'o/ /srog chags 'byung po rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni legs pa'o/ /zhes bya bar shes
31b1(khri brgyad): pa'i shes rab de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur/ snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos nub pa'i sgra'ang
