31b2(khri brgyad): mi grag par 'gyur/ snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na/ bdag gi ming thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
31b3(khri brgyad): can gang dag 'khod pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur/ snyam na'ang / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang gi tshe
31b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / yon tan 'di dag skyed par byed pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
31b5(khri brgyad): rgyal po chen po bzhi po gang dag 'khod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po chen po
31b6(khri brgyad): bzhi po de dag gis lhung bzed dag phul ba ltar bdag cag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la lhung bzed bzhi dbul bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems shing / yid
31b7(khri brgyad): dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di snyam du/ de lta na lha
32a1(khri brgyad): ma yin gyi ris rnams ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur zhing / lha'i ris rnams ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'
32a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po 'di la rim gro bskyed par bya'o/ /snyam du sems shing yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa chen po dag dang /
32a3(khri brgyad): tshangs ris kyi lha nas bzung ste/ tshangs pa thams cad dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha dag 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs
32a4(khri brgyad): rgyas na/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du bdag cag gis gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /snyam du sems shing yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe/
32a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
32a6(khri brgyad): rnams kyang 'di snyam du/ bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i pha dang / ma dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi
32a7(khri brgyad): gnyen mtshams dag tu 'gyur ro/ /snyam du sems shing / yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar
32b1(khri brgyad): gyi lha rnams kyang 'di snyam du/ de ni sems can rnams byang chub la nges par sbyar ba'i phyir/ kun tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams kyis kun tu mi sbyor zhing / tshangs par spyod par
32b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/ de 'di skad du bdag sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ tshangs par spyad par bya'i/ mi tshangs par spyad par ni mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa rnams la
32b3(khri brgyad): bsten pa ni/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba la'ang bar du gcod par 'gyur na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bas na byang chub
32b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ khyim nas mngon par byung zhing tshangs par spyad pa nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
32b5(khri brgyad): bar bya'i/ mi tshangs par spyod pas ni ma yin no/ /zhes smon lam 'debs pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khrig pa kun tu sbyor ba la mi 'jug pas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /
32b6(khri brgyad): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
32b7(khri brgyad): po la pha ma dang / mchis brang dang / bu dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag nges par 'tshal lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
33a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig la ni pha dang /
33a2(khri brgyad): ma dang / chung ma dang / bu dag dgos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig ni sems dang po bskyed pa nyid nas bzung ste/ tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par len
33a3(khri brgyad): cing | bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de rtag tu gzhon nur gyur pa nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par
33a4(khri brgyad): byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig ni thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyad nas/ btsun
33a5(khri brgyad): mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas mngon par byung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
33a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po kha cig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la gnas pa thob nas/ 'dod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral yang de dag sems can yongs su smin par
33a7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar 'dzin par ston la/ yongs su spyod par ni mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob
33b1(khri brgyad): ma mkhas pa/ sgyu ma'i rig sngags dang sbyor ba shes pa/ legs par bslabs pa zhig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mngon par sprul te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gis bdag
33b2(khri brgyad): nyid rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa bstan na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag la yongs su
33b3(khri brgyad): spyad pa yod snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
33b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yongs su spyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa'i yon
33b5(khri brgyad): tan dag gis gos pa'ang med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa rnams ni kun tu 'bar ba'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni smad pa'o/ /'dod pa
33b6(khri brgyad): rnams ni gsod pa'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni phyir rgol ba'o/ /zhes 'dod pa rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
33b7(khri brgyad): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams nye bar 'dzin to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sems bskyed pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/
34a1(khri brgyad): gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
34a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'
34a3(khri brgyad): stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
34a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /byang chub kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
34a5(khri brgyad): pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mi spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /spyod kyang spyod la/ mi
34a6(khri brgyad): spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs kyang yang
34a7(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i
34b1(khri brgyad): bu| 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ming de ni ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi / stong pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ming stong pa ni ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i
34b2(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi/ stong pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' stong pa ni ma yin/ byang chub kyang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi /stong pa nyid kyis byang chub stong pa ni ma yin/ shes rab
34b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi/ stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ni ma yin/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi/ stong
34b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ni ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par
34b5(khri brgyad): shes pa stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ming gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming ma yin la/ stong pa nyid las gud
34b6(khri brgyad): na'ang byang chub sems dpa'i ming med de/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ming yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa
34b7(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byang chub sems dpa' med de/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang
35a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' yin pa dang / byang chub kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de byang chub ma yin la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byang chub med de/ byang chub
35a2(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ stong pa nyid las
35a3(khri brgyad): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa dang / gzugs kyi
35a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med de/ gzugs nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / tshor ba dang /
35a5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med de/ rnam par
35a6(khri brgyad): shes pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du
35a7(khri brgyad): zad| 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba dang / byang chub ces bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba
35b1(khri brgyad): dang | 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro/ /de
35b2(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid med pa la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med/ 'grib pa med/ 'phel ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med/ rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs
35b3(khri brgyad): ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sgyu ma'ang ming tsam du zad de/ yul
35b4(khri brgyad): na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pas sgyu ma mthong ba ni log par gyur pa ste/ yod pa ma yin zhing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
35b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni chos gang la'ang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gnas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
35b6(khri brgyad): ngo| |'grib par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'phel bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /kun nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rnam par byang bar yang
35b7(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /
36a1(khri brgyad): gang la byang chub ces bya ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni bcos ma yin pa'i phyir/
36a2(khri brgyad): chos so so tha dad pa de dag ni btags pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa/ glo bur du btags pa'i ming gis rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/ ji lta ji ltar rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa de de lta de ltar mngon
36a3(khri brgyad): par zhen to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/ ming de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /yang dag
36a4(khri brgyad): par rjes su ma mthong bas mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar
36a5(khri brgyad): yongs su rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ byang chub ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni ming
36a6(khri brgyad): tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ gzugs
36a7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/ /zhes yongs su rtog go /shA ri'i bu/ 'di
36b1(khri brgyad): lta ste| dper na/ bdag bdag ces brjod kyang bdag kyang mi dmigs sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag kyang mi dmigs te/ 'di ltar ming gis tha snyad btags par zad kyi/ mi
36b2(khri brgyad): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du dmigs su med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang /
36b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /ming gang gis tha snyad 'dogs pa'i ming de'ang yang dag par
36b4(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin
36b5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i shes rab ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon to/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis mngon par zhen par 'gyur
36b6(khri brgyad): ba de'ang des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /shA
36b7(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling 'di shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis dzam+bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/
37a1(khri brgyad): mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gang bar gyur kyang / de dag gi shes rab gang yin pa des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
37a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang /
37a3(khri brgyad): rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan
37a4(khri brgyad): las bzla ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig
37a5(khri brgyad): yongs su bsgoms pa gang yin pa des kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon to/ /shA ri'i bu/ dzam+bu'i gling 'di shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi
37a6(khri brgyad): bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta zhog gi/ shA ri'i bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shA ri'i bu dang / mau dgal gyi bu lta bu'i
37a7(khri brgyad): dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang / de dag gi shes rab kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab
37b1(khri brgyad): nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shA ri'i bu dang / mau dgal gyi
37b2(khri brgyad): bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta'ang zhog gi/ shA ri'i bu/ gal te shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag shA ri'i bu dang / mau dgal gyi bu
37b3(khri brgyad): lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur cing / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi
37b4(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag shA ri'i bu dang / mau dgal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang / de dag gi shes rab kyis byang
37b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig bsgoms pa gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar
37b6(khri brgyad): du'ang mi bzod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir
37b7(khri brgyad): 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi shes rab gang lags pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin
38a1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab gang lags pa'i shes rab de dag thams cad ni tha dad pa ma lags pa/ dben pa/
38a2(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ tha dad pa ma lags shing / dben la ma skyes pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa la ni tha dad du dbye ba'am/ khyad
38a3(khri brgyad): par mi dmigs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab gdugs gcig bsgoms pa gang lags pa des nyan thos dang /
38a4(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
38a5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
38a6(khri brgyad): ldan pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed pas bdag gis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang
38a7(khri brgyad): chub par byas la/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/ /zhes nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i shes rab gang gi don du nye bar gnas pa ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs
38b1(khri brgyad): rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab nye bar gnas pa yin/ snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di
38b2(khri brgyad): ji snyam du sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas la/
38b3(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/ /snyam du sems snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
38b4(khri brgyad): de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ khyod kyis 'di ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab gang yin pa
38b5(khri brgyad): des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod de/ nyan thos dang / rang
38b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag gis pha
38b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs
39a1(khri brgyad): par byas la/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na
39a2(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /
39a3(khri brgyad): snyam du sems snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
39a4(khri brgyad): chen po ni 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ de
39a5(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
39a6(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams
39a7(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ srog chags kyi rigs srin bu me khyer ni 'di snyam du bdag gi 'od kyis dzam+bu'i gling snang bar bya
39b1(khri brgyad): zhing | bdag gi 'od kyis dzam+bu'i gling khyab par bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag gis pha rol tu
39b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa drug la spyad do/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/
39b3(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
39b4(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta
39b5(khri brgyad): ste| dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar bas ni dzam+bu'i gling thams cad snang bas khyab par byed cing / dzam+bu'i gling thams cad snang bas gsal bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
39b6(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byas
39b7(khri brgyad): te| de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'bres pa bco brgyad
40a1(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/
40a2(khri brgyad): tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
40a3(khri brgyad): 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' zhing / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob pa dang /
40a4(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang
40a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la
40a6(khri brgyad): gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob bo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
40a7(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gang la gnas na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
40b1(khri brgyad): cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems dang po bskyed
40b2(khri brgyad): phyin chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rtag par
40b3(khri brgyad): rgyun du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten
40b4(khri brgyad): nas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / yan lag
40b5(khri brgyad): brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye
40b6(khri brgyad): bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
40b7(khri brgyad): yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
41a1(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i
41a2(khri brgyad): chos de dag 'jig rten du byung bas/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag yod pa yin/ khyim bdag
41a3(khri brgyad): gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag yod pa yin/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang /
41a4(khri brgyad): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med
41a5(khri brgyad): dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che dang / sems can 'du shes med pa dang / gnas gtsang ma gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / mi che dang / mi gdung dang / 'og min dang /
41a6(khri brgyad): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod
41a7(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung ba yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
41b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du byung ba yin no/ /
41b2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su sbyong bar bgyid dam/ 'on te mi bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
41b3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam grangs kyis sbyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
41b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa po yin te/ ci zhig gi sbyin pa po yin
41b5(khri brgyad): zhe na| dge ba'i chos rnams kyi sbyin pa po yin no/ /dge ba'i chos gang dag gi sbyin pa po yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang / yan
41b6(khri brgyad): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi sbyin pa po yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
41b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyis na/ brtson zhes bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang
42a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa
42a2(khri brgyad): nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
42a3(khri brgyad): po mig gi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /gzugs kyi stong pa
42a4(khri brgyad): nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
42a5(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi
42a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /
42a7(khri brgyad): kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
42b1(khri brgyad): dang | ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /chos
42b2(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
42b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
42b4(khri brgyad): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag gis brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de stong pa nyid bdun po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
42b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ re zhig brtson zhe'am/ mi brtson zhes mi brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gzugs skye ba'i chos can nam/ 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes
42b6(khri brgyad): su mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba'i chos can nam/ 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs kun
42b7(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam/ rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas
43a1(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam/ rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag bar rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
43a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gzugs ni tshor ba dang lhan cig yang dag par 'du zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba ni 'du shes dang / 'du shes ni 'du
43a3(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig yang dag par 'du zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams dang
43a4(khri brgyad): lhan cig yang dag par 'du zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos gang yang chos gang dang yang lhan
43a5(khri brgyad): cig yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
43a6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa
43a7(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa de gzugs su yod pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de tshor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de kun tu shes par byed pa
43b1(khri brgyad): ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i
43b2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/ gzugs nyid
43b3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang
43b4(khri brgyad): gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/ rnam par shes
43b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag cing / kun nas nyon
43b6(khri brgyad): mongs pa med/ rnam par byang ba med la/ 'grib pa med cing / 'phel ba med pa ste/ de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /
43b7(khri brgyad): 'di 'dra ba gang yin pa de la ni gzugs med do/ /tshor ba med do/ /'du shes med do/ /'du byed rnams med do/ /rnam par shes pa med do/ /sa'i khams med do/ /chu'i khams med
44a1(khri brgyad): do| |me'i khams med do/ /rlung gi khams med do/ /nam mkha'i khams med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /mig gi skye mched med do/ /gzugs
44a2(khri brgyad): kyi skye mched med do/ /rna ba'i skye mched med do/ /sgra'i skye mched med do/ /sna'i skye mched med do/ /dri'i skye mched med do/ /lce'i skye mched med do/ /ro'i skye mched med do/ /lus kyi skye
44a3(khri brgyad): mched med do/ /reg bya'i skye mched med do/ /yid kyi skye mched med do/ /chos kyi skye mched med do/ /mig gi khams med do/ /gzugs kyi khams med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
44a4(khri brgyad): khams med do/ /rna ba'i khams med do/ /sgra'i khams med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /sna'i khams med do/ /dri'i khams med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
44a5(khri brgyad): med do/ /lce'i khams med do/ /ro'i khams med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /lus kyi khams med do/ /reg bya'i khams med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
44a6(khri brgyad): med do/ /yid kyi khams med do/ /chos kyi khams med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /ma rig pa med do/ /ma rig pa 'gag pa med do/ /'du byed med do/ /'du
44a7(khri brgyad): byed 'gag pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs med do/ /ming dang gzugs 'gag pa med do/ /skye mched drug med do/ /skye
44b1(khri brgyad): mched drug 'gag pa med do/ /reg pa med do/ /reg pa 'gag pa med do/ /tshor ba med do/ /tshor ba 'gag pa med do/ /sred pa med do/ /sred pa 'gag pa med do/ /len pa med do/ /len pa
44b2(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med do/ /srid pa med do/ /srid pa 'gag pa med do/ /skye ba med do/ /skye ba 'gag pa med do/ /rga shi med do/ /rga shi 'gag pa med do/ /sdug bsngal med do/ /kun 'byung ba med do//
44b3(khri brgyad): 'gog pa med do/ /lam med do/ /thob pa med do/ /mngon par rtogs pa med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med do/ /lan gcig
44b4(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /rang byang chub med do/ /de la ni sangs rgyas med
44b5(khri brgyad): do| |byang chub med do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po gsum pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
44b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes
44b7(khri brgyad): su mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la brtson zhes bya pa'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig la
45a1(khri brgyad): brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang
45a2(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams
45a3(khri brgyad): la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig gi khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /
45a4(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams kyi bar dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am/
45a5(khri brgyad): mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin
45a6(khri brgyad): du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag
45a7(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bden pa bzhi la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
45b1(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi
45b2(khri brgyad): mthong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bar la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA
45b3(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar brtson pa ni brtson zhes bya bar rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang
45b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/ stong pa nyid kyi
45b5(khri brgyad): rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no/ /mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma med par sbyor bar mi byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no/ /smon
45b6(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / smon pa med par sbyor bar mi byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/ smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rnal 'byor
45b7(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ rnal 'byor ma yin pa'ang ma yin zhing / de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang rnal 'byor yang ma yin/ rnal 'byor ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir te/
46a1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan
46a2(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'jug ste/ de ltar 'jug pa na gzugs la
46a3(khri brgyad): sbyor bar mi byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do/ /gzugs
46a4(khri brgyad): dang sngon gyi mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/ 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs dang phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/ 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha'
46a5(khri brgyad): nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs dang da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi byed de/ 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor
46a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang sngon gyi mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/ 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rnam
46a7(khri brgyad): par shes pa dang phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/ 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rnam par shes pa dang / da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi byed
46b1(khri brgyad): de| 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
46b2(khri brgyad): pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang / sngon gyi mthar sbyor bar mi byed do/ /da ltar byung ba dang / sngon
46b3(khri brgyad): gyi mtha'am/ phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/ sngon gyi mtha'am/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
46b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
46b5(khri brgyad): la spyod pa ni/ 'di ltar brtson par byed de/ de ltar brtson par byed na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'das par sbyor bar mi byed de/ 'das pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi
46b6(khri brgyad): mthong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa dang sbyor bar ji ltar 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma 'ongs par sbyor bar mi byed de/ ma 'ongs pa nyid kyang
46b7(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 'ongs pa dang sbyor bar ji ltar 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi byed
47a1(khri brgyad): de| da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ltar byung ba dang sbyor bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ shA ri'i
47a2(khri brgyad): bu| de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
47a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ gzugs nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su
47a4(khri brgyad): mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ rnam par shes pa
47a5(khri brgyad): nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du mig dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ mig nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rna
47a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ yid nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs dang
47a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ gzugs nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams
47b1(khri brgyad): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ chos nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
47b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
47b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
47b4(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
47b5(khri brgyad): sbyor bar mi byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/
47b6(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
47b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
48a1(khri brgyad): rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/
48a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
48a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
48a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sangs rgyas su sbyor bar mi byed de/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /byang chub dang rnam pa thams
48a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang byang chub tu sbyor bar mi byed de/ byang chub nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
48a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas yin/ byang chub nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin/ rnam pa
48a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes
48b1(khri brgyad): bya'o| |shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs 'jig go zhes bya bar
48b2(khri brgyad): mi sbyor ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa 'jig go zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs rtag
48b3(khri brgyad): ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa mi rtag
48b4(khri brgyad): ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
48b5(khri brgyad): pa bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang /
48b6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs
48b7(khri brgyad): ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs
49a1(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes
49a2(khri brgyad): bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod
49a3(khri brgyad): ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
49a4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am/ 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
49a5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am/ 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /
49a6(khri brgyad): gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa
49a7(khri brgyad): ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs snying po can zhes bya ba'am/ nyam chung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /de bzhin
49b1(khri brgyad): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa snying po can zhes bya ba'am/ nyam chung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs yod do zhes bya ba'am/ med do zhes bya bar
49b2(khri brgyad): mi sbyor ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod do zhes bya ba'am/ med do zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gang de ltar spyod pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
49b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/ mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/ spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya
49b4(khri brgyad): bar khas mi len te/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
49b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
49b6(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
49b7(khri brgyad): spyod do/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i ched dang /
50a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ched dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ched dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ched dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
50a2(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
50a3(khri brgyad): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang
50a4(khri brgyad): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / skye ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
50a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang
50a6(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/
50a7(khri brgyad): chos gang la'ang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
50b1(khri brgyad): la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /de lha'i mig gi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
50b2(khri brgyad): yul gyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par
50b3(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos te/ rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa thams cad lta ga la yod/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
50b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di
50b5(khri brgyad): snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de
50b6(khri brgyad): dag gi sgra thos par bya'o/ /de dag gi sems rnams kyang shes par bya'o/ /de dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnams kyang rjes su dran par byas la/ rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste/ chos bstan par bya'o/ /
50b7(khri brgyad): snyam du mi sems so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
51a1(khri brgyad): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba lha'i mig gis shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o/ /de dag gi sems rnams kyang shes
51a2(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /de dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnams kyang rjes su dran par byas la/ rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
51a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
51a4(khri brgyad): byed do/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa la ni bdud sdig can gyis kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /'jig rten pa'i
51a5(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu gsal par 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
51a6(khri brgyad): gang dag bzhugs pa de dag dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten
51a7(khri brgyad): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
51b1(khri brgyad): chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung du 'ong ngo / /zhes srung ba mdzad do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang /
51b2(khri brgyad): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'
51b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur du 'ong ngo / /zhes srung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ci yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad kyi thams cad du
51b4(khri brgyad): med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de
51b5(khri brgyad): ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
51b6(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dag kyang tshegs chung ngus mngon du 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i gnas thams cad du'ang de bzhin
51b7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
52a1(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
52a2(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
52a3(khri brgyad): ni 'di snyam du gang chos rnams dang 'du ba'am/ 'brel ba'am/ 'phrad pa'am/ mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod dam/ snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
52a4(khri brgyad): des chos gang 'du ba'am/ 'brel ba'am/ 'phrad pa'am/ mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
52a5(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni
52a6(khri brgyad): 'di snyam du bdag gis myur du chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par 'gyur ram/ mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par mi 'gyur/ snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
52a7(khri brgyad): na| chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir te/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
52b1(khri brgyad): pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs
52b2(khri brgyad): pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /chos kyi dbyings dang chos tha dad du mi byed do/ /de'ang 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings 'di de ltar khong du chud par 'gyur ram/ khong du chud
52b3(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur/ snyam du mi sems te/ 'di ltar chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings stong zhes
52b4(khri brgyad): bya bar yang mi sbyor/ mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor te/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /shA
52b5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor/ de bzhin
52b6(khri brgyad): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par mi sbyor ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
52b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ mig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi khams su mi sbyor/ gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa
53a1(khri brgyad): nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su mi sbyor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi rnam par
53a2(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes
53a3(khri brgyad): pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
53a4(khri brgyad): dang | yid kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su mi sbyor/ chos kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su mi sbyor/
53a5(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ stong
53a6(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa
53a7(khri brgyad): nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed cing / bla
53b1(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ rnal 'byor du bya ba gang dag ci'ang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
53b2(khri brgyad): pa'i rnal 'byor ni mchog/ ces bya'o/ /thu bo zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /rab ces bya'o/ /rab mchog/ ces bya'o/ /ltag na med pa/ zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa/ zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
53b3(khri brgyad): na| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor te/ bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA
53b4(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa'am/ lung bstan pa dang nye bar gyur par gzung bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang
53b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi don kyang byed la/ de 'di snyam du bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
53b6(khri brgyad): lung ston pa mdzad do/ /bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/ /
53b7(khri brgyad): bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de
54a1(khri brgyad): chos kyi dbyings la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing / chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs par gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan
54a2(khri brgyad): 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi
54a3(khri brgyad): mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la sems can gyi 'du shes mi 'byung ba'i phyir
54a4(khri brgyad): ro| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gtan skye ba med cing 'gag pa med de/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa
54a5(khri brgyad): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
54a6(khri brgyad): med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dmigs su med pa dang / sems can
54a7(khri brgyad): dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa dang / sems can ngo bo nyid med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor
54b1(khri brgyad): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
54b2(khri brgyad): rnal 'byor te/ des de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor gang yin pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de
54b3(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
54b4(khri brgyad): pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ser sna'i sems mi bskyed do/ /'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems
54b5(khri brgyad): dang | gnod sems kyi sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems mi bskyed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
54b6(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas
54b7(khri brgyad): pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
55a1(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de ni/ sangs
55a2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am/ mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes par rig
55a3(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
55a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la myur bar rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug ste/ tshe 'di rjes nas kyang chos zab mo 'di mngon du 'gyur zhing / phyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor
55a5(khri brgyad): la snyoms par 'jug go / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang / gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa
55a6(khri brgyad): de dang de dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mnyes par byed par yang 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga'
55a7(khri brgyad): ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyams pa med pas na gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge
55b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der 'dus shing nyams pa med pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos
55b2(khri brgyad): te/ mi nyid dang skal ba mnyam par skyes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i dbang po
55b3(khri brgyad): rnams rtul ba yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la'ang myur du snyoms par mi 'jug cing / de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang mngon
55b4(khri brgyad): du mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de 'di nas shi 'phos
55b5(khri brgyad): nas gang du skye bar 'gyur ba lags/ zhes zer ba ni/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de ni
55b6(khri brgyad): s angs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar
55b7(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
56a1(khri brgyad): zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mnyes par byed par yang 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi
56a2(khri brgyad): mkhas pa gang la la dag bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod kyang / de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes nas/ gal te
56a3(khri brgyad): mi'i nang du skye ba thob pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed na'ang de dag dbang po rnams rtul zhing mi rno ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems
56a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams
56a5(khri brgyad): spangs nas/ de dag yang 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba'ang yod de/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rnams rtul ba yin te/ rno ba ma yin
56a6(khri brgyad): no| |shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
56a7(khri brgyad): dang | dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la'ang snyoms
56b1(khri brgyad): par 'jug kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ gang na
56b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dang der skye zhing / de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na
56b3(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
56b4(khri brgyad): med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas de dag thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad las log ste/ 'dod pa'i khams rnams su
56b5(khri brgyad): skye zhing / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su'am/ bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu rnams su'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye ba dag kyang
56b6(khri brgyad): yod de/ de'ang srid pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi
56b7(khri brgyad): la'ang snyoms par 'jug/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ de dag thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin
57a1(khri brgyad): dang | snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab
57a2(khri brgyad): bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye zhing / de dag tu gnas nas/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin
57a3(khri brgyad): par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
57a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
57a5(khri brgyad): 'jug pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ de dag der tshangs pa'i tshangs pa chen por gyur nas/ de dag tshangs
57a6(khri brgyad): pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
57a7(khri brgyad): b yang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba'i don du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro
57b1(khri brgyad): ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs la mkhas pas/ bsam gtan
57b2(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
57b3(khri brgyad): dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams kyang sgom/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug
57b4(khri brgyad): la| de dag de rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams mnyes par byas te/ der tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ yang dga' ldan gyi lha
57b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de dag der tshe'i yun ji srid par gnas nas/ dbang po ma nyams la/ dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan par lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du
57b6(khri brgyad): mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'dir skye ba bstan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
57b7(khri brgyad): rgya ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams dang /
58a1(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye bar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsti stang du byed/ bla
58a2(khri brgyad): mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon
58a3(khri brgyad): par shes pa drug thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang
58a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra'ang mi grag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par
58a5(khri brgyad): shes pa drug thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
58a6(khri brgyad): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas
58a7(khri brgyad): kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing / de dag der song nas kyang sems can rnams
58b1(khri brgyad): la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog/ chos kyi sgra sgrog /dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog cing / dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dag kyang yod de/ sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi
58b2(khri brgyad): sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas/ de dag nas shi 'phos te/ gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs pa de dag tu skye'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub
58b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur cing / dran
58b4(khri brgyad): pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam sgom la/ de bzhin gshegs
58b5(khri brgyad): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs
58b6(khri brgyad): kyi khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye la/ de dag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
58b7(khri brgyad): chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang
59a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / chos
59a2(khri brgyad): kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byas nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing / yongs
59a3(khri brgyad): su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / de dag gi dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par gnas par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
59a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems
59a5(khri brgyad): can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
59a6(khri brgyad): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa
59a7(khri brgyad): dang / tshad med pa bzhi thob pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
59b1(khri brgyad): gis rnam pa du mar rnam par rtse zhing / 'di lta ste/ de dag bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las
59b2(khri brgyad): langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms
59b3(khri brgyad): par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog
59b4(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go / de las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la
59b5(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de
59b6(khri brgyad): las langs nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'du shes med/
59b7(khri brgyad): 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
