60a1(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dag bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
60a2(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa de dag la thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang /
60a3(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
60a4(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir
60a5(khri brgyad): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par mi byed par/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs la mkhas pas sems can gyi sems
60a6(khri brgyad): kyi rgyud rnams lam la zhugs par byas te/ rnam par sbyangs nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
60a7(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par byed pa de dag kyang yod de/ shA ri'i bu/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bra bu thob par byed pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de ni
60b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas pa de dag ni
60b2(khri brgyad): phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dag kyang
60b3(khri brgyad): yod de/ shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
60b4(khri brgyad): bsam gtan bzhi thob cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag thob pa de dag ni bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir spyod kyang / de dag bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang
60b5(khri brgyad): yod de/ shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
60b6(khri brgyad): dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/ de dag tu'ang sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par 'dzud cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
60b7(khri brgyad): yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
61a1(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems
61a2(khri brgyad): can rnams kyi ched du rtag tu brtson pa dag lan 'ga' yang don med pa dang ldan pa'i tshig mi smra zhing / don med pa dang ldan pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang yod
61a3(khri brgyad): do| |shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / sems can rnams kyi ched du rtag tu brtson pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing
61a4(khri brgyad): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum gyi lam gcod par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
61a5(khri brgyad): dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/ sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing / 'di ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la
61a6(khri brgyad): ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams ni skom/ me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bdug spos dang / mal stan dang / rgyab rten dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / 'tsho ba dang /
61a7(khri brgyad): khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / byu ru dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba dag nye bar sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA
61b1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang
61b2(khri brgyad): yid sdom pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur
61b3(khri brgyad): byas nas/ sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang / gnod sems med pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol
61b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba'i chos la mngon par brtson pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA
61b5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/ sems can rnams zhi gnas
61b6(khri brgyad): rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / 'dod pa las dben pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
61b7(khri brgyad): gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba nyid kyi lus mngon par sprul nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can
62a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan 'gro thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir/ chos
62a2(khri brgyad): ston par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba nyid kyi lus mngon
62a3(khri brgyad): par sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
62a4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos kyang nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang mthong
62a5(khri brgyad): bar byed cing / de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung nas de bas kyang rgya che ba dang / khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /
62a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang
62a7(khri brgyad): dang | byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / /
62b1(khri brgyad): sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan pa dang / byang chub sems
62b2(khri brgyad): dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong bar byed cing / de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan mar yongs su bzung nas/ de bas kyang rgya che ba
62b3(khri brgyad): dang | khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha
62b4(khri brgyad): stag sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
62b5(khri brgyad): ldan par byas te/ dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa rnams dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang po dga' zhing dad pa skyed par byed de/ de dag skye bo
62b6(khri brgyad): mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can de dag kyang sems rab tu dad par gyur pa de nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las
62b7(khri brgyad): 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par
63a1(khri brgyad): bya'o| |ngag yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
63a2(khri brgyad): spyod cing / dbang po gsal ba dag thob par gyur nas de dag dbang po gsal ba de dag gis bdag la bstod par mi byed cing / gzhan la smod par mi byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/
63a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob kyi
63a4(khri brgyad): bar du nam yang dbul por mi 'gyur zhing / ngan song ngan 'gro log par mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/
63a5(khri brgyad): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
63a6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god cing / sbyin pa dang / snyan par
63a7(khri brgyad): smra bas sems can rnams sdud pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
63b1(khri brgyad): gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du ma yongs su bzung nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma byed du 'jug cing / de la gnas nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag
63b2(khri brgyad): du ma mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed cing mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod
63b3(khri brgyad): de| shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas nas/ sems can log par lta bu'i mun pa can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed cing /
63b4(khri brgyad): bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba de dang mi 'bral bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA
63b5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
63b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
63b7(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
64a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang
64a2(khri brgyad): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
64a3(khri brgyad): gang gi tshe/ 'di snyam du 'di ni lus yin te/ des lus kyi rtsom pa byed/ 'di ni ngag yin te/ des ngag gi rtsom pa byed/ 'di ni yid yin te/ des yid kyi rtsom pa byed do/ /snyam du sems
64a4(khri brgyad): na| shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
64a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni lus mi dmigs/ ngag mi dmigs/ yid mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
64a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la gal te lus dmigs pa dang / ngag dmigs pa dang / yid dmigs pa yod par gyur na/ de de'i tshe lus dang ngag dang yid des ser sna'i
64a7(khri brgyad): sems bskyed par 'gyur zhing / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang / gnod sems kyi sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems dang / 'chal pa'i shes
64b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi sems kyang bskyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na rig par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni lus dang /
64b2(khri brgyad): ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa de ni gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni lus kyi
64b3(khri brgyad): gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir te/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang
64b4(khri brgyad): ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan
64b5(khri brgyad): len sbyong bar bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar lus mi dmigs pa dang / ngag mi dmigs
64b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / yid mi dmigs pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gal
64b7(khri brgyad): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas gnas te/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
65a1(khri brgyad): sems mi skyed par de rtag par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar 'jog par byed na/ de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
65a2(khri brgyad): lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa yin no/ /zhes nga smra'o/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
65a3(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi lam yongs su spyod pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
65a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
65a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub kyi lam gang la spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
65a6(khri brgyad): chen po rnams lus mi dmigs/ ngag mi dmigs/ yid mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol
65a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
65b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mi dmigs/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi dmigs shing / 'di lta ste/ chos thams
65b2(khri brgyad): cad dmigs su med pa 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
65b3(khri brgyad): lam 'di nas 'gro zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/ sus kyang thul bar mi nus so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
65b4(khri brgyad): ji ltar spyod pa dag sus kyang mi thul ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa
65b5(khri brgyad): gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / sa'i khams la rlom sems su mi
65b6(khri brgyad): byed pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / mig dang / gzugs
65b7(khri brgyad): la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang / chos la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / mig gi khams
66a1(khri brgyad): dang | gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i
66a2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang
66a3(khri brgyad): lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / yid kyi khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / chos kyi khams la
66a4(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
66a5(khri brgyad): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang /
66a6(khri brgyad): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems su mi byed pa
66a7(khri brgyad): dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom
66b1(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / rang byang chub la rlom sems su mi byed pa
66b2(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub sems dpa' la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
66b3(khri brgyad): chen po de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba ni sus kyang mi thul ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ rnam pa
66b4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes de dang ldan pas/ ngan song rnams kyi sgo thams cad gcod pa dang / dbul zhing rgud pa'i mir mi 'gyur ba dang /
66b5(khri brgyad): lus gang gis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di
66b6(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags/ bcom rnam 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
66b7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de dang ldan pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
67a1(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang mthong
67a2(khri brgyad): ngo| |sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam par dag pa'ang mthong ngo / /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og
67a3(khri brgyad): d ang | steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
67a4(khri brgyad): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam par dag pa'ang mthong
67a5(khri brgyad): ngo| |ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi bskyed do/ /nyan thos
67a6(khri brgyad): kyi 'du shes dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / gzhan gyi 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi bskyed do/ /ye shes de dang ldan pa'i
67a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
67b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la'ang spyod de/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang bsgom la/ dran pa nye bar
67b2(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam yang bsgom la/ yang dag par
67b3(khri brgyad): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam yang mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
67b4(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
67b5(khri brgyad): shes yin te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
67b6(khri brgyad): cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ mig lnga 'thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba
67b7(khri brgyad): dag kyang yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig go/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
68a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/
68a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yod do/ /byang
68a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis dzam+bu'i gling mthong ba yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis dzam+bu'i gling gnyis mthong ba yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis
68a4(khri brgyad): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig
68a5(khri brgyad): gis stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod de/ shA
68a6(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
68a7(khri brgyad): chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub
68b1(khri brgyad): sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin
68b2(khri brgyad): pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang /
68b3(khri brgyad): tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / sems can 'du shes med pa dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang /
68b4(khri brgyad): gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
68b5(khri brgyad): chen po'i lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni 'og min gyi bar
68b6(khri brgyad): gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /lha'i mig yongs su dag pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi
68b7(khri brgyad): 'pho dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
69a1(khri brgyad): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems
69a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag
69a3(khri brgyad): pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig de dang ldan pa ni 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas
69a4(khri brgyad): sam| dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am/ nyon
69a5(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
69a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig de dang ldan pa ni chos gang yang ma mthong ba'am/ ma thos pa'am/ mi dran pa'am/ rnam par mi shes par gyur pa ci'ang med de/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni
69a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
69b1(khri brgyad): chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad
69b2(khri brgyad): pas rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ rnam par thar pa'i
69b3(khri brgyad): sgo rnams kyis gang zag de'i dbang po lnga po dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/ /bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i
69b4(khri brgyad): ye shes mthong ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba
69b5(khri brgyad): gsum spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des sgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang / gnod sems srab mor byed par 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni
69b6(khri brgyad): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /des lam de nyid shas cher bsgoms pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang / gnod sems spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /des lam
69b7(khri brgyad): de nyid shas cher bsgoms pas gzugs la 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa la 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni dgra bcom pa
70a1(khri brgyad): zhes bya'o/ /gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis dbang po lnga po dag thob par 'gyur zhing / bar chad med pa'i ting nge
70a2(khri brgyad): 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/ /bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /
70a3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas dbang po lnga po dag thob par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba
70a4(khri brgyad): nas| dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas dbang
70a5(khri brgyad): po lnga po dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur te/ bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba skye bar
70a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du shes te/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig
70a7(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar kun 'byung ba'i chos gang ci yod pa de thams cad 'gog pa'i chos yin no zhes bya bar
70b1(khri brgyad): rtogs nas/ dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan
70b2(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
70b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod cing / de de nas dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thob la/ de thabs la mkhas pa dang yang ldan/ dge ba'i rtsa
70b4(khri brgyad): bas kyang brtan pas/ bsam bzhin du lus yongs su 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di
70b5(khri brgyad): ni bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
70b6(khri brgyad): kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum ba rnams su/ 'di ni 'thab bral du/ 'di ni dga' ldan du/ 'di ni 'phrul dgar/ 'di ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams su skye
70b7(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro/ /de der gnas nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par yang 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag la nye bar gnas par yang 'gyur/
71a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par yang 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyes par
71a2(khri brgyad): byed par 'gyur/ bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur la/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar
71a3(khri brgyad): yang mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi
71a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ shA ri'i bu/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang
71a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
71a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /'di dag ni nges pa'o/ /'di dag ni ma nges pa'o/ /'di dag ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /
71a7(khri brgyad): 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'o/ /'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa'o/ /'di'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs so/ /'di'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni yongs su ma rdzogs
71b1(khri brgyad): so| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin
71b2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed do/ /de bzhin du lho
71b3(khri brgyad): dang | nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song
71b4(khri brgyad): zhing | de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa
71b5(khri brgyad): byed do| / 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o/ /'di ni bzod pa ma thob pa'o/ /byang chub
71b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
71b7(khri brgyad): chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o/ /'di ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so/ /'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas
72a1(khri brgyad): s o| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
72a2(khri brgyad): bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /'di la ni bsngags pa brjod par mi mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas
72a3(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i tshe ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i 'od dang / dbyangs
72a4(khri brgyad): dang | dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
72a5(khri brgyad): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni dka' ba spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni
72a6(khri brgyad): spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o/ /'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no/ /'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
72a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di dag la ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ shA ri'i bu/ de'ang byang chub
72b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs
72b2(khri brgyad): su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi mjug thogs su rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge
72b3(khri brgyad): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
72b4(khri brgyad): rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /de ni de'i
72b5(khri brgyad): mig yin te/ mig de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba'am/ ma thos pa'am/ mi dran pa'am/ rnam par mi shes pa ci'ang med
72b6(khri brgyad): de| shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag
72b7(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/ /
73a1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar dge ba'i chos thams cad dang / nyan thos kyi chos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / byang chub
73a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der dge ba'i chos thams
73a3(khri brgyad): cad 'dus so/ /zhes yang dag par smra bas smra na/ yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
73a4(khri brgyad): dang mig lnga po de dag skyed pa ste/ mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
73a5(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob
73a6(khri brgyad): cing | des rdzu 'phrul bya ba rnam pa du ma myong bar 'gyur te/ de sa'ang g.yo bar byed do/ /gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang / mang por gyur nas kyang gcig tu 'gyur ba dang / snang
73a7(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur zhing / mi snang bar 'gyur ba'ang myong bar byed do/ /rtsig pa la'ang thad kar 'gro'o/ /ra ba la'ang thad kar 'gro'o/ /ri la'ang lus mi thogs par thad kar 'gro ste/ dper na
73b1(khri brgyad): nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung bcas nas 'gro ste/ dper na/ 'dab chags bya bzhin no/ /sa la'ang steng du 'byung ba dang / byi'u zul byed de/ dper na/ chu la
73b2(khri brgyad): bya ba bzhin no/ /chu la'ang mi nub par 'gro ste/ dper na/ sa la bya ba bzhin no/ /du ba 'thul bar yang byed/ 'bar ba yang byed de/ dper na/ me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/ /zla ba dang nyi ma 'di
73b3(khri brgyad): ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba 'di dag la'ang lag pas nom zhing kun tu nyug par byed do/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du'ang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro/ /
73b4(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/ des gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de'ang mi dmigs/ gang rlom sems
73b5(khri brgyad): su byed pa dang / gang gis rlom sems su byed pa de'ang mi dmigs te/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul du sems pa'am/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par
73b6(khri brgyad): bsgrub pa'i sems pa'ang mi skyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul bya ba mngon sum du bya ba'i
73b7(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/ /des lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pa/ 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi'i sgra rnams thos te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo
74a1(khri brgyad): nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /'di ltar des sgra de mi dmigs pas bdag gis sgra thos so/ /snyam du lha'i rna ba des rlom sems
74a2(khri brgyad): su mi byed do/ /de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i rna bar sems pa'ang mi skyed cing mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
74a3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/ /des sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang
74a4(khri brgyad): zag gzhan dag gi sems kyang sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa
74a5(khri brgyad): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du zhe sdang
74a6(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bral ba dang / sred pa dang bcas pa dang / sred pa dang bral ba dang / len pa dang bcas pa dang /
74a7(khri brgyad): len pa med pa dang / bsdus pa dang / rnam par g.yengs pa dang / chung ngu dang / chen por gyur pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang / rnam par grol ba
74b1(khri brgyad): dang | rnam par ma grol ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / bla na yod pa'i sems la'ang bla na yod pa'i sems su
74b2(khri brgyad): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /bla na med pa'i sems la'ang bla na med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'di ltar sems de'ang sems ma yin pa ste/
74b3(khri brgyad): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir des rlom sems su mi byed do/ /des gang gis rlom sems su mi byed pa'i sems de nyid kyang mi dmigs te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa
74b4(khri brgyad): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag gis shes so/ /snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par sems la
74b5(khri brgyad): sems pa'ang mi bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon
74b6(khri brgyad): sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/ /de sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub
74b7(khri brgyad): ste| des sems gcig gam/ sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no/ /zhag gcig dang / zhag brgya'i bar dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba brgya'i bar dang / lo gcig dang / lo brgya'i
75a1(khri brgyad): bar dang / bskal pa gcig dang / bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma'am/ bskal pa stong phrag du ma'am/ bskal pa 'bum phrag du ma'am/
75a2(khri brgyad): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma'i bar du rjes su dran zhing / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du'ang rjes su dran te/ bdag ni ga ge mo zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ ming ni 'di
75a3(khri brgyad): zhes bya| rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ 'tsho ba ni 'di 'dra ba zhig /yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug /tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig
75a4(khri brgyad): tu gyur| de nas shi 'phos nas ni ga ge mo zhig tu skyes/ de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so/ /zhes de ltar rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang /
75a5(khri brgyad): bcas par bdag dang gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ /'di ltar shes pa de'ang shes pa ma yin pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran
75a6(khri brgyad): pa'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/ /des gang gis rlom sems su mi byed pa'i shes pa de nyid kyang mi dmigs te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /
75a7(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/ bdag gis shes so/ /snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed
75b1(khri brgyad): ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i shes par sems pa'ang mi bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sngon gyi
75b2(khri brgyad): gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/ /de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams mthong ste/ sems can
75b3(khri brgyad): 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gro dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba dag rab tu shes so/ /
75b4(khri brgyad): sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba can yin
75b5(khri brgyad): te| log par lta ba'i las kyi gzhi dang rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod
75b6(khri brgyad): pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag pa'i lta ba can te/ de dag lus dang ngag dang
75b7(khri brgyad): yid kyi legs par spyod pa'i gzhi dang rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/
76a1(khri brgyad): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can
76a2(khri brgyad): rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'di ltar mig de ni mig ma yin pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/ /des
76a3(khri brgyad): gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i mig de nyid mi dmigs te/ de ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag gis shes so//
76a4(khri brgyad): snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par mig tu sems pa'ang mi bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
76a5(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni lha'i mig mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/ /de zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon
76a6(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i shes pa'ang mngon par sgrub la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
76a7(khri brgyad): rgya bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang la'ang smon pa med do/ /de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang /
76b1(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed do/ /'di ltar shes pa de ni shes pa ma yin pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon
76b2(khri brgyad): par bsgrub pa'i dge ba des rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de shes pa de nyid mi dmigs te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir
76b3(khri brgyad): bdag gis shes so/ /snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par shes pa de la sems pa'ang mi bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub
76b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ yang
76b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ mngon
76b6(khri brgyad): par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
76b7(khri brgyad): gang dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//
77a1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ltung ba mi 'byung
77a2(khri brgyad): ba dang / lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub
77a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
77a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las 'das
77a5(khri brgyad): pa stong pa nyid kyis lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus ma btang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang
77a6(khri brgyad): yod do| |shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i phyir
77a7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
77b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad
77b2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
77b3(khri brgyad): kyis 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong bar byed do/ /sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin
77b4(khri brgyad): pa yod pa'i phyir gdags so/ /tshul khrims ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yod pa'i phyir gdags so/ /bzod pa ni 'khrug pa yod pa'i phyir gdags so/ /brtson 'grus ni le lo yod pa'i phyir
77b5(khri brgyad): gdags so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa yod pa'i phyir gdags so/ /shes rab ni 'chal pa'i shes rab yod pa'i phyir gdags te/ de ni rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems
77b6(khri brgyad): med do| |ma rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /sbyin pa dang ser sna zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ma yin pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /bzod
77b7(khri brgyad): pa dang 'khrug pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /brtson 'grus dang le lo zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /mnyam par bzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa zhes bya bar rlom sems
78a1(khri brgyad): med do| |shes rab dang shes rab 'chal pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /bdag la spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /bdag la phyag byas so zhes
78a2(khri brgyad): bya bar rlom sems med do/ /bdag la bsti stang byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /bdag la bsti stang ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i
78a3(khri brgyad): bu| 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni bdag la spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ phyag byas so zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag la bsti stang byas so zhes rlom sems su mi byed/
78a4(khri brgyad): bdag la bsti stang ma byas so zhes rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlom sems thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro/ /shA
78a5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i yon tan gang yin pa de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la
78a6(khri brgyad): med de| de ni yon tan de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/ rnam pa
78a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems can thams
78b1(khri brgyad): cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems skyed par byed de/ des sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /des chos thams cad
78b2(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid thob pas sems can thams cad chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'god par byed do/ /de tshe 'di nyid la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sdug cing thugs su byon par
78b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang sdug cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang
78b4(khri brgyad): der| nam yang mig gis gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna bas sgra yid du mi 'ong ba rnams thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /snas dri yid du mi 'ong ba rnams tshor bar mi
78b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /lces ro yid du mi 'ong ba rnams myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus kyis reg bya yid du mi 'ong ba rnams reg par mi 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis chos yid du mi 'ong ba rnams shes par mi
78b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su
78b7(khri brgyad): nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong sum brgyas gos ci gyon pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/ bla na med pa
79a1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyang bskyed do/ /de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan
79a2(khri brgyad): las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das
79a3(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi
79a4(khri brgyad): mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
79a5(khri brgyad): kun dga' bo/ dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
79a6(khri brgyad): zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig na bskal pa skar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog chen po zhes
79a7(khri brgyad): bya ba dag tu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu drug khris kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de dag ni de bzhin
79b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'ang mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ de nyid du rab tu byung nas/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin
79b2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa byams pa des kyang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po dag gis 'di nas
79b3(khri brgyad): shar phyogs na sangs rgyas khri bzhugs pa nyid du mthong ngo / /phyogs bcu khor yug gi bar du'ang sangs rgyas khri khri mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'jig rten gyi
79b4(khri brgyad): khams de dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang dag snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na mi snang ngo / /de nas 'khor
79b5(khri brgyad): de las srog chags khris bdag cag kyang las 'di lta bu byas te/ las de byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar gyur cig /ces smon lam btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan
79b6(khri brgyad): 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
79b7(khri brgyad): 'das| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
80a1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ srog chags khri po 'di dag khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
80a2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ srog chags khri po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
80a3(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/ phyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur
80a4(khri brgyad): ro| |shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ nye bar brtag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe
80a5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / de dag dang gzhan yang dge
80a6(khri brgyad): slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag gis
80a7(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po
80b1(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes
80b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog lags so/ /'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa khyad par du 'phags pa lags so/ /'di ni
80b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa lags so/ /'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa lags so/ /'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa gong na ma mchis pa lags so/ /'di ni
80b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so/ /'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba dang dul ba lags so/ /'di ni pha rol tu
80b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa dpe ma mchis pa lags so/ /'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' lta bu lags so/ /'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid
80b6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /'di ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
80b7(khri brgyad): ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thub pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
81a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa stsal lags so/ /de dag gis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i
81a2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/ /de dag gis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob lags so/ /de dag gis ni/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par
81a3(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
81a4(khri brgyad): gtan dang / shes rab bsgoms lags so/ /de dag gis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob lags so/ /de dag gis ni/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
81a5(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi chos mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
81a6(khri brgyad): gzugs brnyes par gyur lags so/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa brnyes
81a7(khri brgyad): par gyur lags so/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags so/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor lags so/ /de
81b1(khri brgyad): bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
81b2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur lags so/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom
81b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'tshal ba rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par
81b4(khri brgyad): bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa gang lags pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
81b5(khri brgyad): pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
81b6(khri brgyad): chen po rab tu mang po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed ji skad zer ba bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
81b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i gnas yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/
82a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/ 'jig rten du mi'i 'jig rten 'byung ngo / /'jig rten du lha'i 'jig rten 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du rgyal
82a2(khri brgyad): rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag
82a3(khri brgyad): dang | rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa'i mdun
82a4(khri brgyad): na 'don dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che dang / sems
82a5(khri brgyad): can 'du shes med pa dang / gnas gtsang ma mi che ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / gya nom snang dang / mi gdung dang / 'og min dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /
82a6(khri brgyad): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang / 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams 'jig
82a7(khri brgyad): rten du 'byung ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub
82b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' la brten nas/
82b2(khri brgyad): dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /'jig rten pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad zas dang / skom dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / 'tshog chas dang / nor bu dang / mu
82b3(khri brgyad): tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / dngul dang / gser 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa rnams
82b4(khri brgyad): dang | srid pa'i bde ba rnams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba de dag thams cad kyang / shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten te 'jig rten du 'byung
82b5(khri brgyad): ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la gnas te/ bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa sbyin par
82b6(khri brgyad): byed la| gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa la sbyor bar byed/ bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims bsrung la/ gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed/ bdag nyid kyang bzod pa bsgom la/ gzhan
82b7(khri brgyad): dag kyang bzod pa la sbyor bar byed/ bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la/ gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus la sbyor bar byed/ bdag nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams bskyed la/ gzhan dag
83a1(khri brgyad): kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyor bar byed/ bdag nyid kyang shes rab bsgom la/ gzhan dag kyang shes rab sgom pa la sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de
83a2(khri brgyad): bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ mi
83a3(khri brgyad): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po lnga pa/ de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
83a4(khri brgyad): zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do/ /de nas ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma/ kha
83a5(khri brgyad): dog sna tshogs byung ngo / /de byung nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang /
83a6(khri brgyad): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas shar
83a7(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gis 'od kyi bkod pa de mthong nas rang rang gi
83b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gda' ba 'di su'i mthu lags/ sangs
83b2(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ 'di ni nub phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba
83b3(khri brgyad): zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
83b4(khri brgyad): rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ phyogs bcu dag tu phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen
83b5(khri brgyad): pos khyab par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar
83b6(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / bcom ldan 'das
83b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
84a1(khri brgyad): po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag kyang blta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /
84a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /de'i dus la dbab par shes na deng zhig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin
84a3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ phyogs bcu nas gdugs dang / rgyal
84a4(khri brgyad): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog rnam pa du ma dag khyer nas/
84a5(khri brgyad): sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der
84a6(khri brgyad): dong ngo / /de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / lha'i me tog ut+pa la
84a7(khri brgyad): dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / ta ma la'i lo ma rnams khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
84b1(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha de dag gis me tog dang / me tog phreng dang /

84b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor ro/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa de dag ni steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas stong gsum gyi
84b4(khri brgyad): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ nyams dga' ba yid du 'ong ba zhig tu
84b5(khri brgyad): red de 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
84b6(khri brgyad): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos ci lta bu dag brnyes pa'i chos de lta bu dag bdag
84b7(khri brgyad): cag gis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na thob par gyur cig / da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lung 'bog cing / 'khor 'di lta bu dag la
85a1(khri brgyad): chos ston par yang gyur cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud de/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / mngon par
85a2(khri brgyad): 'du byed pa med pa dang / chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bzod par gyur par mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad
85a3(khri brgyad): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'khor 'di las srog
85a4(khri brgyad): chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi na/ bskal pa me tog 'byung gnas
85a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog ces bya ba dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi
85a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ ljags kyi dbang po'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/
85a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams
85b1(khri brgyad): te| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar khyod spobs par gyis shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de
85b2(khri brgyad): dag dang / lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ci tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang / spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i go chas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
85b3(khri brgyad): rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par byed/ snyam mo/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub
85b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la smras pa/ tshe
85b5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams smra ba dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa gang ci'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no/ /de bzhin
85b6(khri brgyad): gshegs pas chos bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni chos nyid dang mi 'gal lo/ /rigs kyi bu de dag chos bstan pa de la slob na'ang chos nyid de mngon sum du byed do/ /shA ri'i
85b7(khri brgyad): bu| de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
86a1(khri brgyad): bu| 'di la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par mi nus te/
86a2(khri brgyad): yul ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
86a3(khri brgyad): bgyi na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de chos gang gi tshig bla dwags lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
86a4(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba'i ming gi chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang /
86a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i ming de'ang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la
86a6(khri brgyad): gdams par bgyi/ rjes su ston par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang
86a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i ming de ni ming tsam du zad de/ ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sems
86b1(khri brgyad): can sems can zhes bya bar ming du brjod kyang / sems can gang yang mi dmigs te/ de ni ming du btags pa tsam du zad la/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad
86b2(khri brgyad): gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/ 'gag pa med do/ /de bzhin du bdag dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang /

86b4(khri brgyad): pa'i chos yin la/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ 'di ltar ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags par zad do/ /ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang

87a2(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/ chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/

87b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/ chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye

88a6(khri brgyad): dang | yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/ chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba
88a7(khri brgyad): med| 'gag pa med de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
