117b4(khri brgyad): nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
117b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /khams dang / skye mched
117b6(khri brgyad): rnams la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de sa'i khams ma lags la/ sa'i khams las gud
117b7(khri brgyad): na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams lags so/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang /
118a1(khri brgyad): nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang
118a2(khri brgyad): lags pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid
118a3(khri brgyad): lags/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams lags so/ /ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de ma rig pa ma lags la/ ma rig pa
118a4(khri brgyad): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa lags so/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang
118a5(khri brgyad): gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni rga shis stong ste/ rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang
118a6(khri brgyad): lags pa de rga shi ma lags la/ rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang rga shi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
118a7(khri brgyad): rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
118b1(khri brgyad): 'das| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
118b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pas stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
118b3(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags la/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong ba nyid lags/
118b4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyang dran ba nye bar bzhag pa rnams lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
118b5(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
118b6(khri brgyad): yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
118b7(khri brgyad): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi
119a1(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /
119a2(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
119a3(khri brgyad): de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
119a4(khri brgyad): nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
119a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang
119a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
119a7(khri brgyad): 'das/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags bde sbyin pa'i
119b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i
119b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
119b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
119b4(khri brgyad): phyin pas stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud
119b5(khri brgyad): na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
119b6(khri brgyad): rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
119b7(khri brgyad): 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa rnams
120a1(khri brgyad): la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /gcig brjod pa dang / gnyis brjod pa dang / tha dad pa brjod ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/
120a2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar yi ge rnams ni yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yi ge rnams ma lags la/ yi ge rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma
120a3(khri brgyad): mchis te/ yi ge rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams lags ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
120a4(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
120a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag go/
120a6(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gzugs mi rtag pa ni gzugs mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
120a7(khri brgyad): pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o//
120b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de bzhin
120b2(khri brgyad): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa mi
120b3(khri brgyad): rtag pa ni rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi rtag pa nyid
120b4(khri brgyad): ma mchis te/ mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
120b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong
120b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug
120b7(khri brgyad): bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
121a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i dben pa ni rnam par shes pa'i dben pas stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i dben pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam par shes
121a2(khri brgyad): pa ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang dben pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang dben pa nyid lags/ dben pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags pa'i
121a3(khri brgyad): slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar
121a4(khri brgyad): gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi
121a5(khri brgyad): bgyi'o| / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de de bzhin nyid
121a6(khri brgyad): ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan
121a7(khri brgyad): 'das| rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du chos nyid
121b1(khri brgyad): dang | chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
121b2(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgos stong ste/ bcom ldan
121b3(khri brgyad): 'das| gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzungs kyi sgo ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzungs kyi sgo ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags
121b4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs
121b5(khri brgyad): kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas
121b6(khri brgyad): gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
121b7(khri brgyad): spyod pa ma lags so/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/
122a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
122a2(khri brgyad): chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms
122a3(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges bar 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan
122a4(khri brgyad): 'das| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid
122a5(khri brgyad): kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par
122a6(khri brgyad): 'du bgyi ba la spyod ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma
122a7(khri brgyad): lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad
122b1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi
122b2(khri brgyad): mkhas pas gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
122b3(khri brgyad): kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
122b4(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/
122b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
122b6(khri brgyad): su rdzogs par ma gyur bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su
122b7(khri brgyad): gzung ba ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs kyi yongs su
123a1(khri brgyad): gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas gzugs ma lags shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
123a2(khri brgyad): dang | rnam par shes pa'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa da/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas rnam par shes pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i
123a3(khri brgyad): bar ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid
123a4(khri brgyad): lags pas yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /
123a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par brtag par bgyi
123a6(khri brgyad): ste| ci nas chos gang la'ang yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting
123a7(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba zhes bgyi ste/ rgya che ba/ phul du bgyi ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ nges pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
123b1(khri brgyad): rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
123b2(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur lags so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
123b3(khri brgyad): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med
123b4(khri brgyad): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
123b5(khri brgyad): dang | ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni mtshan mar brjod pa ma lags te/ 'di
123b6(khri brgyad): ltar mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /mtshan ma gang lags she na/ gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
123b7(khri brgyad): shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so/ /sgra dang /
124a1(khri brgyad): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i
124a2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags
124a3(khri brgyad): so| |rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig
124a4(khri brgyad): gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus
124a5(khri brgyad): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so/ /sa'i khams ni mtshan
124a6(khri brgyad): ma lags so/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /ma rig pa ni mtshan
124a7(khri brgyad): ma lags so/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye
124b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma lags so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
124b2(khri brgyad): lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
124b3(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
124b4(khri brgyad): dang | gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gcig brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gnyis brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /tha dad pa
124b5(khri brgyad): brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mngon par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gzungs kyi sgo ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad ni mtshan ma lags te/ de ni nyon mongs pa zhes
124b6(khri brgyad): bgyi'o/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar gzung bar bgyi ba zhig lags na ni kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs de bstan pa 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de la dad pa thob
124b7(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur lags so/ /dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang /
125a1(khri brgyad): dpyod pa ste/ de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du'ang ma lags so/ /de ltar de ni mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma
125a2(khri brgyad): mchis pa dang / gzung ba ma mchis par gzung bar bgyi ba lags te/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas/ dad pas rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe
125a3(khri brgyad): ba'i shes pas zhugs te/ de zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung lags
125a4(khri brgyad): so| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa po ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /de'ang ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des
125a5(khri brgyad): shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa
125a6(khri brgyad): lags par phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa lags par gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du
125a7(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang gis rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos de ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/
125b1(khri brgyad): shes pa de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
125b2(khri brgyad): shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma
125b3(khri brgyad): mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi nang dang phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang dang phyi
125b4(khri brgyad): rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
125b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin du shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
125b6(khri brgyad): shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de
125b7(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha' las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te/ de 'dir mos nas dad pas rjes su
126a1(khri brgyad): 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyi ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/
126a2(khri brgyad): de de ltar mos nas des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis par yid la bgyid pa'i slad du chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis lags so/ /chos thams cad gzung
126a3(khri brgyad): du ma mchis pa dang / gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ des gang yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/ chos thams cad la
126a4(khri brgyad): rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis
126a5(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su
126a6(khri brgyad): gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu mchi bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
126a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /de ni smon lam dag yongs su ma rdzogs shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su
126b1(khri brgyad): mya ngan las mi 'da' lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ smon lam de dag smon lam ma lags/ stobs de dag stobs ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa de dag mi 'jigs pa ma lags/ so
126b2(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa ma lags shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang ma
126b3(khri brgyad): lags/ chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang
126b4(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu mchi bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// //
126b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bdun pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/
126b6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci'i phyir shes rab kyi
126b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig na zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi'o/ /de de ltar yongs su rtog cing / de ltar nges par sems pa'i tshe/ gal te chos ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa gang lags
127a1(khri brgyad): pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ de legs par mthong ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar chos thams cad
127a2(khri brgyad): ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos gang dag med
127a3(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po
127a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
127a5(khri brgyad): nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
127a6(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa stong pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs
127a7(khri brgyad): so| |bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
127b1(khri brgyad): pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang med cing mi
127b2(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba
127b3(khri brgyad): dang | 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa
127b4(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
127b5(khri brgyad): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rgyun du zhugs pa'ang
127b6(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa
127b7(khri brgyad): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
128a1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
128a2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gal te sems mi zhum mi 'gong la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams
128a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir byang
128a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs
128a5(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshe dang ldan
128a6(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
128a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
128b1(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/
128b2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang
128b3(khri brgyad): bral ba'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin
128b4(khri brgyad): ji lta bu yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
128b5(khri brgyad): po med pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha' bar gyi rang
128b6(khri brgyad): ni dngos po med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
128b7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa
129a1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
129a2(khri brgyad): ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang
129a3(khri brgyad): bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
129a4(khri brgyad): chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de
129a5(khri brgyad): bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
129a6(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes shing byung ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par
129a7(khri brgyad): byung ba med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba dang nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du
129b1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang / 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i
129b2(khri brgyad): bar ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang / nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
129b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/ /de ji lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa
129b4(khri brgyad): de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
129b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar
129b6(khri brgyad): 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / rgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang /
129b7(khri brgyad): ser sna dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga
130a1(khri brgyad): rgyal dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / chags pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing
130a2(khri brgyad): rtag par rgyun du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye'o/ /de sems can rnams yongs su
130a3(khri brgyad): smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
130a4(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub
130a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi gtang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe
130a6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang
130a7(khri brgyad): nye ba yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la
130b1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te thabs
130b2(khri brgyad): la mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
130b3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba'am/ mi rtag ces
130b4(khri brgyad): bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
130b5(khri brgyad): la rtag ces bgyi ba'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /gal te gzugs la bde zhes
130b6(khri brgyad): bgyi ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bde zhes
130b7(khri brgyad): bgyi ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba'am/ bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
131a1(khri brgyad): la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag ces bgyi ba'am/ bdag ma mchis zhes
131a2(khri brgyad): bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du
131a3(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la dben zhes
131a4(khri brgyad): bgyi ba'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi
131a5(khri brgyad): ba'am| mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
131a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
131a7(khri brgyad): pa lags/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
131b1(khri brgyad): 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
131b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /snyam du sems na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/
131b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang
131b4(khri brgyad): de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no/ /snyam du sems na/ de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags te/ de
131b5(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lags so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir 'di byang chub
131b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
131b7(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
132a1(khri brgyad): pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/ de gzugs mngon bar 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
132a2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ de ni de'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
132a3(khri brgyad): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa byed pa yin no/ /zhes kho bo smra'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
132a4(khri brgyad): pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gzugs
132a5(khri brgyad): la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun
132a6(khri brgyad): tu shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
132a7(khri brgyad): la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
132b1(khri brgyad): kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma
132b2(khri brgyad): yin| bde ba'ang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde
132b3(khri brgyad): ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la
132b4(khri brgyad): gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mig lnga dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan
132b5(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
132b6(khri brgyad): bco brgyad la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas shing kun
132b7(khri brgyad): tu shes te mos na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
133a1(khri brgyad): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su mi thar zhing / sdug bsngal la sogs pa las yongs su mi
133a2(khri brgyad): 'grol lo/ /zhes kho bo smra'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyin thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon sum du bya ba'i skal ba'ang med na/
133a3(khri brgyad): de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems
133a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
133a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas par rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
133a6(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
133a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la
133b1(khri brgyad): mi spyod| gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
133b2(khri brgyad): zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes zhes bya ba dang / sdug
133b3(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan
133b4(khri brgyad): ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
133b5(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs
133b6(khri brgyad): dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dben
133b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par
134a1(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
134a2(khri brgyad): gud na'ang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
134a3(khri brgyad): dang | 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes
134a4(khri brgyad): pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
134a5(khri brgyad): du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon
134a6(khri brgyad): par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
134a7(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
134b1(khri brgyad): rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/
134b2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan
134b3(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
134b4(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te chos 'ga' zhig khas len na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la yin no/ /khas
134b5(khri brgyad): mi len na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khas len kyang len la/ khas mi len kyang mi len na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khas
134b6(khri brgyad): len pa'ang ma yin/ khas mi len pa'ang ma yin na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
134b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ci'i phyir khas mi len/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med cing
135a1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs
135a2(khri brgyad): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang
135a3(khri brgyad): spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos
135a4(khri brgyad): thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
135a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang nye ba yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/
135a6(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba/ phul du bya ba/ tshad med pa/ nges pa/ mi 'phrogs
135a7(khri brgyad): pa| nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na
135b1(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems
135b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ 'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'gyur/ rab 'byor
135b3(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
135b4(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
135b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
135b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
135b7(khri brgyad): po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng+ge rnam par rtse ba
136a1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
136a2(khri brgyad): las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
136a3(khri brgyad): kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la
136a4(khri brgyad): 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
136a5(khri brgyad): dang | dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
136a6(khri brgyad): dang | brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya
136a7(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dwags la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya
136b1(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes
136b2(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
136b3(khri brgyad): rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che spong ba zhes bya
136b4(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
136b5(khri brgyad): sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i
136b6(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa
136b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid
137a1(khri brgyad): yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa
137a2(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang
137a3(khri brgyad): ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
137a4(khri brgyad): rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
137a5(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
137a6(khri brgyad): dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
137a7(khri brgyad): cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs
137b1(khri brgyad): pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting
137b2(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba
137b3(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par
137b4(khri brgyad): gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs
137b5(khri brgyad): pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su
137b6(khri brgyad): gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa gcig pa zhes
137b7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
138a1(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i
138a2(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i
138a3(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal
138a4(khri brgyad): thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge
138a5(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i
138a6(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
138a7(khri brgyad): dang | zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten
138b1(khri brgyad): thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
138b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
138b3(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / gnas la brtan pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang
138b4(khri brgyad): dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam
138b5(khri brgyad): par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
138b6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de
138b7(khri brgyad): dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ gang la bslabs
139a1(khri brgyad): p as byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
139a2(khri brgyad): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo tshad med/ grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces
139a3(khri brgyad): smras so| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
139a4(khri brgyad): bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
139a5(khri brgyad): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin
139a6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung ston par rig par bya ste/ ting
139a7(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go /bdag ni snyoms
139b1(khri brgyad): par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams
139b2(khri brgyad): cad med cing mi 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ de bzhin
139b3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ni med do/ /de ci'i
139b4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhig /byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ byang
139b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te chos
139b6(khri brgyad): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub sems yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang
139b7(khri brgyad): gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis
140a1(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge 'dzin de dag kun
140a2(khri brgyad): tu shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun tu shes pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ji ltar kun tu shes pa med/ rab 'byor
140a3(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos
140a4(khri brgyad): thams cad med pa'i phyir/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu des ting nge 'dzin de dag rnam
140a5(khri brgyad): par mi shes shing / kun tu mi shes so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ des rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes/ rab 'byor gyis
140a6(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de med pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes so/ /de
140a7(khri brgyad): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor/ ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog
140b1(khri brgyad): tu bstan pa khyod kyis bshad pa ni de yin te/ tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang
140b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
140b3(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la bslab par
140b4(khri brgyad): bya'o| |sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la'ang de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
140b5(khri brgyad): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
140b6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob
140b7(khri brgyad): po| |de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
141a1(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag
141a2(khri brgyad): la slob ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de
141a3(khri brgyad): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
141a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
141a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom
141a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag mi dmigs so/ /shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar dag mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam
141a7(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ /shin
141b1(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs
141b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas
141b3(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong
141b4(khri brgyad): ba dang | phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi
141b5(khri brgyad): bar du mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos thams cad kyi skye ba
141b6(khri brgyad): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni
141b7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag la slob pa lags/ bcom
142a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la'ang mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir
142a2(khri brgyad): zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/
142a3(khri brgyad): chos 'di dag ji lta bur mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod la/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir ma
142a4(khri brgyad): rig pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
142a5(khri brgyad): bu| nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ tshor
142a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir khams dang /
142a7(khri brgyad): skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir byang
142b1(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag
142b2(khri brgyad): yod pa ma yin na/ de la byis pa gang dag ma rig pa dang / sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pa ma yin pa la brtags te/ yod pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen
142b3(khri brgyad): nas| 'di lta ste/ rtag pa dang / chad pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas na/ de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/ de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag yongs su
142b4(khri brgyad): brtags pas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen cing / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag
142b5(khri brgyad): la'ang mngon par zhen to/ /de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas na/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba yin no/ /ci zhig
142b6(khri brgyad): mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /khams dang / skye mched dang / rten
142b7(khri brgyad): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas/ de'i
143a1(khri brgyad): phyir byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ /de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams
143a2(khri brgyad): nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs
143a3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de dag ni ma dad pa yin te/ ci zhig la ma dad ce na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya ba ma dad pa nas/
143a4(khri brgyad): byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar dag la ma dad pa yin no/ /de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ ci zhig la mi gnas she na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
143a5(khri brgyad): gnas so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
143a6(khri brgyad): dang | shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mi gnas pa yin te/ de'i
143a7(khri brgyad): phyir byis pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang /
143b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /mig la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
143b2(khri brgyad): dang | yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /
143b3(khri brgyad): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /lta bar
143b4(khri brgyad): gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /byang chub kyi bar dag la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ /shA ri'i
143b5(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad
143b6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes
143b7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du/
144a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges
144a2(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha
144a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas/ mngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
144a4(khri brgyad): dang | tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid
144a5(khri brgyad): dang | rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
144a6(khri brgyad): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar
144a7(khri brgyad): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags
144b1(khri brgyad): mod| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin
144b2(khri brgyad): zhing | rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar
144b3(khri brgyad): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags shing / ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
144b4(khri brgyad): pa| shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes
144b5(khri brgyad): su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
144b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
144b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs/ yang
145a1(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi
145a2(khri brgyad): mthong na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/
145a3(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges
145a4(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung
145a5(khri brgyad): ngo| |shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ mtshan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
145a6(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad
145a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad dri ba de la ji skad bstan
145b1(khri brgyad): par bgyi/ de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
145b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
145b3(khri brgyad): ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
145b4(khri brgyad): kyi bar dag la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom
145b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob
145b6(khri brgyad): cig |rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
145b7(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
146a1(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ mig kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ rna ba dang / sna
146a2(khri brgyad): dang | lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ sgra dang / dri dang /
146a3(khri brgyad): ro dang | reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan
146a4(khri brgyad): la| rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan
146a5(khri brgyad): zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te
146a6(khri brgyad): reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
146a7(khri brgyad): 'das| de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
146b1(khri brgyad): tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ rna ba'i 'dus
146b2(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
146b3(khri brgyad): dang | yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab
146b4(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ byang chub kyi
