146b5(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
146b6(khri brgyad): stsal pa| rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam
146b7(khri brgyad): mam| sgyu ma'ang gzhan la smon pa med pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
147a1(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang
147a2(khri brgyad): gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /
147a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab
147a4(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
147a5(khri brgyad): gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
147a6(khri brgyad): dang | rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom
147a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ mig kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig lags so/ /bcom
147b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu
147b2(khri brgyad): ma nyid kyang yid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma
147b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyang gzugs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan
147b4(khri brgyad): 'das| chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma
147b5(khri brgyad): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang
147b6(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan
147b7(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang
148a1(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma
148a2(khri brgyad): nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi
148a3(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
148a4(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma
148a5(khri brgyad): lags| bde ba'ang ma lags pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal
148a6(khri brgyad): ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/
148a7(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
148b1(khri brgyad): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
148b2(khri brgyad): tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
148b3(khri brgyad): gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
148b4(khri brgyad): gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ byang
148b5(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang
148b6(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa
148b7(khri brgyad): nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom
149a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang
149a2(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang smon pa ma mchis
149a3(khri brgyad): pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs
149a4(khri brgyad): pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ sangs
149a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma
149a6(khri brgyad): nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags
149a7(khri brgyad): te| bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
149b1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
149b2(khri brgyad): de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba'am/ 'gag pa yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol
149b3(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
149b4(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar
149b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// //
149b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga
149b7(khri brgyad): po 'di dag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ming gi brdas tha snyad du gdags su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis
150a1(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems ming gi brdas tha snyad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i
150a2(khri brgyad): phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba dag dmigs su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
150a3(khri brgyad): de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems gang la ming dang mtshan ma med pa dang / brda med pa dang / gdags
150a4(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las
150a5(khri brgyad): med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de/
150a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
150a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
150b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
150b2(khri brgyad): zhing | rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
150b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la de ltar slob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag
150b4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar phung po lnga po gang dag lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi pa
150b5(khri brgyad): lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam
150b6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
150b7(khri brgyad): 'das| de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis
151a1(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i
151a2(khri brgyad): phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
151a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma
151a4(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag ca lta bu'i phung po
151a5(khri brgyad): lnga po dag dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab
151a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni
151a7(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar brag ca ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang
151b1(khri brgyad): bzhin/ chu zla'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgyu ma'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa'ang dngos
151b2(khri brgyad): po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ gzugs brnyan yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad
151b3(khri brgyad): du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags te/
151b4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags shing / de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la/ de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis shing / dngos
151b5(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
151b6(khri brgyad): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur lags
151b7(khri brgyad): grang | bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'ang yin la/
152a1(khri brgyad): thabs la'ang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu'ang ma song na/ skrag cing dngang la/ dngang bar yang 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
152a2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag /mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi
152a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
152a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de'ang mi dmigs so/ /rnam la
152a5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/
152a6(khri brgyad): de'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab
152a7(khri brgyad): 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
152b1(khri brgyad): dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon
152b2(khri brgyad): par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang /
152b3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med
152b4(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang
152b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
152b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor
152b7(khri brgyad): rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
153a1(khri brgyad): mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
153a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa
153a3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
153a4(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
153a5(khri brgyad): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
153a6(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
153a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
153b1(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
153b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so//
153b3(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/
153b4(khri brgyad): de'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la
153b5(khri brgyad): smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/
153b6(khri brgyad): de'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
153b7(khri brgyad): shes pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang /
154a1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems
154a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar so sor
154a3(khri brgyad): rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /tshor
154a4(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /gzugs sdug
154a5(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
154a6(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug
154a7(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
154b1(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan bar bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
154b2(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag /mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
154b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
154b4(khri brgyad): gyis byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces
154b5(khri brgyad): bya bar yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya
154b6(khri brgyad): bar yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /
154b7(khri brgyad): gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
155a1(khri brgyad): gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
155a2(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa
155a3(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid
155a4(khri brgyad): la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/
155a5(khri brgyad): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag /mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems
155a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos gang dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam
155a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing
155b1(khri brgyad): bzod la 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag/ mi dngang zhing dngang
155b2(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
155b3(khri brgyad): bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /
155b4(khri brgyad): gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
155b5(khri brgyad): ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya
155b6(khri brgyad): ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du
155b7(khri brgyad): bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog cing / de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi
156a1(khri brgyad): gtong zhing / brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub
156a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag / mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
156a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / de las gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar du gcod par byed pa dag
156a4(khri brgyad): gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
156a5(khri brgyad): po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mi skrag / mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
156a6(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong
156a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa
156b1(khri brgyad): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig go /rna ba dang /
156b2(khri brgyad): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa
156b3(khri brgyad): ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos
156b4(khri brgyad): rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes
156b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam
156b6(khri brgyad): par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid
156b7(khri brgyad): kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid
157a1(khri brgyad): kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /
157a2(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg
157a3(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
157a4(khri brgyad): gyis tshor pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
157a5(khri brgyad): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
157a6(khri brgyad): ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang
157a7(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar
157b1(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
157b2(khri brgyad): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam gyi stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa ma yin gyi/ lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lam
157b3(khri brgyad): mo| |stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
157b4(khri brgyad): rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/
157b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/ thabs de dang ldan na byang chub sems
157b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag / mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i bshes
157b7(khri brgyad): gnyen gang dag gis yongs su zin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag /mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
158a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
158a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
158a3(khri brgyad): de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
158a4(khri brgyad): dang | 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams
158a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
158a6(khri brgyad): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs
158a7(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon
158b1(khri brgyad): par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
158b2(khri brgyad): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes
158b3(khri brgyad): bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba
158b4(khri brgyad): dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
158b5(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
158b6(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med
158b7(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes
159a1(khri brgyad): bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyon
159a2(khri brgyad): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes
159a3(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
159a4(khri brgyad): ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
159a5(khri brgyad): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab
159a6(khri brgyad): 'byor| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
159a7(khri brgyad): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben
159b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
159b2(khri brgyad): kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi
159b3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs
159b4(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab
159b5(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
159b6(khri brgyad): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos
159b7(khri brgyad): ston| sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par
160a1(khri brgyad): 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams
160a2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg
160a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / de bzhin du sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
160a4(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan
160a5(khri brgyad): ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /
160a6(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni byang
160a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
160b1(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams
160b2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
160b3(khri brgyad): po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams
160b4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
160b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston
160b6(khri brgyad): te| de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / byang chub sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa
160b7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
161a1(khri brgyad): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te/ de dag gis yongs su zin pa ni bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag /mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor
161a2(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ sdig
161a3(khri brgyad): pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar
161a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam
161a5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems
161a6(khri brgyad): su byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
161a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
161b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
161b2(khri brgyad): byed| gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/
161b3(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi
161b4(khri brgyad): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang
161b5(khri brgyad): dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig
161b6(khri brgyad): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i
161b7(khri brgyad): bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang
162a1(khri brgyad): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
162a2(khri brgyad): stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang /
162a3(khri brgyad): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la'ang bya'o| /de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
162a4(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
162a5(khri brgyad): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
162a6(khri brgyad): byed| dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de
162a7(khri brgyad): bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po
162b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor/
162b2(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral
162b3(khri brgyad): bas| dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom zhing / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /
162b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i
162b5(khri brgyad): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
162b6(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom zhing / de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
162b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ de ltar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang
163a1(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i
163a2(khri brgyad): sug par mchis te/ sdig pa'i grogs po des yongs su zin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/
163a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
163a4(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi/ 'di la bslab par mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni snyan dngags mkhan gyi rang bzo yin pas
163a5(khri brgyad): 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/ /gzung bar mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bklag par mi bya'o/ /bsgom par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du
163a6(khri brgyad): yid la mi bya'o/ /gzhan dag la'ang bstan par mi bya'o/ /zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
163a7(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor/
163b1(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
163b2(khri brgyad): grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ shes rab
163b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol
163b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed do/ /zhes
163b5(khri brgyad): de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing / bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi brjod pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par
163b6(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
163b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde
164a1(khri brgyad): dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed/ rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag
164a2(khri brgyad): par rab tu ston par byed cing / bdud kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub
164a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/
164a4(khri brgyad): bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod la ni byang chub kyi
164a5(khri brgyad): sems cung zad kyang med do/ /khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin no/ /khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang
164a6(khri brgyad): mi nus so/ /zhes zer ro/ /zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi brjod/ mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
164a7(khri brgyad): sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du
164b1(khri brgyad): 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag
164b2(khri brgyad): dang bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i
164b3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi
164b4(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te
164b5(khri brgyad): reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus
164b6(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag
164b7(khri brgyad): dang bdag gis stong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
165a1(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni bdag
165a2(khri brgyad): dang bdag gis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
165a3(khri brgyad): lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
165a4(khri brgyad): rgyas pas ci zhig bya/ zhes zer ro/ /zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod/ mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
165a5(khri brgyad): sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du
165a6(khri brgyad): 'ongs nas 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/
165a7(khri brgyad): 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang
165b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do/ /zhes zer ro/ /zhes bdud
165b2(khri brgyad): kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod/ mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang
165b3(khri brgyad): bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa
165b4(khri brgyad): dag zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag la 'doms te/ rjes su ston par byed do/ /zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa
165b5(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang /
165b6(khri brgyad): slob dpon gyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed la/ rnam pa thams cad
165b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang 'bral bar byed cing / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sbyor bar byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag
166a1(khri brgyad): la'ang sbyor bar byed/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la'ang sbyor bar byed cing / 'di skad du/ rigs
166a2(khri brgyad): kyi bu khyod kyis chos 'di dag bsgoms la nyan thos kyi sa mngon sum du gyis shig / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya/ zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi
166a3(khri brgyad): las de lta bu de dag mi brjod/ mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
166a4(khri brgyad): gzhan yang bdud sdig can pha dang / ma'i cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gi
166a5(khri brgyad): don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lag pa bcad pa dang / rkang pa bcad pa dang / mgo bcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur
166a6(khri brgyad): zhing | bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod
166a7(khri brgyad): pa de la brtson par gyis shig / gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig /ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi
166b1(khri brgyad): brjod| mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge
166b2(khri brgyad): slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston/ de bzhin du mig sdug
166b3(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
166b4(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med
166b5(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar
166b6(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba
166b7(khri brgyad): dang | stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
167a1(khri brgyad): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug
167a2(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
167a3(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag
167a4(khri brgyad): med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben
167a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod/ mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig
167a6(khri brgyad): pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i
167b1(khri brgyad): don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i
167b2(khri brgyad): don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub kyang skye ba med sems dpa' yang skye ba med de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub dang / sems dpa' la skye ba dang
167b3(khri brgyad): yod pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub la'ang gzhi med/ sems dpa' la'ang gzhi med de/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi
167b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i don to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med
167b5(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rmi lam la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi
167b6(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de
167b7(khri brgyad): gshegs pas sprul pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper
168a1(khri brgyad): na| de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor
168a2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas
168a3(khri brgyad): nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs
168a4(khri brgyad): so| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs
168a5(khri brgyad): so| |rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi
168a6(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la mig gi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med
168a7(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
168b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
168b2(khri brgyad): bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
168b3(khri brgyad): dang | yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
168b4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med
168b5(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang
168b6(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs
168b7(khri brgyad): so| |rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi
169a1(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs
169a2(khri brgyad): so| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
169a3(khri brgyad): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
169a4(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
169a5(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gzugs kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
169a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
169a7(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin
169b1(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
169b2(khri brgyad): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mig gi gzhi med do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med do/ /
169b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
169b4(khri brgyad): lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nang stong pa nyid kyi gzhi med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
169b5(khri brgyad): gyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med
169b6(khri brgyad): do| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do/ /sangs
169b7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
170a1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/ /
170a2(khri brgyad): 'dus byas kyi khams la'ang 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
170a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skye ba med pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
170a4(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
170a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub
170a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skye ba
170a7(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan
170b1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ skye ba med pa la gzugs kyi gzhi med do/ /skye ba med pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
170b2(khri brgyad): gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzugs kyi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
170b3(khri brgyad): byang ba med pa'i bar la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin du skye ba med pa la khams rnams dang / skye mched
170b4(khri brgyad): rnams kyi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do/ /skye ba med pa la byang chub
170b5(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs
170b6(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
170b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs la skye ba med pa dang /
171a1(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
171a2(khri brgyad): par byang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
171a3(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
