171a6(khri brgyad): do| |rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab
171a7(khri brgyad): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de
171b1(khri brgyad): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don med do/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched
171b2(khri brgyad): dang | rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
171b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
171b4(khri brgyad): gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab
171b5(khri brgyad): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang /
171b6(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/
171b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
172a1(khri brgyad): bdag med pa'i phyir/ bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/ /shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ shes pa po dang / mthong ba
172a2(khri brgyad): po'i bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
172a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba la mun pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub
172a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sreg pa'i
172a5(khri brgyad): bskal pa la 'du byed thams cad kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
172a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la
172a7(khri brgyad): 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
172b1(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng pa'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab la
172b2(khri brgyad): 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
172b3(khri brgyad): mthong ba la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
172b4(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
172b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang /
172b6(khri brgyad): nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
172b7(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'tha' bral gyi lha rnams dang /
173a1(khri brgyad): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi
173a2(khri brgyad): bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi 'od la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
173a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
173a4(khri brgyad): dang | byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa
173a5(khri brgyad): med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab
173a6(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
173a7(khri brgyad): thams cad ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mchis pa nyid la ni ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa'
173b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / mi
173b2(khri brgyad): dge ba dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang /
173b3(khri brgyad): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag go /rab 'byor/ de dag ni chos thams cad ces
173b4(khri brgyad): bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par
173b5(khri brgyad): bya ba'ang de dag yin no/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po dgu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig
173b6(khri brgyad): rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni phar 'dzin pa dang / mar 'dzin pa dang /
173b7(khri brgyad): dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las
174a1(khri brgyad): byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dge ba
174a2(khri brgyad): bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /
174a3(khri brgyad): rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes
174a4(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten
174a5(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran
174a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag
174a7(khri brgyad): ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
174b1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang /
174b2(khri brgyad): ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam
174b3(khri brgyad): par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
174b4(khri brgyad): 'das| lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan
174b5(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung pa chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /
174b6(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan
174b7(khri brgyad): pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
175a1(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang
175a2(khri brgyad): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga
175a3(khri brgyad): dang | 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
175a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni/
175a5(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
175a6(khri brgyad): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa
175a7(khri brgyad): med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa
175b1(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang /
175b2(khri brgyad): shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /
175b3(khri brgyad): nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de
175b4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi
175b5(khri brgyad): byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam
175b6(khri brgyad): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam
175b7(khri brgyad): par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci'ang med do/ /snyam nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs
176a1(khri brgyad): te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med
176a2(khri brgyad): 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag
176a3(khri brgyad): par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
176a4(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/
176a5(khri brgyad): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi
176a6(khri brgyad): rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de
176a7(khri brgyad): dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa
176b1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o/ /zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba'ang spangs/ snga nas sdug
176b2(khri brgyad): bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam
176b3(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur
176b4(khri brgyad): cing | sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam
176b5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs
176b6(khri brgyad): te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do/ /snyam nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs
176b7(khri brgyad): te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa
177a1(khri brgyad): dang | de rnam pa thams cad du/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa
177a2(khri brgyad): bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin
177a3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig
177a4(khri brgyad): rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco
177a5(khri brgyad): brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o//
177a6(khri brgyad): de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
177a7(khri brgyad): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
177b1(khri brgyad): rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/
177b2(khri brgyad): 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gang dag 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
177b3(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang
177b4(khri brgyad): zhe na/ chos gang dag la skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur bar mi snang ba dag ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin
177b5(khri brgyad): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
177b6(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
177b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang
178a1(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar
178a2(khri brgyad): pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
178a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos
178a4(khri brgyad): rnams la chags pa med pa dang / yod pa ma yin par bslab par bya'o/ /chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
178a5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems
178a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul
178a7(khri brgyad): byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
178b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po ni gang lags/ sems can gyi ris phal po che ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
178b2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong
178b3(khri brgyad): ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub
178b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag go / rab 'byor/ de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
178b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni/ de'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi tshogs chen
178b6(khri brgyad): po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom
178b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can
179a1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams
179a2(khri brgyad): cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems cad thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can thams cad yongs su
179a3(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis rtogs
179a4(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis thams cad kyi rjes su song
179a5(khri brgyad): ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par bya'o/ /chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med
179a6(khri brgyad): pa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed
179a7(khri brgyad): pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur
179b1(khri brgyad): te| de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang /
179b2(khri brgyad): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa de dag gi don du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
179b3(khri brgyad): de nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can
179b4(khri brgyad): d e dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcig gi don du'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
179b5(khri brgyad): phrag 'bum phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /zhes thabs de lta bus sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya
179b6(khri brgyad): n gan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams
179b7(khri brgyad): su myong bar bya'o/ /phyis 'dod pa dag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsags la/ bla na med pa yang
180a1(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub
180a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /
180a3(khri brgyad): sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang gis sems can
180a4(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyun du bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ gang
180a5(khri brgyad): sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems
180a6(khri brgyad): mi bskyed/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi bskyed pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/ des
180a7(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed cing / des rlom sems su'ang mi byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul
180b1(khri brgyad): pa'i sems su bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni 'di yin te/ gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed
180b2(khri brgyad): pas rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
180b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde bar bya
180b4(khri brgyad): ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang
180b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
180b6(khri brgyad): la de ltar spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
180b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos kun tu dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/
181a1(khri brgyad): de la chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ de ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos la 'dod
181a2(khri brgyad): cing mos pa ste/ de ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la
181a3(khri brgyad): chos la kun tu dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la yon tan dang / phan yon du lta ba ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor
181a4(khri brgyad): la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
181a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang
181a6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la
181a7(khri brgyad): gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang
181b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
181b2(khri brgyad): rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/ sems
181b3(khri brgyad): can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
181b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing /
181b5(khri brgyad): gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
181b6(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen
181b7(khri brgyad): po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
182a1(khri brgyad): pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
182a2(khri brgyad): ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom
182a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par gyis shig /shA ri'i bus gsol
182a4(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu
182a5(khri brgyad): lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor
182a6(khri brgyad): ba po dang / tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par
182a7(khri brgyad): lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / bden par lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta
182b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar
182b2(khri brgyad): lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor
182b3(khri brgyad): lo skor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba spang ba'i slad du/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/ don des na byang chub sems
182b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ci'i phyir na
182b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba
182b6(khri brgyad): yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
182b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
183a1(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs
183a2(khri brgyad): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
183a3(khri brgyad): 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi
183a4(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
183a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs par gyis shig /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
183a6(khri brgyad): 'das/ byang chub kyi sems zag pa med pa'i sems/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang
183a7(khri brgyad): thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas/ don des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de
183b1(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
183b2(khri brgyad): z ag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs
183b3(khri brgyad): su mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
183b4(khri brgyad): po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
183b5(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang la'ang skye ba'am/ 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'grib pa dang / 'phel
183b6(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
183b7(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan
184a1(khri brgyad): thos kyi sems med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/
184a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong
184a3(khri brgyad): ma yin pa'i sems so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su gtogs pa ma
184a4(khri brgyad): yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la'ang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
184a5(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /
184a6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs
184a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du'ang chags pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ khyod
184b1(khri brgyad): kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de'ang zag pa med cing / khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /zhes smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byis pa so so'i
184b2(khri brgyad): skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas
184b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
184b4(khri brgyad): bu/ de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ tshor
184b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras
184b6(khri brgyad): pa| tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
184b7(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma
185a1(khri brgyad): yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis
185a2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs
185a3(khri brgyad): kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs
185a4(khri brgyad): pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
185a5(khri brgyad): bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis
185a6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ khyod kyis gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir/
185a7(khri brgyad): sems de la'ang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med dam/ tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa
185b1(khri brgyad): med dam/ 'du shes med pa'ang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa'ang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/ rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes
185b2(khri brgyad): pa la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
185b3(khri brgyad): med pa'ang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med
185b4(khri brgyad): dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
185b5(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
185b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang /
185b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang
186a1(khri brgyad): chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad
186a2(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /shes rab
186a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ lta ba spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang
186a4(khri brgyad): pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan
186a5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ sems can de
186a6(khri brgyad): ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems
186a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ji
186b1(khri brgyad): tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
186b2(khri brgyad): chen po ni nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi
186b3(khri brgyad): don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ tshul khrims srung ba ma yin
186b4(khri brgyad): gyi| sems can thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo / /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
186b5(khri brgyad): te| bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa bsgom par byed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du
186b6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo//
186b7(khri brgyad): nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol
187a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams bskyed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab bsgom pa
187a2(khri brgyad): ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab bsgom par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di
187a3(khri brgyad): snyed cig ni/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi
187a4(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o/ /zhes sems can yongs su dpag
187a5(khri brgyad): pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon no/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i
187a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
187a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
187b1(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
187b2(khri brgyad): bo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
187b3(khri brgyad): gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ tshe dang ldan
187b4(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang
187b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / nyan thos dang /
187b6(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
187b7(khri brgyad): go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de
188a1(khri brgyad): dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod
188a2(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
188a3(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson

188a7(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de gcig bu la dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye
188b1(khri brgyad): par gnas shing / de sbyin pa po'ang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ len pa po'ang mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
188b2(khri brgyad): la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
188b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
188b4(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

188b6(khri brgyad): m ong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin
188b7(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs
189a1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sa la'ang 'dod pa med na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi

189a5(khri brgyad): s ems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus mi nyams mi 'gong ba

189b1(khri brgyad): gis gnas pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / sems bskyed pa de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med
189b2(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

189b7(khri brgyad): chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs
190a1(khri brgyad): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i
190a2(khri brgyad): rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
190a3(khri brgyad): po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha

190a6(khri brgyad): gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang
190a7(khri brgyad): thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
190b1(khri brgyad): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos
190b2(khri brgyad): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba dag gis/ sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems
190b3(khri brgyad): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

190b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing / dge
190b7(khri brgyad): pa'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
191a1(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
191a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
191a3(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
191a4(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
191a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
191a6(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing / chos thams cad la sgyu
191a7(khri brgyad): mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog ste/ de'ang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
191b1(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang
191b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
191b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
191b4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
191b5(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
191b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de
191b7(khri brgyad): bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing / de
192a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du
192a2(khri brgyad): shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
192a3(khri brgyad): dag gis gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub
192a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
192a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
192a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ de dag
192a7(khri brgyad): gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ ro myang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs
192b1(khri brgyad): la| de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
192b2(khri brgyad): par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
192b3(khri brgyad): 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed
192b4(khri brgyad): de| de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na byang
192b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa la phyogs
192b6(khri brgyad): bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig ces bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen
192b7(khri brgyad): po bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing bsngags pa'ang gsung la/
193a1(khri brgyad): ming yang yongs su sgrogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra brjod pa'ang mdzad la/ dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa'ang mdzad do/ /shA ri'i bus
193a2(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
193a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /
193a4(khri brgyad): de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa
193a5(khri brgyad): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rdzogs par byas
193a6(khri brgyad): te gnas pa dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa shin tu bsgoms
193a7(khri brgyad): pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga'
193b1(khri brgyad): ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu
193b2(khri brgyad): bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha'
193b3(khri brgyad): yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de ni/
193b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems
193b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad
193b6(khri brgyad): med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa
193b7(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
194a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
194a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
194a3(khri brgyad): po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis
194a4(khri brgyad): gnas shing / de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la ldang ba na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags
194a5(khri brgyad): dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
194a6(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
194a7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag
194b1(khri brgyad): par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur
194b2(khri brgyad): pa| tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi
194b3(khri brgyad): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang
194b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/
194b5(khri brgyad): mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs
194b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re khyab par byas nas gnas par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa'
194b7(khri brgyad): s ems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i phyir bsam
195a1(khri brgyad): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la'ang brjod cing ston te rab tu 'chad la/ rnam
195a2(khri brgyad): par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing / de dag gi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / nges par 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195a3(khri brgyad): chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar
195a4(khri brgyad): dag gnon cing bsgom ste/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la'ang gnas la/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan
195a5(khri brgyad): pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/ /byang chub sems
195a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par
195a7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /snyam nas yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang
195b1(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
195b2(khri brgyad): r nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
195b3(khri brgyad): su bsngo zhing / brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
195b4(khri brgyad): po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la
195b5(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang
195b6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
195b7(khri brgyad): po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi
196a1(khri brgyad): pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang /
196a2(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa
196a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa
196a4(khri brgyad): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang
196a5(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom
196a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
196a7(khri brgyad): bu| de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
196b1(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
196b2(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab bo/ /zhes mngon par gzhol bar byed pa dang / snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams la
196b3(khri brgyad): snying rje ba dang / snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o/ /zhes sems can
196b4(khri brgyad): rnams la nges par gzhol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub
196b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa
196b6(khri brgyad): rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
196b7(khri brgyad): mi bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
197a1(khri brgyad): chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sa'am/
197a2(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/ sa gnyis po de dag tu 'dod par mi byed kyi/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing / 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
197a3(khri brgyad): tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
197a4(khri brgyad): pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la
197a5(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
197a6(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa de dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la/ de dag gi ro myang bar
197a7(khri brgyad): yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems
197b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
197b2(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed la/ de'ang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa
197b3(khri brgyad): dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug
197b4(khri brgyad): pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
197b5(khri brgyad): po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
197b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes
197b7(khri brgyad): pa'o| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
198a1(khri brgyad): dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang chos thams
198a2(khri brgyad): cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par bzhag par shes pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de
198a3(khri brgyad): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
198a4(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces
198a5(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces
198a6(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
198a7(khri brgyad): chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
198b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /da ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa'ang mi 'jug la/
198b2(khri brgyad): de dus gsum po dag mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
198b3(khri brgyad): yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
198b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'dod pa'i khams dang /
198b5(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
198b6(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang
198b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa
199a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la'ang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
199a2(khri brgyad): rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes pa'ang ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa'ang ma yin
199a3(khri brgyad): pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
199a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan
199a5(khri brgyad): pa gang po/ ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems
199a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub
199a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa po'ang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
199b1(khri brgyad): gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
199b2(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
199b3(khri brgyad): dag par gnas la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa'ang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na
199b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
199b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid bsgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs
199b6(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du
199b7(khri brgyad): bsgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes
200a1(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa
200a2(khri brgyad): dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
200a3(khri brgyad): pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
200a4(khri brgyad): gyis sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
200a5(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na byang
200a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
200a7(khri brgyad): can gyi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni tha snyad tsam du zad par shes so/ /gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs
200b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba de'ang ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de
200b2(khri brgyad): ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ mig ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ yid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam
200b3(khri brgyad): du zad do/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
200b4(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin no/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming
200b5(khri brgyad): tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos dmigs su med
200b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
200b7(khri brgyad): dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba
201a1(khri brgyad): de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /zhes bya bar shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
201a2(khri brgyad): dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sems
201a3(khri brgyad): dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /
201a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gang la gang 'os pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du byed do/ /bla mar
201a5(khri brgyad): byed do/ /ri mor byed do/ /mchod pa byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de theg pa chen po de la zhon
201a6(khri brgyad): te| sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/ de la sangs
201a7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas te/ lus ci lta bus sems can rnams kyi don byed nus
201b1(khri brgyad): pa de lta bu'i lus bsam bzhin du yongs su 'dzin to/ /de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par gyur gyi bar du nam yang theg pa de dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
201b2(khri brgyad): des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
201b3(khri brgyad): lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /de bla na med pa yang
201b4(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
201b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das dag kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig
201b6(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po la zhon nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ /zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs
201b7(khri brgyad): brjod pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
202a1(khri brgyad): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na
202a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ /
202a3(khri brgyad): zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs brjod pa mdzad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes
202a4(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad
202a5(khri brgyad): stong pa/ bam po bcu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ go cha chen po bgos/ go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi
202a6(khri brgyad): na| bcom ldan 'das/ ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos/ zhes bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
