202a7(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
202b1(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha
202b2(khri brgyad): bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i
202b3(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
202b4(khri brgyad): go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed cing g.yo bar
202b5(khri brgyad): yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems
202b6(khri brgyad): can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag
202b7(khri brgyad): 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod cing dbyangs sgrog go /de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba thob ste/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba
203a1(khri brgyad): de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te mthong zhing mnyes par byar yod pa dang /
203a2(khri brgyad): lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/ /de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas sems can rnams byung nas/ gang dang gang na
203a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye'o/ /de bzhin du shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang
203a4(khri brgyad): dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par byed cing / rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad
203a5(khri brgyad): kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar
203a6(khri brgyad): rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod cing
203a7(khri brgyad): dbyangs sgrog go / de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas bde ba dang / yid bde ba thob ste/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de
203b1(khri brgyad): dag nas byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ mthong zhing / bsnyen bkur byar yod pa dang / lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de
203b2(khri brgyad): dang der skye'o/ /mir skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mnyes par byed do/ /de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams nas sems can
203b3(khri brgyad): de dag shi 'phos te/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
203b4(khri brgyad): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du
203b5(khri brgyad): sems can dmyal ba dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten mngon par sprul la/ des mngon par sprul nas/ sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra
203b6(khri brgyad): dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra bsgrags te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba de dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
203b7(khri brgyad): rje'i 'jig rten nas byung bar gyur na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / dud 'gro'i
204a1(khri brgyad): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag nas phyung ba yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
204a2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su sems can rnams ngan
204a3(khri brgyad): 'gro gsum po dag las yongs su bkrol yang sems can 'ga' yang yongs su bkrol bar gyur pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams
204a4(khri brgyad): kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
204a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ go cha chen po bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul
204a6(khri brgyad): te| stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul pa byed do/ /des 'khor los sgyur ba'i
204a7(khri brgyad): bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed do/ /de bzhin du btung ba dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / me tog dang / bdug pa
204b1(khri brgyad): dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / yo byad dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / bgo ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / rtsi sman dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / byu ru dang / dung
204b2(khri brgyad): dang / man shal dang / mu tig dang / rgyan dag dang / yo byad gang yang rung ba dag sbyin par byed do/ /des zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag byin nas sems
204b3(khri brgyad): can de dag la/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
204b4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi
204b5(khri brgyad): slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yang
204b6(khri brgyad): rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
204b7(khri brgyad): 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon
205a1(khri brgyad): par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa med do/ de ci'i
205a2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
205a3(khri brgyad): bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin
205a4(khri brgyad): cing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed/ bsam gtan
205a5(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la 'god par byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag la 'god par byed/ sangs
205a6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god par byed cing / sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
205a7(khri brgyad): bar du nam yang chos bstan pa de dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi
205b1(khri brgyad): mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag
205b2(khri brgyad): la bkod na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi
205b3(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
205b4(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos
205b5(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod
205b6(khri brgyad): pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
205b7(khri brgyad): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i
206a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
206a2(khri brgyad): gnas te/ sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god ce na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin
206a3(khri brgyad): chad 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos te/ gal te sems can thams cad kyis bdag la dbyig pa dang / bong ba dang / khu tshur dang / lag cha dang / mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag
206a4(khri brgyad): gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' yang bskyed par mi bya'o/ /snyam zhing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de lta bu la 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan
206a5(khri brgyad): nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
206a6(khri brgyad): pa la sbyar zhing bkod na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod
206a7(khri brgyad): snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
206b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i
206b2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
206b3(khri brgyad): bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha
206b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad
206b5(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
206b6(khri brgyad): gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de
206b7(khri brgyad): 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs
207a1(khri brgyad): chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de bkod na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du
207a2(khri brgyad): sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam mam/
207a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
207a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyi
207a5(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin
207a6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
207a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed
207b1(khri brgyad): do| / rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang
207b2(khri brgyad): dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la'ang
207b3(khri brgyad): rnam par g.yeng ba'am/ rnam par g.yeng ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong nge / /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
207b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /yang dag par 'dzin
207b5(khri brgyad): du bcug pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
207b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon
207b7(khri brgyad): par sprul nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma
208a1(khri brgyad): des sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis
208a2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
208a3(khri brgyad): p os sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
208a4(khri brgyad): la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems
208a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos ba zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
208a6(khri brgyad): te/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
208a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/
208b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos gang la'ang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs
208b2(khri brgyad): pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ tshu rol lam/ pha rol mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa
208b3(khri brgyad): yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma
208b4(khri brgyad): mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
208b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang shes rab
208b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
208b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209a1(khri brgyad): la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab
209a2(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
209a3(khri brgyad): go cha chen po bgos pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du/ 'jig
209a4(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /de bzhin
209a5(khri brgyad): du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
209a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed la/ 'di
209a7(khri brgyad): lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
209b1(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub
209b2(khri brgyad): byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa
209b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do/ /de bzhin
209b4(khri brgyad): du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
209b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag bar 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god la/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
209b6(khri brgyad): ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol
209b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i
210a1(khri brgyad): mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor
210a2(khri brgyad): 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa
210a3(khri brgyad): yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang
210a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sems can de dag thams cad pha
210a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos
210a6(khri brgyad): rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang
210a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas shing / sems bskyed pa gzhan
210b1(khri brgyad): gyi skabs mi 'byed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed
210b2(khri brgyad): cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
210b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig
210b4(khri brgyad): ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can
210b5(khri brgyad): 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi
210b6(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni
210b7(khri brgyad): dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems kyi/ gzhan du na de 'di snyam
211a1(khri brgyad): du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
211a2(khri brgyad): cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
211a3(khri brgyad): pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom
211a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam
211a5(khri brgyad): du sems so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i
211a6(khri brgyad): tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar
211a7(khri brgyad): bzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la dgod par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs
211b1(khri brgyad): pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la dgod par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed
211b2(khri brgyad): na| rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
211b3(khri brgyad): bar la bkod pa yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub
211b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bar
211b5(khri brgyad): la dgod par sems bskyed kyang sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir yang sems bskyed pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin
211b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
211b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
212a1(khri brgyad): chen po de ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi ba lags pa snyam bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gzugs
212a2(khri brgyad): ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / mig ni mig gis stong / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
212a3(khri brgyad): yid ni yid kyis stong / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos ni chos kyis stong / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong /
212a4(khri brgyad): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba dang / sna dang /
212a5(khri brgyad): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / rna ba
212a6(khri brgyad): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
212a7(khri brgyad): pas stong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyis stong / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
212b1(khri brgyad): kyi bar ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
212b2(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyis stong la/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong / go cha chen po'ang go cha
212b3(khri brgyad): chen pos stong pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi'o/ /de skad
212b4(khri brgyad): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de ci'i
212b5(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma byas la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi
212b6(khri brgyad): don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du
212b7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma bgyis shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po 'tshal ba'i
213a1(khri brgyad): sems can de dag kyang ma bgyis/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byed pa po mi
213a2(khri brgyad): dmigs pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen
213a3(khri brgyad): po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gzugs ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon
213a4(khri brgyad): par 'du mi byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi
213a5(khri brgyad): byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ gzugs ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /
213a6(khri brgyad): reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
213a7(khri brgyad): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
213b1(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
213b2(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ bdag ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed/ sems
213b3(khri brgyad): can dang / srog dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir
213b4(khri brgyad): ro| |rab 'byor/ rmi lam ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /sgyu ma dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /
213b5(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de
213b6(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
213b7(khri brgyad): de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
214a1(khri brgyad): de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
214a2(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de
214a3(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
214a4(khri brgyad): dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /
214a5(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /thams
214a6(khri brgyad): cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig /mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med
214a7(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma byas la/ byang chub sems dpa'
214b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ ma bshig /mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na
214b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal
214b3(khri brgyad): ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma
214b4(khri brgyad): grol ba lags so/ /byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba zhes smra'am/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
214b5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba zhes smra'am/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan
214b6(khri brgyad): pa gang po/ gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
214b7(khri brgyad): gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tsha dang ldan pa gang
215a1(khri brgyad): po| rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol pa'o/ /rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rmi lam lta bu'i rnam
215a2(khri brgyad): par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol pa'o/ /de bzhin du brag ca lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i
215a3(khri brgyad): gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang
215a4(khri brgyad): ldan pa gang po/ 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa
215a5(khri brgyad): ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
215a6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/
215a7(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / da ltar byung pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzugs
215b1(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i phyir/ gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma
215b2(khri brgyad): grol ba'o/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
215b3(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzugs dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa
215b4(khri brgyad): med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon
215b5(khri brgyad): mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid med pa'i phyir gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du tshor
215b6(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dge ba'am/ mi dge ba nas rnam par byang ba'i bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa nyid
215b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir ma bcings
216a1(khri brgyad): ma grol ba'o/ /de bzhin du dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol
216a2(khri brgyad): ba'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
216a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ nang
216a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ byang chub
216a5(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dang /
216a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du'ang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang
216a7(khri brgyad): ldan pa gang po/ byang chub kyang ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ med pa'i phyir ma
216b1(khri brgyad): bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /
216b2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
216b3(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ med pa dang dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de ltar na byang chub
216b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar dag kyang ma bcings
216b5(khri brgyad): ma grol ba'o/ /sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag dag par bya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ma
216b6(khri brgyad): bcings ma grol ba'o/ /bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /thos par 'gyur ba'i chos kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /sangs
216b7(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mig lnga dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba
217a1(khri brgyad): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed par 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /
217a2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /theg pa gsum po dag gis
217a3(khri brgyad): sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ med pa dang / dben pa dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
217a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis chos thams cad mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa
217a5(khri brgyad): las/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
217a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thig pa chen po ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par
217a7(khri brgyad): zhugs par rig par bgyi/ theg pa de ni gang la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ theg pa de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ theg pa des ni su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba
217b1(khri brgyad): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ khyod gang 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/
217b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags/ zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
217b3(khri brgyad): chen po yin te/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
217b4(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
217b5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis/ 'di lta ste/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnams sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams
217b6(khri brgyad): cad dang thun mong du byas nas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
217b7(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom
218a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
218a2(khri brgyad): pa dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la/ sems can gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag
218a3(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa yin no/ /rab 'byor
218a4(khri brgyad): gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
218a5(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis/ bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la/
218a6(khri brgyad): gzhan dag kyang bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha
218a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
218b1(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed bdag gis bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
218b2(khri brgyad): la brtson pa mi 'dor zhing / gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
218b3(khri brgyad): chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
218b4(khri brgyad): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis thabs
218b5(khri brgyad): la mkhas pas bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye la/ gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ de'ang mi dmigs
218b6(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
218b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
219a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / chos thams
219a2(khri brgyad): cad kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog pa yang dag par 'dzin
219a3(khri brgyad): du 'jug pa de ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
219a4(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po yin no/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
219a5(khri brgyad): po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
219a6(khri brgyad): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
219a7(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
219b1(khri brgyad): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin no/ /de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams te/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de/ de la
219b2(khri brgyad): ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ mig ni mig gis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig
219b3(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i phyir/ rna ba rna bas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ sna ni snas stong ngo / /de ci'i
219b4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ lce ni lces stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir
219b5(khri brgyad): ro| |ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ lus ni lus kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ther zug tu gnas pa med pa
219b6(khri brgyad): dang | 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ yid ni yid kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ phyi
219b7(khri brgyad): rol gyi chos rnams te/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams so/ /de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ gzugs
220a1(khri brgyad): ni gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ sgra
220a2(khri brgyad): dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos ni chos kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang
220a3(khri brgyad): zhe na/ nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug po de dag ni phyi dang nang gi chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la nang gi chos rnams phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong pa gang zhe na/ ther zug tu
220a4(khri brgyad): gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ nang gi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnams ni phyi'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya
220a5(khri brgyad): dang / chos rnams kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ phyi rol gyi chos gzugs
220a6(khri brgyad): dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni nang gi chos mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnams kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
220a7(khri brgyad): de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ chos
220b1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des stong pa nyid stong pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la chen
220b2(khri brgyad): po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ shar phyogs ni shar phyogs kyis stong / lho phyogs ni lho phyogs kyis stong / nub phyogs ni nub phyogs kyis stong /
220b3(khri brgyad): byang phyogs ni byang phyogs kyis stong / 'og gi phyogs ni 'og gi phyogs kyis stong / steng gi phyogs ni steng gi phyogs kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams ni phyogs mtshams rnams
220b4(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ don dam pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las
220b5(khri brgyad): 'das pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa de'ang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir
220b6(khri brgyad): te| de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams
220b7(khri brgyad): te| de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong / gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs kyi khams kyis stong / gzugs
221a1(khri brgyad): med pa'i khams ni gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la
221a2(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ de la 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / gzhan du
221a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas de'ang 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin
221a4(khri brgyad): de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la mtha' mi dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste/ ther zug
221a5(khri brgyad): tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ mtha' ni mthas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//
221a6(khri brgyad): de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la thog ma dang tha ma mi dmigs pa de la dbus med cing / gang la thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus med pa de la 'ong ba dang 'gro
221a7(khri brgyad): ba med pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma rnams ni/ thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma rnams kyis stong ste/ de ni thog ma dang tha
221b1(khri brgyad): ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos gang la'ang dor du med pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ dor ba med pa ni dor ba med
221b2(khri brgyad): pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi
221b3(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
221b4(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma mdzad pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin
221b5(khri brgyad): de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
221b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes
221b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna
222a1(khri brgyad): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus
222a2(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / gzugs can gyi chos rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos de dag ni chos thams cad
222a3(khri brgyad): ces bya ste/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de
222a4(khri brgyad): ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung ba/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni myong ba/ 'du shes kyi mtshan
222a5(khri brgyad): nyid ni 'dzin par byed pa/ 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni mngon par 'du byed pa/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par shes par byed pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / /
222a6(khri brgyad): 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni rang rang gi mtshan nyid
222a7(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
222b1(khri brgyad): dang | da ltar byung ba'i chos gang yin pa de dag ni dmigs su med pa ste/ 'das pa rnams ni ma 'ongs pa la mi dmigs/ ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang 'das pa la mi dmigs/ da ltar byung ba rnams kyang
222b2(khri brgyad): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la mi dmigs so/ /ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa ni mi dmigs pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin
222b3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir te/ de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dngos po 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med
222b4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang
222b5(khri brgyad): la ngo bo nyid 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/
222b6(khri brgyad): de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir 'dus pa las byung ba'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid med pa ste/
222b7(khri brgyad): ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dus pa ni 'dus pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa/
223a1(khri brgyad): nyid ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni/ dngos po ni dngos pos stong / dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas steng / ngo
223a2(khri brgyad): po nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong / gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong pa ste/ de la dngos po gang zhe na/ dngos po zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga ste/ de la phung po lnga po dag ni ma skyes pa'i
223a3(khri brgyad): phyir dmigs su med pas/ de ltar dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'ang dngos po med pas ji ltar stong zhe na/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de la 'dus
223a4(khri brgyad): ma byas pa'ang 'dus ma byas pas stong pas/ de ltar na dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo / /ji ltar na ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhe na/ ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log
223a5(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin te/ de la stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas/ mthong bas ma byas pas na/ de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe
223a6(khri brgyad): na| gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang /
223a7(khri brgyad): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa nyid de/ de ltar gzhan gyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa
223b1(khri brgyad): nyid ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po/
223b2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng+ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting
223b3(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
223b4(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
223b5(khri brgyad): la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung
223b6(khri brgyad): bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dwags la yang
223b7(khri brgyad): dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjed pa med pa zhes
224a1(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
224a2(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes
224a3(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od
224a4(khri brgyad): mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od
224a5(khri brgyad): dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
224a6(khri brgyad): gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
224a7(khri brgyad): nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
224b1(khri brgyad): bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba
224b2(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
224b3(khri brgyad): cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya
224b4(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
224b5(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya
224b6(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes
224b7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa
225a1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam
225a2(khri brgyad): pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par
225a3(khri brgyad): sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya
225a4(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral
225a5(khri brgyad): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i
225a6(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes
225a7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / /
225b1(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag
225b2(khri brgyad): par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya
225b3(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya ba 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
225b4(khri brgyad): dang | ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang / sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag
225b5(khri brgyad): par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brtan pa med par brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus
225b6(khri brgyad): kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med par
225b7(khri brgyad): rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul nyams
226a1(khri brgyad): su myong bar byed pa ste/ de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge
226a2(khri brgyad): 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa ste/ de ni rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la seng+ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting
226a3(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse bar byed pa ste/ de ni seng+ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
226a4(khri brgyad): gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ de ni zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
226a5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed pa ste/ de ni zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad las
226a6(khri brgyad): shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags par 'gro ba ste/ de ni chos thams cad las shin tu
226a7(khri brgyad): 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug
226b1(khri brgyad): la rnam par lta bar byed pa ste/ de ni spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na
226b2(khri brgyad): chos kyi dbyings su nges par 'gro ba ste/ de ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
226b3(khri brgyad): gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed pa ste/ de ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting
226b4(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi phyed pa ste/ de ni rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa
226b5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//
226b6(khri brgyad): de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po'i gnas pa lta bus gnas pa ste/
226b7(khri brgyad): de ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/
227a1(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste/ de ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
227a2(khri brgyad): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dpung 'god par byed pa ste/ de ni dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la yang dag par 'phags
227a3(khri brgyad): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'grub pa ste/ de ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /
227a4(khri brgyad): de la nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa ste/ de ni nges
227a5(khri brgyad): pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la tshig bla dwags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting
227a6(khri brgyad): de 'dzin thams cad kyi ming dang tshig bla dwags la 'jug pa ste/ de ni tshig bla dwags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya
227a7(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs la rnam par lta ba ste/ de ni phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la
227b1(khri brgyad): phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ de ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i
227b2(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la brjod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi brjed pa ste/ de ni brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
227b3(khri brgyad): ces bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du brgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'du ba dang /
227b4(khri brgyad): yang dag par gzhol ba ste/ de ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
227b5(khri brgyad): na| ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na nam mkha' khyab par byed pas ting nge 'dzin thams cad khyab par byed pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rdo
227b6(khri brgyad): rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ de ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya
227b7(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rin po che'i spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma thams cad kyang spong na/ nyon mongs pa rnams
228a1(khri brgyad): kyi mtshan ma dag lta ci smos te/ de'i phyir rin po che'i spong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
228a2(khri brgyad): gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me lhan ne lhang nger snang ba ste/ de'i phyir rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
228a3(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos 'ga' yang mi tshol ba ste/ de'i phyir tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
228a4(khri brgyad): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos 'ga' yang gnas la brten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
228a5(khri brgyad): ces bya'o/ /de la sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi 'jug pa ste/ de'i phyir sems med pa zhes bya ba'i
228a6(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma med par byed pa ste/ de'i
228a7(khri brgyad): phyir dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na 'od mtha' yas pa byed pa
228b1(khri brgyad): ste| de'i phyir 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste
228b2(khri brgyad): de'i phyir 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams
228b3(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo snang ba ste/ de'i phyir kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin gyi dag pa
228b4(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid thams cad rjes su thob pa ste/ de'i phyir dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la
228b5(khri brgyad): gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la dga' ba byed pa
228b6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
228b7(khri brgyad): ces bya'o/ /de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste/ de'i phyir glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i
229a1(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi zad pa dang mi zad pa yang dag
229a2(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge
229a3(khri brgyad): 'dzin thams cad gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis 'bar bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhen/ ting nge 'dzin gang
229a4(khri brgyad): la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi zad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / ji ltar chos phra rab kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir zad pa dang bral ba zhes
229a5(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rlom sems su mi byed/ spros par mi byed
229a6(khri brgyad): cing | mi g.yo mi 'gul ba ste/ de'i phyir mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na
229a7(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'gyur ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
229b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la zla ba dri ma med
229b2(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mun pa med par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /
229b3(khri brgyad): de la snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob pa ste/ de'i phyir snang ba dag pa zhes bya
229b4(khri brgyad): pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir snang ba byed
229b5(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba'i rnam pa dag byed pa ste/ de'i
229b6(khri brgyad): phyir bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes kyi tog
229b7(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ de ni ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad
230a1(khri brgyad): rtogs shing / ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
230a2(khri brgyad): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na de'i sems mi g.yo mi ldog la/ yongs su yi 'chad par mi 'gyur zhing / sgyid lug par mi 'gyur la/ de 'di snyam du 'di ni sems
