230a3(khri brgyad): yin no zhes bya bar yang mi sems pa ste/ de'i phyir sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang
230a4(khri brgyad): la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun tu snang ba mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
230a5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting
230a6(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin po che'i mtha' lta bur kun tu snang ba ste/ de'i phyir rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de
230a7(khri brgyad): la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na phyag rgya med pa'i mtha'i rgyas btab pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa yin te/
230b1(khri brgyad): de'i phyir chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ mnyam pa nyid ma
230b2(khri brgyad): gtogs par chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
230b3(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la
230b4(khri brgyad): chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad kyis 'phags par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis
230b5(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la
230b6(khri brgyad): gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis chos thams cad rnam par 'thor bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu
230b7(khri brgyad): 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir chos
231a1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge
231a2(khri brgyad): 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid thob pa ste/ de ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
231a3(khri brgyad): 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang mi dmigs pa ste/ de'i phyir yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i
231a4(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmigs ba gcod par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la
231a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ chos thams cad kyi 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa ste/ de'i phyir 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces
231a6(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /de la rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mi dmigs pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
231a7(khri brgyad): 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gnas mi dmigs pa ste/ de'i phyir gnas med
231b1(khri brgyad): par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par spyod pa ste/
231b2(khri brgyad): de'i phyir rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dpyod
231b3(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas
231b4(khri brgyad): na| ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi g.yo ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
231b5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ de'i phyir yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la yon tan thams cad kyi
231b6(khri brgyad): tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste/ de ni yon tan
231b7(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad
232a1(khri brgyad): la sems mi 'jug pa ste/ de ni sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
232a2(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa 'thob pa ste/ de ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
232a3(khri brgyad): 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag 'thob pa ste/ de ni byang chub
232a4(khri brgyad): kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs
232a5(khri brgyad): pa mtha' yas pa 'thob pa ste/ de ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la
232a6(khri brgyad): gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'thob pa ste/ de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes
232a7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ de ni chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
232b1(khri brgyad): ces bya'o/ /de la yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yongs su gcod pa snang ba ste/ de ni yongs
232b2(khri brgyad): su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
232b3(khri brgyad): cad kyi nem nur rnam par sel ba rjes su 'thob pa ste/ de ni nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
232b4(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad kyi gnas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ni gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya
232b5(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos gang la'ang gnyis su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ni bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rnam
232b6(khri brgyad): pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
232b7(khri brgyad): ba ste/ de ni rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin
233a1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
233a2(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gnyis su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ni rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de
233a3(khri brgyad): la rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges par 'byed pa'i shes pa 'thob cing de
233a4(khri brgyad): thob nas kyang chos 'ga' yang khong du ma chud pa med pa ste/ de ni rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes
233a5(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi brda dang sgra dag la 'jug par 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
233a6(khri brgyad): ces bya'o/ /de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad yi ge dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su mthong
233a7(khri brgyad): ba ste| de'i phyir sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin
233b1(khri brgyad): thams cad gzi brjid kyis lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger snang ba ste/ de'i phyir sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
233b2(khri brgyad): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la
233b3(khri brgyad): mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par ma dmigs pa yin te/ de'i phyir mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes
233b4(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi
233b5(khri brgyad): mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa
233b6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad la
233b7(khri brgyad): mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi
234a1(khri brgyad): zad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
234a2(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na gzungs thams cad 'dzin par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la yang dag pa dang log pa thams
234a3(khri brgyad): cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yang dag pa nyid dang log pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba
234a4(khri brgyad): ste| de'i phyir yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya
234a5(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'gal ba dang / 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams
234a6(khri brgyad): cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams
234a7(khri brgyad): cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de'i phyir mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de
234b1(khri brgyad): la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi dmigs pa ste/ de'i phyir 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i
234b2(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad snying po med par mi dmigs pa ste/ de'i phyir snying
234b3(khri brgyad): po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba nya ba'i zla
234b4(khri brgyad): ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir zla ba nya pa'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la bkod pa chen po zhes bya
234b5(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad bkod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de
234b6(khri brgyad): la rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams
234b7(khri brgyad): cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par
235a1(khri brgyad): g.yeng ba dang / rtse gcig par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong pa ste/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la nyon mongs pa med par yang
235a2(khri brgyad): dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa med par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par
235a3(khri brgyad): 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la sgra med pa dang / sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge
235a4(khri brgyad): 'dzin thams cad sgra mi 'byin pa ste/ de'i phyir sgra med pa dang / sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la gnas la brtan pa med pa la brtson
235a5(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gnas mi dmigs pa ste/ de'i phyir gnas la brtan pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting
235a6(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las mi
235a7(khri brgyad): ldog pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting
235b1(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus mi dmigs pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas
235b2(khri brgyad): nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste/ de'i phyir ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas
235b3(khri brgyad): nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang
235b4(khri brgyad): la gnas na chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa rjes su 'thob pa ste/ de'i phyir nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos
235b5(khri brgyad): pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /shes rab kyi
235b6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang
235b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag
236a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o/ /de la lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
236a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ /
236a3(khri brgyad): de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing / lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la'ang rnam par mi rtog go /phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas/ nang dang phyi'i lus la
236a4(khri brgyad): lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing / lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la'ang rnam par mi rtog go /rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang
236a5(khri brgyad): ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi tshor ba rnams dang / sems dang / nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de'ang mi
236a6(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la'ang rnam par mi rtog go / phyi rol gyi tshor ba rnams dang / sems dang / chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta
236a7(khri brgyad): zhing gnas te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la'ang rnam par mi rtog go /nang dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / sems dang / chos
236b1(khri brgyad): rnams la'ang chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la'ang rnam par mi rtog go /rab 'byor byang chub
236b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas she na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nang gi lus la lus kyi
236b3(khri brgyad): rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ spyod na'ang spyod par rab tu shes so/ /'greng na'ang bdag 'greng bar rab tu shes so/ /'dug na'ang bdag 'dug par rab tu shes so/ /nyal na'ang bdag nyal
236b4(khri brgyad): bar rab tu shes so/ /de'i lus ji lta ji lta bur gnas par gyur pa de lta de lta bur de rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can
236b5(khri brgyad): dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
236b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de 'gro'am/ ldog kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ kun tu lta'am/ rnam par lta'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ bskum
236b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs pa dang / za ba dang / 'thung ba dang / 'cha' ba dang / myang ba dang / nyal ba dang / gnyid kyis non pa bsal ba dang /
237a1(khri brgyad): 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / mi nyal ba dang / smra ba dang / mi smra ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog pa na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa
237a2(khri brgyad): yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de'ang mi dmigs
237a3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs par yang dag pa ji lta ba
237a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dran bzhin du dbugs phyung na dran bzhin du dbugs phyung bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbugs ring du brngubs na/ dbugs ring du
237a5(khri brgyad): brngubs par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbugs ring du phyung na dbugs ring du phyung bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung ngu brngubs na
237a6(khri brgyad): dbugs thung ngu brngubs par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung du phyung na dbugs thung du phyung bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor/
237a7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdza mkhan nam/ rdza mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa phang lo bskor ba ni ring du srub na'ang ring du srub bar rab tu shes so/ /thung ngu srub na'ang thung ngu srub par rab tu
237b1(khri brgyad): shes so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na/ dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu

237b3(khri brgyad): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbugs ring du phyung na dbugs ring du phyung bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung ngu brngubs na/ dbugs thung ngu brngubs par yang
237b4(khri brgyad): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung ngu phyung na/ dbugs thung ngu phyung bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
237b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/
237b6(khri brgyad): de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus 'di nyid la khams kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog
237b7(khri brgyad): par byed de/ lus 'di la ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams yod do/ /snyam du rtog go /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ba lang gsod pa'am/ ba
238a1(khri brgyad): lang gsod pa'i slob ma mkhas pas/ mtshon rnon pos ba lang bsad nas bag bzhir bshags te/ gzug bzhir phye nas/ 'greng ngam 'dug ste so sor rtog pa
238a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang lus 'di nyid la khams kyis so sor rtog par byed de/ lus
238a3(khri brgyad): 'di la ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams yod do/ /snyam du so sor rtog ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
238a4(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'greng ngam 'dug kyang nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de dang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /rab 'byor
238a5(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang mgo bo man chad na sen mo dang /
238a6(khri brgyad): spu dang / pags pa la thug pa'i bar du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog ste/ lus 'di la ni skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / so dang / pags
238a7(khri brgyad): shun dang / sha dang / rgyus pa dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / lgang
238b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rngul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / dri ma dang / mgo bo
238b2(khri brgyad): dang | klad pa dang / mig rdul dang / rna spabs dag yod par lus 'di la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zhing pa'i sbyang 'bras so ba dang /

239a7(khri brgyad): 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no/ /zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang

239b5(khri brgyad): 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems

239b7(khri brgyad): khrod du mi ro bor ba rnam par zos pa dang / mi gtsang ba dang / rul ba dang / mnam pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos
240a1(khri brgyad): nyid 'di dang ma bral bas yin no/ /zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes

240b3(khri brgyad): cing gyes te/ dung sa la gtor ba lta bu dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no/ /zhes lus

241a1(khri brgyad): gzhan na/ mgo po'i thod pa rnams kyang gzhan na 'dug pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can nam/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/

241a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe dur khrod du rus pa lo du ma lon pa/ rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa dag mthong ba na/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can

241b1(khri brgyad): 'dra bar gyur pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no/ /zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar

241b3(khri brgyad): nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /de bzhin du rtun pa shes bzhin can/

241b5(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/
241b6(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa
241b7(khri brgyad): bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol
242a1(khri brgyad): la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing / yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol
242a2(khri brgyad): la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing 'byung ba dang / mi brjed pa dang / nyams par

242a4(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis 'jog ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

242a6(khri brgyad): byad dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur bsgom pa dang / brtson
242a7(khri brgyad): 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas
242b1(khri brgyad): pa| rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom zhing / de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /
242b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /

242b4(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ stobs lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting

242b6(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos
242b7(khri brgyad): rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang
243a1(khri brgyad): chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang
243a2(khri brgyad): bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom zhing / de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems
243a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
243a4(khri brgyad): lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi
243a5(khri brgyad): mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te/ rab 'byor/ de ni
243a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par
243a7(khri brgyad): thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la stong pa
243b1(khri brgyad): nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting
243b2(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par
243b3(khri brgyad): thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang
243b4(khri brgyad): yin pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag gi ting nge 'dzin ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
243b5(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di
243b6(khri brgyad): lta ste| shes pa bcu gcig go / bcu gcig gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa
243b7(khri brgyad): dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / yongs su 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/ /de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug
244a1(khri brgyad): bsngal mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang ba shes pa gang yin
244a2(khri brgyad): pa ste/ de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la
244a3(khri brgyad): lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe
244a4(khri brgyad): sdang dang / gti mug zad par shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid par 'gro ba mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po
244a5(khri brgyad): lnga po rnams bcos mar yongs su gcod pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang zhe na/ mig mi rtag pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
244a6(khri brgyad): yid mi rtag par shes pa ste/ de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / chos thams cad kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan
244a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sems sems kyis shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la yongs su 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ lam shes pa dang / yongs su zad pa shes pa gang
244b1(khri brgyad): yin pa'o/ /de la sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sgra thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa'o/ /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub
244b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po gsum ste/ gsum
244b3(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'o/ /de la mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhe
244b4(khri brgyad): na| slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi
244b5(khri brgyad): dbang po snang ba med pa/ dregs pa 'dul ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag kun
244b6(khri brgyad): shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun shes
244b7(khri brgyad): pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ mi slob pa'i gang zag dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
245a1(khri brgyad): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po
245a2(khri brgyad): dang | ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
245a3(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin gsum mo/ /gsum gang zhe na/
245a4(khri brgyad): rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa
245a5(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/
245a6(khri brgyad): rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas
245a7(khri brgyad): pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste/ de ni rtog pa
245b1(khri brgyad): med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa nas/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms
245b2(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin pa dag ste/ de ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab
245b3(khri brgyad): 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ rjes su dran pa bcu'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes
245b4(khri brgyad): su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa
245b5(khri brgyad): dang | lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba rjes su dran pa'o/ /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes su dran par byed de/ rab 'byor/ rjes su dran
245b6(khri brgyad): pa bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/
245b7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ tshad med pa bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa
246a1(khri brgyad): med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas
246a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa mi gnyis pa/ kho na med
246a3(khri brgyad): pa| 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas
246a4(khri brgyad): nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
246a5(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa
246a6(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems
246a7(khri brgyad): kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i
246b1(khri brgyad): 'dod chags dang bral bas/ btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang / shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la
246b2(khri brgyad): gnas pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba'ang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde
246b3(khri brgyad): ba dang | yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ rab
246b4(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta
246b5(khri brgyad): ste| gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
246b6(khri brgyad): nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam
246b7(khri brgyad): pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa
247a1(khri brgyad): dang | de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do/ /snyam nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas
247a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de
247a3(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam
247a4(khri brgyad): par thar pa brgyad do/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la
247a5(khri brgyad): lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das
247a6(khri brgyad): te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs
247a7(khri brgyad): te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas
247b1(khri brgyad): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci'ang med do/ /snyam
247b2(khri brgyad): nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med/ 'du
247b3(khri brgyad): shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du
247b4(khri brgyad): shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/
247b5(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben
247b6(khri brgyad): pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas
247b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing / nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba
248a1(khri brgyad): can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can
248a2(khri brgyad): yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms pa'o/ /zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan
248a3(khri brgyad): gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba'ang spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal
248a4(khri brgyad): ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag
248a5(khri brgyad): par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas
248a6(khri brgyad): skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas rnam shes
248a7(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do/ /snyam nas
248b1(khri brgyad): ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min
248b2(khri brgyad): skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs
248b3(khri brgyad): nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
248b4(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ gnas ma yin pa la'ang
248b5(khri brgyad): gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang / las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi gnas
248b6(khri brgyad): dang | rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs dang / khams du ma pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems
248b7(khri brgyad): can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan
249a1(khri brgyad): rnams kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
249a2(khri brgyad): rab tu shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba yang dag pa
249a3(khri brgyad): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dang / lha'i mig gis 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /
249a4(khri brgyad): zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te
249a5(khri brgyad): gnas shing / bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/ /bya ba ni byas so/ /phyin chad 'di lta bu med do/ /snyam du rab tu shes shing / de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
249a6(khri brgyad): rab tu shes pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
249a7(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes dam bcas na/ kye ma de la chos 'di rnams mngon par
249b1(khri brgyad): rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so/ /zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/ chos dang
249b2(khri brgyad): mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo/ /snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa
249b3(khri brgyad): thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog go /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/
249b4(khri brgyad): bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba dang / nga zag
249b5(khri brgyad): pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ kye ma de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag ma zad do/ /zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram
249b6(khri brgyad): zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
249b7(khri brgyad): bas| bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag
250a1(khri brgyad): go |tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa
250a2(khri brgyad): bdag gis bskor bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba dang / ngas gang dag bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag bstan na/ bar du gcod pa'i chos su mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la
250a3(khri brgyad): de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i
250a4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing bag tsha ba
250a5(khri brgyad): med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/
250a6(khri brgyad): bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba dang / ngas
250a7(khri brgyad): 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam gang dag bstan te/ de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par nges par 'byung ba de dag bsgrubs na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par
250b1(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la de dag bsgrubs kyang zag pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang
250b2(khri brgyad): bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
250b3(khri brgyad): bas bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go /
250b4(khri brgyad): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o//
250b5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'o/ /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
250b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag
250b7(khri brgyad): par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rig pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub
251a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di
251a2(khri brgyad): lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/ bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
251a3(khri brgyad): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi
251a4(khri brgyad): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyi rjes su bstan nas/ gang gi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs
251a5(khri brgyad): su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / sems mnyam
251a6(khri brgyad): par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa
251a7(khri brgyad): dang | ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang /
251b1(khri brgyad): lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las
251b2(khri brgyad): thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma
251b3(khri brgyad): thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa'o/ /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor /
251b4(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste /
251b5(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge'i tshul mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ges 'jug pa'o/ /de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ges 'jug pa
251b6(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /pa zhes bya ba ni don dam
251b7(khri brgyad): par khyad par med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /na zhes bya ba ni ming mi
252a1(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ming med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing / sred pa'i 'khri shing gi rgyu dang rkyen yang dag
252a2(khri brgyad): par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /da zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang / dul bar gnas pa yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa
252a3(khri brgyad): las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /Da zhes bya ba ni khrag khrug dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pa'i
252a4(khri brgyad): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /bA zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam gyi sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i
252a5(khri brgyad): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ya zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du ma skyes ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams
252a6(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' zhing / mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir
252a7(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ma zhes bya ba ni nga yir 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad
252b1(khri brgyad): kyi sgo yin no/ /tha zhes bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /shwa zhes bya ba ni
252b2(khri brgyad): dbugs mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas mi dmigs pa'i
252b3(khri brgyad): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /k+Sha zhes bya ba ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir
252b4(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /dz+nyA zhes bya ba ni ye shes mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /

252b6(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /hwa zhes bya ba ni bod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tas zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la spro ba mi dmigs
252b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /Tha zhes bya ba ni rnam par bsgrub pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams
253a1(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no/ /Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams
253a2(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sga zhes bya ba ni phung po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /dza zhes bya ba ni rga ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tsa
253a3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /Ta zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ha zhes bya ba ni ngar
253a4(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /de yan chad ni yi ger brjod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la'ang gang gis tha snyad 'dogs pa
253a5(khri brgyad): dang / gang gis brjod pa dang / gang gis bstan pa dang / gang gis rtogs par byed pa dang / gang gis mthong ba'i ming ci'ang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ chos
253a6(khri brgyad): thams cad ni nam mkha' dang 'dra par khong du chud par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa yin no/ /
253a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di shes pa de ni sgra gang la'ang thogs par mi 'gyur
253b1(khri brgyad): zhing / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub par gyur te/ sgra shes pa la mkhas pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
253b2(khri brgyad): chen po gang la la a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos la/ thos nas kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
253b3(khri brgyad): gyis nges par gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyun gyis 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston pa de la ni/ phan yon nyi shu yod pa
253b4(khri brgyad): shes par bya'o/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /

253b6(khri brgyad): tshegs chung ngus 'thob cing / som nyi med la/ yid gnyis za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag las tshig 'jam po thos na'ang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur la/ tshig rtsub po thos
253b7(khri brgyad): na'ang zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur te/ mtho bar mi 'gyur/ dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing / tha mal par gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / phung po la mkhas par
254a1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /

254a4(khri brgyad): shes pa la mkhas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang /

254a6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge la 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gzungs
254a7(khri brgyad): kyi sgor 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod 'di skad du ji ltar
254b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
254b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa drug po la spyod pa ni/ sa nas sar 'phar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa/ sa nas sar ji ltar 'phar zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
254b3(khri brgyad): chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang yang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ 'pho ba'am/ nye bar 'pho ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /'on kyang chos thams cad kyis
254b4(khri brgyad): sa gang yin pa de la'ang rlom sems su mi byed cing / mi sems la/ sa yongs su sbyong bar yang byed de/ sa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems
254b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la gnas pas/ sa yongs su sbyang ba bcu bya'o/ /
254b6(khri brgyad): bcu gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar byas te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya ba dang mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ phan pa bya ba'i dngos po yongs su
254b7(khri brgyad): sbyang ba dang / sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa po dang / len pa po mi dmigs pa'i
255a1(khri brgyad): phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / de dag gis rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos thams cad mi
255a2(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs
255a3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi dbye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos rnam par 'grel ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yod pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ nga
255a4(khri brgyad): rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
255a5(khri brgyad): chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongs su sbyang ba bcu po 'di dag bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas rtag tu
255a6(khri brgyad): chos brgyad yid la bya zhing / de dag la nan tan bya'o/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs
255a7(khri brgyad): la gnas pa dang / mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba dang / snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang / bla ma
255b1(khri brgyad): rnams la dad pas gus shing ston pa'i 'du shes kyis sri zhu che ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas yongs su 'tshol ba ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
255b2(khri brgyad): chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas chos brgyad po de dag rtag tu yid la bya zhing / de dag la nan tan bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa
255b3(khri brgyad): gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la gnas par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mang du thos pas chog mi shes shing / de la'ang yi ge la mngon par zhen par bya ba dang / zang
255b4(khri brgyad): zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed la/ des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / yongs su
255b5(khri brgyad): bsngo la/ des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo zhing des kyang rom sems su mi byed pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas shing /
255b6(khri brgyad): des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas/ chos lnga po de dag la gnas par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
255b7(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bzhi pa la gnas pas chos bcu yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya zhing / de yongs su spang bar mi bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
256a1(khri brgyad): dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs ba mi btang ba dang / bslab
256a2(khri brgyad): pa yongs su mi btang ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba dang / sems
256a3(khri brgyad): mi 'dre ba dang / dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas chos bcu po de dag yongs su btang bar mi
256a4(khri brgyad): bya zhing / yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos bcu yongs su spang bar bya'o/
256a5(khri brgyad): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / khyim la ser
256a6(khri brgyad): sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / bdag la bstod pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing /
256a7(khri brgyad): gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /
256b1(khri brgyad): phyin ci log yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / the tshom yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya ba ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub
256b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos bcu po de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa
256b3(khri brgyad): la gnas pas/ chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /gzhan yang chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ste/ drug gang
256b4(khri brgyad): zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / yongs su yi chad pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / slong ba mthong na
256b5(khri brgyad): sems zhum par mi bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su btang nas yid mi bde bar mi bya ba dang / slong ba bskrad par mi bya ba ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
256b6(khri brgyad): po sa drug pa la gnas pas/ chos drug po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu mi
256b7(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya ba dang / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / chad par 'dzin pa dang / rtag par
257a1(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes dang / rgyur lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa dang / phung po la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams la mngon par
257a2(khri brgyad): zhen pa dang / skye mched la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la lhag par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la chags pa dang / sangs rgyas su
257a3(khri brgyad): lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / chos su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / dge 'dun du lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / tshul khrims su lta ba la rten cing mngon
257a4(khri brgyad): par zhen pa dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas
257a5(khri brgyad): chos nyi shu po de dag mi bya'o/ /sa bdun pa la gnas pa des chos nyi shu yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
257a6(khri brgyad): mngon sum du bya ba dang / smon pa med pa shes pa dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rje ba dang / sems can de dag la brnyas
257a7(khri brgyad): par mi bya ba dang / chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta zhing de la'ang mngon par zhen par mi bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs shing / des rlom sems su'ang mi bya ba dang / mi
257b1(khri brgyad): skye bar bzod pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang / chos thams cad la rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa dang / lta ba bzlog pa dang / nyon mongs pa bzlog pa dang / zhi
257b2(khri brgyad): gnas nges par sems pa dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa'i sa dang / sems dul ba dang / sems zhi ba dang / shes pa thogs pa med pa dang / rjes su chags pa'i sa ma yin pa dang / zhing gang
257b3(khri brgyad): du 'dod par 'gro ba ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang
257b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas/ chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug
257b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag kyang yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur
257b6(khri brgyad): bya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/ rab 'byor/ chos bzhi po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
257b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
258a1(khri brgyad): yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rgyun mi chad par snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
258a2(khri brgyad): 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub cing / bsam bzhin du srid pa nye bar len pa ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la
258a3(khri brgyad): gnas pas chos bzhi po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongs su
258a4(khri brgyad): rdzogs par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su bzung ba ste/ de smon lam ji lta ji lta bu 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
258a5(khri brgyad): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i klung khong
258a6(khri brgyad): du chud pa dang / mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum
258a7(khri brgyad): tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs
258b1(khri brgyad): su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
258b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
258b3(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba gang
258b4(khri brgyad): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa gang yin pa
258b5(khri brgyad): ste| rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba
258b6(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa gang
258b7(khri brgyad): yin pa ste/ de ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sems
259a1(khri brgyad): can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/ de ni gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
259a2(khri brgyad): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag rnam pa thams
259a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par 'dzud cing 'jog la/ rab tu 'god par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la bsten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sri zhu byed pa
259a4(khri brgyad): ste| de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos
259a5(khri brgyad): tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos tshol bar byed la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi lhung ba gang
259a6(khri brgyad): yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi chad par
259a7(khri brgyad): mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'dre ba med par mngon par 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la'ang rab tu 'byung la/ su'ang
259b1(khri brgyad): de'i bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub
259b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du nam yang sangs
259b3(khri brgyad): rgyas yid la byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /
259b4(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon
259b5(khri brgyad): sum du bzhugs kyang rung / mya ngan las 'das kyang rung sems can rnams la chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru
259b6(khri brgyad): bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched
259b7(khri brgyad): du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung pa'i chos kyi sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde
260a1(khri brgyad): dang | gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel pa
260a2(khri brgyad): yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyi khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ nga rgyal gyis khengs pa gzhom pa
260a3(khri brgyad): gang gis/ nam yang rigs dma' ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongs su sbyang
260a4(khri brgyad): ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
260a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongs su sbyang
260a6(khri brgyad): bar bya ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / gzhan
260a7(khri brgyad): yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims su byed pa/ byang chub la bar chad byed pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag yid la mi byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims
260b1(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i
260b2(khri brgyad): spyad pa spyod pa na/ chung ngu zhig byas na'ang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du chud mi gzon na/ chen po lta ci smos te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa gzo zhing byas pa
260b3(khri brgyad): tshor ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa gang zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rnam par 'tshe ba'i
260b4(khri brgyad): sems med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing
260b5(khri brgyad): dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa gsum po dag la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu
260b6(khri brgyad): dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can
260b7(khri brgyad): thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
261a1(khri brgyad): chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di snyam du
261a2(khri brgyad): sems te/ sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang bdag bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed du sems can dmyal ba dag tu 'dug la/ sems can de sangs rgyas kyi ye
261a3(khri brgyad): shes la ma bzhag gi bar du der bcad pa dang / gshag pa dang / brdung ba dang / btso ba dang / bsreg pa dag kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /snyam ste/ de bzhin du sems can
261a4(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi phyir mngon par spro zhing yongs su mi skyo ba'i bar du ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub
261a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing sri zhu che ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes 'jog pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems
261a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la dad pas gus shing sri zhu che ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol pa
261a7(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan mi byed par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su tshol ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
