261b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta
261b2(khri brgyad): ste| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ phyogs bcu khor yug gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag tu gang ci gsungs pa de thams cad gzung bar
261b3(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /snyam du chog mi shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
261b4(khri brgyad): chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston kyang chos kyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tha na
261b5(khri brgyad): byang chub la'ang re ba med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems
261b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
261b7(khri brgyad): yongs su dag par byed pa bdag dang gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
262a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor ba
262a2(khri brgyad): dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis nye bar brtan na/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su
262a3(khri brgyad): smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur gyi bar
262a4(khri brgyad): du nam yang spyo bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
262a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
262a6(khri brgyad): ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang
262a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems
262b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyang mi 'dod pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
262b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa gang
262b3(khri brgyad): yin pa ste| de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs
262b4(khri brgyad): pa mi btang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos zab mo dag la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /
262b5(khri brgyad): yo byad bsnyungs pa mi btang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/ gang la bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/
262b6(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang
262b7(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'dod pa la sems mi bskyed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
263a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/ de ni byang chub
263a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongs
263a3(khri brgyad): su btang ba gang zhe na/ nang dang phyi rol gyi chos rnams 'dzin par mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang
263a4(khri brgyad): ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba gang zhe na/ gang rnam par shes pa gnas pa rnams la de'i sems mi sbyor ba ste/ de ni byang chub
263a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba gang zhe na/ dngos po thams
263a6(khri brgyad): cad yid la mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
263a7(khri brgyad): khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus te skye ba dang / mgo bregs shing ngur smrig gyon pa ste/
263b1(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma
263b2(khri brgyad): dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma rnams dang se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang lhan cig mi gnas shing / de dag med na'ang yongs su yi chad par
263b3(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
263b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag
263b5(khri brgyad): gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad sbyar bar bya na/ sems can 'di dag ni rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur pa yin gyi/ 'di la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed
263b6(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
263b7(khri brgyad): 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yod pa'am/ de
264a1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi gleng ldang bar 'gyur ba'am/ de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa bskyed pa 'gyur ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas
264a2(khri brgyad): par mi bya ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems
264a3(khri brgyad): yongs su spang par bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ gang gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / 'thab pa'i sems dang / rtsod pa'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed
264a4(khri brgyad): pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la bstod pa yongs
264a5(khri brgyad): su spang ba gang zhe na/ gang nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la bstod pa yongs su spang ba
264a6(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
264a7(khri brgyad): ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi
264b1(khri brgyad): lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di dag ni bde 'gro la'ang bar du gcod par byed na/ 'phags pa'i lam la lta ci smos shing / byang chub la lta ci smos pa ste/
264b2(khri brgyad): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga
264b3(khri brgyad): rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos ci'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ gang gis lhag par rlom sems su byed pa'i lhag pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar
264b4(khri brgyad): lhag pa'i nga rgyal spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la de'i khengs pa skye bar 'gyur
264b5(khri brgyad): ba'i dngos po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
264b6(khri brgyad): chen pos phyin ci log yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ dngos po rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongs su spang
264b7(khri brgyad): bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dod chags
265a1(khri brgyad): dang | zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang /
265a2(khri brgyad): zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa drug pa la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/
265a3(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
265a4(khri brgyad): dang | bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
265a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas nas/ shes bya'i rgya mtsho rnam pa lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ /
265a6(khri brgyad): phyin to/ phyin par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / brjod du med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ltar byang chub
265a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang nyan thos kyi
265b1(khri brgyad): sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
265b2(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /yongs su yi chad pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /slong
265b3(khri brgyad): pa mthong na sems zhum par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po thams cad yongs su btang nas/ yid mi bde bar mi bya'o//
265b4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sems dang po bskyed phyin chad rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin par bya zhing / sems gsog tu mi bya ste/ chos drug po de
265b5(khri brgyad): dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar yang bdag gtan med pa'i phyir ro/ /sems can
265b6(khri brgyad): du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa la'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
265b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chad par 'dzin par mi bya'i/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan ma skyes pas/ chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub
266a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rtag par 'dzin par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar chos gang mi skye ba de rtag pa dang chad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de la
266a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang mtshan ma'i 'du shes mi bya ste/ 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa gtan med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
266a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rgyur blta bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
266a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po de mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
266a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i
266a6(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag rang bzhin gyis med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
266a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar khams gsum la mngon par
266b1(khri brgyad): zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la lhag par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po de med cing mi
266b2(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la lhag par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar
266b3(khri brgyad): yang khams gsum la chags par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la chags par
266b4(khri brgyad): mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas sangs
266b5(khri brgyad): rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji
266b6(khri brgyad): ltar yang chos su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas chos mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
266b7(khri brgyad): chos su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge
267a1(khri brgyad): 'dun du lta ba la brten pas dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi
267a2(khri brgyad): bya'o| |de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang tshul khrims su lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la
267a3(khri brgyad): brten pas tshul khrims yongs su dag par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims su lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang
267a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong gi /stong pa
267a5(khri brgyad): nyid kyis stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo / /zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems
267a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya ste/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi
267a7(khri brgyad): byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang
267b1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong gi /stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid
267b2(khri brgyad): rtogs par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du byas gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub
267b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
267b4(khri brgyad): chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can
267b5(khri brgyad): thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rjes yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po thob pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar sems can thams
267b6(khri brgyad): cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba
267b7(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la bsnan pa med pa dang / dbri ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs pa gang zhe na/ gang
268a1(khri brgyad): chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye bar bzod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad skye ba med
268a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par bzod pa ste/ de ni mi skye bar bzod pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa
268a3(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ gang ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
268a4(khri brgyad): chen po'i tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos gnyis su kun tu spyod pa med pa nyid de/ de ni tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
268a5(khri brgyad): chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba bzlog pa gang zhe na/
268a6(khri brgyad): gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lta ba thams cad bzlog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa bzlog pa gang zhe na/ gang bag chags
268a7(khri brgyad): dang | mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dor ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
268b1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dul ba gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'o/ /
268b2(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhi ba gang zhe na/ gang dbang po drug po dag nas rab tu mi 'phro ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
268b3(khri brgyad): shes pa thogs pa med pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su chags pa la mi 'jug pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/
268b4(khri brgyad): skye mched drug la btang snyoms su 'jog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang der lus
268b5(khri brgyad): ston pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /
268b6(khri brgyad): sems las byung ba rnams shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir/ mngon par shes
268b7(khri brgyad): pa gang dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
269a1(khri brgyad): po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta ba gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yos la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na'ang snang zhing de sangs
269a2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa gang zhe na/
269a3(khri brgyad): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas nas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de
269a4(khri brgyad): thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed pa gang zhe na/ sems
269a5(khri brgyad): can thams cad yongs su dgos pa'i phyir gang chos la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
269a6(khri brgyad): du brten pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa
269a7(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi
269b1(khri brgyad): zhing yongs su dag par bya ba gang zhe na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
269b2(khri brgyad): po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas/ bya ba thams cad byed la/ de'i sems chos gang la'ang mi
269b3(khri brgyad): 'jug pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun mi chad par snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa
269b4(khri brgyad): las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta
269b5(khri brgyad): de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji lta bur sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus bsam
269b6(khri brgyad): bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bsam bzhin du srid pa nye bar len ce na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par
269b7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
270a1(khri brgyad): d pa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par byas pas smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par
270a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye
270a3(khri brgyad): chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spobs pa'i
270a4(khri brgyad): klung khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs
270a5(khri brgyad): pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug
270a6(khri brgyad): pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs chen
270a7(khri brgyad): po dag tu skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho rigs phun sum
270b1(khri brgyad): tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub
270b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ rigs gang
270b3(khri brgyad): las sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byung bar gyur pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang
270b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams byang chub tu bkod nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor nyid dang ldan pa
270b5(khri brgyad): ste| de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/
270b6(khri brgyad): skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
270b7(khri brgyad): skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
271a1(khri brgyad): po sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / khyim nas rab tu 'byung zhing mngon par 'byung la/ sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la
271a2(khri brgyad): nges par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
271a3(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba ni/ gser las grub pa/ sdong po ni bai DUR+Ya las grub pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang /
271a4(khri brgyad): 'dab ma rnams ni rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yin la/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bar dag tu snang
271a5(khri brgyad): bas khyab par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
271a6(khri brgyad): chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par byas pas/ sangs
271a7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems
271b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag
271b2(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / bag chags
271b3(khri brgyad): dang mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
271b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu po dag gang zhe na/ rab
271b5(khri brgyad): 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad la spyod pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la
271b6(khri brgyad): bslabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pa ni/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da' zhing / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa
271b7(khri brgyad): dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ste/ rab
272a1(khri brgyad): 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sa dgu po 'di dag las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de
272a2(khri brgyad): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par
272a3(khri brgyad): zhugs pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sa yongs su sbyang ba bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// //rab 'byor/ gang khyod
272a4(khri brgyad): 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes zer ba ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der
272a5(khri brgyad): gnas par 'gyur te/ de'ang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
272a6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan
272a7(khri brgyad): nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la ni nges par 'byung ba'am/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/ nges par
272b1(khri brgyad): 'byung bar gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad
272b2(khri brgyad): do| |rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / spong
272b3(khri brgyad): ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
272b4(khri brgyad): ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'gog pa'i dbyings kyi bar
272b5(khri brgyad): du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du
272b6(khri brgyad): zad do/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa
272b7(khri brgyad): nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad
273a1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong
273a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar
273a3(khri brgyad): gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i
273a4(khri brgyad): chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par
273a5(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i
273a6(khri brgyad): chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
273a7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
273b1(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
273b2(khri brgyad): ba'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mig gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad
273b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi
273b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/
273b5(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar dag kyang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par
273b6(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rmi lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang
273b7(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rmi lam gyi
274a1(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
274a2(khri brgyad): sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam
274a3(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / sgyu ma'i
274a4(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / smig rgyu'i rang bzhin ni smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / brag ca'i rang bzhin ni brag ca'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / mig yor gyi
274a5(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni mig yor gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
274a6(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan
274a7(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
274b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
274b2(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
274b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni
274b4(khri brgyad): khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar sbyin
274b5(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
274b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
274b7(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad
275a1(khri brgyad): do| |rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la/
275a2(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni
275a3(khri brgyad): khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar nang
275a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
275a5(khri brgyad): kyi bar gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la nges par
275a6(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
275a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ dran pa nye bar
275b1(khri brgyad): bdag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba
275b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir
275b3(khri brgyad): zhe na| rab 'byor/ 'di ltar lam gyi bar gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur
275b4(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ lam ni lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin
275b5(khri brgyad): pa de ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i
275b6(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
275b7(khri brgyad): gnas par mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid
276a1(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid
276a2(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
276a3(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / rang sangs
276a4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang
276a5(khri brgyad): bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
276a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong / byang chub
276a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /
276b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ de
276b2(khri brgyad): bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa
276b3(khri brgyad): nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar
276b4(khri brgyad): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang /
276b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams
276b6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /
276b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong pa dang / de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi
277a1(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams
277a2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni ming la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad
277a3(khri brgyad): do| |rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma dang / brda dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa la nges par
277a4(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad
277a5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gdags pa ni gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan
277a6(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
277a7(khri brgyad): rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa
277b1(khri brgyad): la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung
277b2(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni/ mngon
277b3(khri brgyad): par 'du byed pa med pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
277b4(khri brgyad): la gnas par mi 'gyur te/ theg pa de ni bskyod du med pa yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ rab 'byor gang khyod
277b5(khri brgyad): 'di skad du theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur/ zhes zer ba ni/ theg pa de gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gnas pa med pa'i
277b6(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'on kyang theg pa de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang
277b7(khri brgyad): ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi
278a1(khri brgyad): khyab pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas
278a2(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin zhing / yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang / bsam gyis
278a3(khri brgyad): mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin
278a4(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni bsam
278a5(khri brgyad): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /
278a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ spong ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang
278a7(khri brgyad): bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas
278b1(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dod chags
278b2(khri brgyad): dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi rang
278b3(khri brgyad): bzhin ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings
278b4(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /
278b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/
278b6(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa
278b7(khri brgyad): nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
279a1(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /
279a2(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig gi stong
279a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /yid kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen
279a4(khri brgyad): po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mig gi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / yid kyi rang bzhin
279a5(khri brgyad): gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa dang / yid kyi bar du yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
279a6(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//
279a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas
279b1(khri brgyad): pa ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa dang / chos
279b2(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bar ni chos rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /
279b3(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas
279b4(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar
279b5(khri brgyad): du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du
279b6(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /yid kyi
279b7(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin
280a1(khri brgyad): no| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin
280a2(khri brgyad): gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
280a3(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/
280a4(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
280a5(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am
280a6(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig
280a7(khri brgyad): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du yid kyi 'dus te reg
280b1(khri brgyad): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rmi lam ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po
280b2(khri brgyad): de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa
280b3(khri brgyad): ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
280b4(khri brgyad): rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /sgyu ma dang /
280b5(khri brgyad): smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
280b6(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa dang / smig rgyu'i rang bzhin ni smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / brag ca'i rang bzhin ni brag ca'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / mig yor gyi rang bzhin ni mig yor gyi
280b7(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper
281a1(khri brgyad): na| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin
281a2(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
281a3(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po
281a4(khri brgyad): de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /
281a5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
281a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
281a7(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta
281b1(khri brgyad): ste| dper na/ nang stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /
281b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang
281b3(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
281b4(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
281b5(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper
281b6(khri brgyad): na| dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma
281b7(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag
282a1(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
282a2(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
282a3(khri brgyad): na| rab 'byor/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lam ni
282a4(khri brgyad): lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
282a5(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma
282a6(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
282a7(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
282b1(khri brgyad): stobs rnams kyis stong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dgra bcom
282b2(khri brgyad): pa zag pa zad pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rang sangs rgyas ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po
282b3(khri brgyad): de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang
282b4(khri brgyad): bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
282b5(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/
282b6(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no| |rab 'byor/ de
282b7(khri brgyad): bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas
283a1(khri brgyad): pa ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
283a2(khri brgyad): dpa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /
283a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi
283a4(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rang byang chub ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas
283a5(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi
283a6(khri brgyad): bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i
283a7(khri brgyad): 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /
283b1(khri brgyad): rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas
283b2(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi
283b3(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
283b4(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
283b5(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ming
283b6(khri brgyad): ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
283b7(khri brgyad): dper na/ mtshan ma dang / brda dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma
284a1(khri brgyad): yin| mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ ming gi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / mtshan ma'i rang bzhin
284a2(khri brgyad): dang | brda'i rang bzhin dang / tha snyad kyi rang bzhin dang / gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gi rang bzhin
284a3(khri brgyad): ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / mtshan ma'i rang bzhin ni mtshan ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / brda'i rang bzhin ni brda'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / tha snyad kyi rang
284a4(khri brgyad): bzhin ni tha snyad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skye ba med pa ni
284a5(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
284a6(khri brgyad): dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin
284a7(khri brgyad): no| |rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas
284b1(khri brgyad): pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/
284b2(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba
284b3(khri brgyad): med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na theg pa de ni mi gnas par gnas pa'i
284b4(khri brgyad): tshul dang / bskyod du med pa'i tshul gyis gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ khyod 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes zer ba ni/ theg pa
284b5(khri brgyad): des su'ang nges par 'byung ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar theg pa gang yin pa de dang / gang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung bar
284b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba dang / gang nas nges par 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa la chos gang
284b7(khri brgyad): zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag mi dmigs pa dang / sems can dang / srog
285a1(khri brgyad): dang | gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mi dmigs/
285a2(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang / khams dang / skye
285a3(khri brgyad): mched rnams mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
285a4(khri brgyad): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam
285a5(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang
285a6(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
285a7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong
285b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
285b2(khri brgyad): dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
285b3(khri brgyad): dang | rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba med pa mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin
285b4(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag
285b5(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang /
285b6(khri brgyad): 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gang dmigs su med
285b7(khri brgyad): pas thams cad mi dmigs she na/ chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas chos kyi dbyings mi
286a1(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa
286a2(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pas de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pas
286a3(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
286a4(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas/ shes rab kyi pha
286a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pas nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pas dngos po
286a6(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba
286a7(khri brgyad): dang | rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dmigs su med pas lam mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
286b1(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su
286b2(khri brgyad): med pas rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dmigs su med pas dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas
286b3(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pas rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du dmigs su med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
286b4(khri brgyad): dang | lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dmigs su med pas sangs rgyas
286b5(khri brgyad): nyid mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sa dmigs su med pas rab tu dga' ba'i sa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dmigs su med pas dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa
286b6(khri brgyad): dang | 'od 'phro can dang / shin tu sbyang dka' dang / mngon du gyur dang / ring du song dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin gyi sa mi dmigs so/ /gzhan yang sa
286b7(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pas sa bcu mi dmigs te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sa dang po dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i
287a1(khri brgyad): sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa
287a2(khri brgyad): ste| nang stong pa nyid kyis sa dang po mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sa dang po mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid
287a3(khri brgyad): dang | dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sa bcu'i bar du mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
287a4(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis
287a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mig lnga mi dmigs so/ /
287a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams
287a7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ theg pa chen po'i sa nges par 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bco
287b1(khri brgyad): brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di
287b2(khri brgyad): ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa de ni nam
287b3(khri brgyad): mkha' dang mnyam pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ nam mkha' ni sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyi go 'byed
287b4(khri brgyad): pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
287b5(khri brgyad): de ltar na de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ gnas pa mi dmigs/
287b6(khri brgyad): sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ nam mkha' la ni 'ong pa mi dmigs/
287b7(khri brgyad): 'gro ba mi dmigs/ gnas pa mi dmigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la'ang 'ong ba mi dmigs/ 'gro ba mi dmigs/ gnas pa mi dmigs lags so//
288a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus
288a2(khri brgyad): mi dmigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs lags pas/ bcom ldan
288a3(khri brgyad): 'das/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
288a4(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
288a5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
288a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
288a7(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas
288b1(khri brgyad): rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
288b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
288b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
288b4(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de
288b5(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de ni byang chub sems
288b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
288b7(khri brgyad): gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa la/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi
289a1(khri brgyad): khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams so/ /rab 'byor/ de la gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma
289a2(khri brgyad): log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ dngos po med pa ma
289a3(khri brgyad): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir/
289a4(khri brgyad): 'dod pa'i khams ni brtags pa rnam par bsgrubs pa tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag/ mi brtan zhing / ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po
289a5(khri brgyad): med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab
289a6(khri brgyad): 'byor/ gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta
289a7(khri brgyad): ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
289b1(khri brgyad): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir gzugs kyi khams ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa tshig
289b2(khri brgyad): gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag/ mi brtan zhing / ther zug ma yin la/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen
289b3(khri brgyad): pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te gzugs med pa'i khams de bzhin du gyur
289b4(khri brgyad): te| ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi
289b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi
289b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur pa zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir gzugs med pa'i khams ni brtags pa rnam par bsgrubs pa tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag /mi brtan zhing / ther zug
289b7(khri brgyad): ma yin la/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
290a1(khri brgyad): nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te gzugs de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na
290a2(khri brgyad): dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ de dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa
290a3(khri brgyad): chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir gzugs ni brtags
290a4(khri brgyad): pa| rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag /mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma
290a5(khri brgyad): yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gal te
290a6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang
290a7(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ de dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis
290b1(khri brgyad): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa ni brtags pa/ rnam
