310a6(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/
310a7(khri brgyad): gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med cing / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams
310b1(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
310b2(khri brgyad): par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag gi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/
310b3(khri brgyad): gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas
310b4(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin
310b5(khri brgyad): ni gang nas 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang
310b6(khri brgyad): du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med
310b7(khri brgyad): la| sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
311a1(khri brgyad): 'byor/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi ngo bo
311a2(khri brgyad): nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang
311a3(khri brgyad): nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni
311a4(khri brgyad): gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba mi dmigs/ 'gro ba mi dmigs/
311a5(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus
311a6(khri brgyad): kyang mi dmigs lags pas/ de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /zhes smras pa ni/ rab 'byor/ /de de
311a7(khri brgyad): bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs pas/ de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi
311b1(khri brgyad): theg pa yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma
311b2(khri brgyad): 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong / theg pa chen po'ang theg pa chen pos
311b3(khri brgyad): stong | byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong la/ rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid la ni gcig ces bya ba med cing / gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam
311b4(khri brgyad): brgyad dam/ dgu'am/ bcu zhes bya ba'am/ tha dad du dbye ba med pa'i phyir te/ de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa
311b5(khri brgyad): yin te/ theg pa chen po de la ni mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /de la ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med
311b6(khri brgyad): pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /gti mug dang / gti mug med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /ming dang / ming med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /zag
311b7(khri brgyad): pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa
312a1(khri brgyad): med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang mi dmigs
312a2(khri brgyad): so| |'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /de la ni rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /bdag dang /
312a3(khri brgyad): bdag med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /
312a4(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par
312a5(khri brgyad): 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis
312a6(khri brgyad): stong ngo / /de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs
312a7(khri brgyad): pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs
312b1(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
312b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/ da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs
312b3(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir te/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba
312b4(khri brgyad): dang | 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /
312b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
312b6(khri brgyad): nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
312b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
313a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis
313a2(khri brgyad): stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
313a3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
313a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
313a5(khri brgyad): ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
313a6(khri brgyad): la mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so/ /mnyam pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs so/ /mnyam pa nyid la ni da ltar byung ba'i dus
313a7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la
313b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur| rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon
313b2(khri brgyad): gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar
313b3(khri brgyad): byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
313b4(khri brgyad): dang | da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i shes rab kyi
313b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams ni mi dmigs
313b6(khri brgyad): so| |dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi
313b7(khri brgyad): dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs par lta ga
314a1(khri brgyad): la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam
314a2(khri brgyad): dang | stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus
314a3(khri brgyad): rnams su mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi
314a4(khri brgyad): dmigs/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
314a5(khri brgyad): dang | da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
314a6(khri brgyad): so| |so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i
314a7(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
314b1(khri brgyad): dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni
314b2(khri brgyad): da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
314b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de ltar bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
314b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de la gnas
314b5(khri brgyad): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
314b6(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
314b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa chen po 'di legs par bka' stsal pa ni/ legs so/ /legs so/ legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
315a1(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
315a2(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di la slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
315a3(khri brgyad): nyid thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa dag na mchis
315a4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa de dag kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad
315a5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid thob par bgyid lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags te/ 'di ltar dus
315a6(khri brgyad): gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab
315a7(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
315b1(khri brgyad): kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so/ /brnyes par 'gyur ro/ /brnyes par mdzad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong
315b2(khri brgyad): pa las/ zil gyis gnon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ de nas bcom
315b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
315b4(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bskul ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan par sems lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan
315b5(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan pa'am/ gcig
315b6(khri brgyad): tu ma gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar gyur pa med de/ rab 'byor/ khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen
315b7(khri brgyad): po ston pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/ sangs
316a1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ dge ba'i chos gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing / yang dag par
316a2(khri brgyad): gzhol ba'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi
316a3(khri brgyad): chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
316a4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /
316a5(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam
316a6(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
316a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
316b1(khri brgyad): dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / bsnyel ba mi
316b2(khri brgyad): mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs
316b3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing / yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i chos rnams yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de la theg
316b4(khri brgyad): pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
316b5(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang /
316b6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi
316b7(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos rnams gang yin
317a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
317a2(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang
317a3(khri brgyad): lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
317a4(khri brgyad): dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi
317a5(khri brgyad): khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin
317a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
317a7(khri brgyad): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam
317b1(khri brgyad): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du
317b2(khri brgyad): med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin pas/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun
317b3(khri brgyad): par theg pa chen po ston pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
317b4(khri brgyad): dang | brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan/
317b5(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhing / theg pa chen po'ang gzhan pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis
317b6(khri brgyad): su dbyer med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag
317b7(khri brgyad): ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /rab 'byor/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan
318a1(khri brgyad): pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di
318a2(khri brgyad): ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar khas mi len lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar khas mi len lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus
318a3(khri brgyad): su khas mi len lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
318a4(khri brgyad): dang | 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs byang chub
318a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis shing / mi dmigs lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'
318a6(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis shing / mi dmigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du byang chub
318a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ma dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
318b1(khri brgyad): pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/
318b2(khri brgyad): bdag bdag ces bgyi ba'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'ang / byang chub sems
318b3(khri brgyad): dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar chos rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags na/ gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon
318b4(khri brgyad): par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags
318b5(khri brgyad): so| |gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi
318b6(khri brgyad): slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su ma mchis na/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par
318b7(khri brgyad): bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang
319a1(khri brgyad): zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe
319a2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len pa yin/ byang
319a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar khas mi len pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su khas mi len pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ gzugs mu med pa'i phyir
319a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/
319a5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
319a6(khri brgyad): pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams
319a7(khri brgyad): cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
319b1(khri brgyad): po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming
319b2(khri brgyad): tsam du bas lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ bdag bdag ces bgyi'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis
319b3(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'ang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /zhes smra/ tshe dang
319b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar chos rnams dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ gang mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par ma
319b5(khri brgyad): grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /gang mngon par
319b6(khri brgyad): ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma
319b7(khri brgyad): grub ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam/ zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par
320a1(khri brgyad): ma grub pa las rgud na'ang gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so/ /zhes smra/
320a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bstan ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum/ mi 'gong zhing yid 'gyod
320a3(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /zhes smra/
320a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can stong pa'i phyir
320a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
320a6(khri brgyad): sems can dngos po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len
320a7(khri brgyad): to| |gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
320b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo
320b2(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi
320b3(khri brgyad): len to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi
320b4(khri brgyad): len to/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
320b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
320b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
320b7(khri brgyad): dang | dbus rnams kyang mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi mi'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pas/ tshe
321a1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang
321a2(khri brgyad): yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
321a3(khri brgyad): dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ med pa'ang gzhan/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dben pa'ang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa'
321a4(khri brgyad): yang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/
321a5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan
321a6(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang yin pa dang / byang chub
321a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
321b1(khri brgyad): bu| rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang
321b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su
321b3(khri brgyad): khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
321b4(khri brgyad): dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa dang / dngos po med
321b5(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /nang stong pa nyid
321b6(khri brgyad): med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan la/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan zhing /
321b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa
322a1(khri brgyad): dang | dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa
322a2(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
322a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
322a4(khri brgyad): rnams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
322a5(khri brgyad): dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de bzhin du yang dag
322a6(khri brgyad): par spong ba rnams med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
322a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
322b1(khri brgyad): rnams stong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi
322b2(khri brgyad): len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i
322b3(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dpen pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin zhing / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/
322b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang gzhan ma yin zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na dran pa nye
322b5(khri brgyad): bar bzhag pa rnams med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus
322b6(khri brgyad): rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang /
322b7(khri brgyad): dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings med pa dang / de bzhin nyid
323a1(khri brgyad): med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub
323a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med pa dang / yang dag
323a3(khri brgyad): pa'i mtha'i bar du ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ med pa'ang gzhan/ stong pa'ang gzhan/
323a4(khri brgyad): dben pa'ang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du'ang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams
323a5(khri brgyad): kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar
323a6(khri brgyad): dang | byang chub sems dpa' dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag ni thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du gnyis su med
323a7(khri brgyad): cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang
323b1(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /nyan thos stong pa dang / nyan thos dben
323b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /rang sangs rgyas med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
323b3(khri brgyad): med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid
323b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa
323b5(khri brgyad): dang | ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan zhing / byang chub sems
323b6(khri brgyad): dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang gzhan la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na med pa dang / stong pa dang /
323b7(khri brgyad): dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam
324a1(khri brgyad): grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod gang 'di skad
324a2(khri brgyad): du| tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
324a3(khri brgyad): shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang /
324a4(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni
324a5(khri brgyad): mtha' dang / dbus dang / mtha' mi dmigs kyang / nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi sngon gyi
324a6(khri brgyad): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ni mtha'am/ dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
324a7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi
324b1(khri brgyad): ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ni mtha'am/ dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub
324b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa
324b3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
324b4(khri brgyad): dang | lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
324b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir nam mkha' la mtha'am/ dbus mi dmigs kyang nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
324b6(khri brgyad): du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mtha'am/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am/ dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
324b7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du
325a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
325a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo / /
325a3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ stong pa nyid
325a4(khri brgyad): la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
325a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems
325a6(khri brgyad): dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med
325a7(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
325b1(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /
325b2(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ stong pa nyid la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing / stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
325b3(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
325b4(khri brgyad): ni| dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
325b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / lam rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
325b6(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ngo / /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ngo / /bsam gyis
325b7(khri brgyad): mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gyis stong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo / /thams cad
326a1(khri brgyad): shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
326a2(khri brgyad): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ngo / /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo / /sangs rgyas
326a3(khri brgyad): kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo / /nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ngo / /rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong
326a4(khri brgyad): ngo| |de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
326a5(khri brgyad): pa stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems
326a6(khri brgyad): dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med
326a7(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi
326b1(khri brgyad): thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ma dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
326b2(khri brgyad): zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs la dmigs
326b3(khri brgyad): su med do/ /gzugs ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do/ /tshor ba ni gzugs la dmigs su med do/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dag ni 'du
326b4(khri brgyad): shes la dmigs su med do/ /'du shes ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do/ /'du shes ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dag la dmigs su med do/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du shes
326b5(khri brgyad): la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni 'du
326b6(khri brgyad): byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing
326b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med
327a1(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
327a2(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so//
327a3(khri brgyad): rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni mig dang / rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni lce la
327a4(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dag la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus
327a5(khri brgyad): ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni mig dang / rna
327a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos
327a7(khri brgyad): rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du dri ni dri dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing
327b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so/ /ro ni ro dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg bya ni reg bya dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos ni chos rnams dang / gzhan dag
327b2(khri brgyad): la'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de dag la'ang de med cing
327b3(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni de bzhin te/
327b4(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de'ang gzhan dag la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
327b5(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de ni gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /de la gzhan dag kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i
327b6(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang de bzhin te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi
327b7(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang reg pa gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig
328a1(khri brgyad): gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de la'ang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la'ang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs
328a2(khri brgyad): so| |rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
328a3(khri brgyad): de la'ang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la'ang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs
328a4(khri brgyad): so| |de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
328a5(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po
328a6(khri brgyad): dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
328a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing
328b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad ni chos thams cad la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid
328b2(khri brgyad): la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo
328b3(khri brgyad): bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la
328b4(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs ni gzungs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
328b5(khri brgyad): so so'i skye bo'i sa ni/ so so skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / byas
328b6(khri brgyad): pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
328b7(khri brgyad): pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang
329a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas ni/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ yang dag par rdzogs
329a2(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
329a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni/
329a4(khri brgyad): gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
329a5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med cing mi dmigs te bstan du med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang
329a6(khri brgyad): khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so/ /zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan
329a7(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes
329b1(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi ming de ni phyogs bcu gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang gang nas
329b2(khri brgyad): kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro'o/ /'di ltar 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa
329b3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin no/ /ming gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma
329b4(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong la/ stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
329b5(khri brgyad): ni ming tsam/ zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med la/
329b6(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang
329b7(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
330a1(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni
330a2(khri brgyad): ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang yin
330a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags
330a4(khri brgyad): pa yin pas/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
330a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam ste/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ming med la/ ming la'ang nang stong pa nyid med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las
330a6(khri brgyad): gud na'ang ming med la/ ming la'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / nang
330a7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs
330b1(khri brgyad): des na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags
330b2(khri brgyad): pa ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang ming med la/ ming la'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang
330b3(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
330b4(khri brgyad): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
330b5(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba de dag ni/ glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na'ang ming med la/
330b6(khri brgyad): ming la'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing
330b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces
331a1(khri brgyad): bya ba'i bar dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang ming med la/ ming la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
331a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs
331a3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ bdag bdag ces bgyi ba'ang bdag
331a4(khri brgyad): mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ bdag gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga
331a5(khri brgyad): la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor
331a6(khri brgyad): ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs gtan med cing mi
331a7(khri brgyad): dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon
331b1(khri brgyad): par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang
331b2(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par
331b3(khri brgyad): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe
331b4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig gi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par
331b5(khri brgyad): shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon
331b6(khri brgyad): par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par
331b7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ltag la yod/ rna ba
332a1(khri brgyad): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga yod/
332a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
332a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par
332a4(khri brgyad): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
332a5(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gtan med
332a6(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang /
332a7(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
332b1(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
332b2(khri brgyad): gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ nyan thos gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rang sangs
332b3(khri brgyad): rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa' gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/
332b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam
332b5(khri brgyad): grangs des na bdag bdag ces bya ba'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan med pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad dngos
332b6(khri brgyad): po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na zhes smra/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung pa'i ngo
332b7(khri brgyad): bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gang gi 'dus pa las byung pa'i ngo bo nyid med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs
333a1(khri brgyad): kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /

333a4(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
333a5(khri brgyad): dang | rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha
333a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
333a7(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po
333b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos
333b2(khri brgyad): thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin
333b3(khri brgyad): no| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
333b4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma
333b5(khri brgyad): med pa dang / smon pa med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o//
333b6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam
333b7(khri brgyad): par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po
334a1(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa
334a2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther
334a3(khri brgyad): zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
334a4(khri brgyad): de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma
334a5(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang
334a6(khri brgyad): bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang /
334a7(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang
334b1(khri brgyad): bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir/

334b6(khri brgyad): ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya
334b7(khri brgyad): dang / chos rnams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang mngon par
335a1(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs
335a2(khri brgyad): dang | tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir/
