335a6(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing / 'jig pa med do/ /gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa
335a7(khri brgyad): med pa de la gzhan du 'gyur pa med do/ /chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do/ /gang dag
335b1(khri brgyad): la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/ rnam grangs des na gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes
335b2(khri brgyad): dang | 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
335b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
335b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su
335b5(khri brgyad): dbyer med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na kho bos 'di skad du/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi
335b6(khri brgyad): zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam/ zhes smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir/ mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang gang byang chub kyi slad du
335b7(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so zhes smra/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
336a1(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par ma grub pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
336a2(khri brgyad): ste| de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par
336a3(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong / mngon par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par
336a4(khri brgyad): ma grub pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
336a5(khri brgyad): pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon
336a6(khri brgyad): par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang
336a7(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ tshe dang ldan
336b1(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir/ gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'god zhing / yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur
336b2(khri brgyad): la| mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra/ zhes
336b3(khri brgyad): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing / chos thams cad rmi
336b4(khri brgyad): lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ tshe dang
336b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag/ mi dngang zhing dngang
336b6(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
336b7(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi
337a1(khri brgyad): bgyid cing / 'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
337a2(khri brgyad): khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i
337a3(khri brgyad): tshe mig khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba
337a4(khri brgyad): dang | sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid
337a5(khri brgyad): lags so/ /de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o
337a6(khri brgyad): zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
337a7(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni shes rab kyi pha
337b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni nang stong pa nyid
337b2(khri brgyad): do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par
337b3(khri brgyad): mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
337b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag
337b5(khri brgyad): pa rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams
337b6(khri brgyad): dang | stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
337b7(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid do/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
338a1(khri brgyad): rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
338a2(khri brgyad): la spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni ting nge
338a3(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
338a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub
338a5(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam
338a6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/ gzugs kyi skye
338a7(khri brgyad): ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de ltar na gzugs dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//
338b1(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
338b2(khri brgyad): pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lags so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
338b3(khri brgyad): yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lags so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so/ /tshul
338b4(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
338b5(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis
338b6(khri brgyad): shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
338b7(khri brgyad): gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis
339a1(khri brgyad): su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar
339a2(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de bzhin du
339a3(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
339a4(khri brgyad): dang | stobs bcu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
339a5(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar
339a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma
339a7(khri brgyad): skyes pa ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
339b1(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin nyid
339b2(khri brgyad): kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas
339b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags
339b4(khri brgyad): so| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
339b5(khri brgyad): byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
339b6(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po
339b7(khri brgyad): ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
340a1(khri brgyad): 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
340a2(khri brgyad): shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na phung po rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de
340a3(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni
340a4(khri brgyad): khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom
340a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su
340a6(khri brgyad): ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
340a7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
340b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags
340b2(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang
340b3(khri brgyad): lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
340b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so/ /de
340b5(khri brgyad): bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
340b6(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma
340b7(khri brgyad): lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags
341a1(khri brgyad): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa
341a2(khri brgyad): nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'grib pa ni
341a3(khri brgyad): gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags so/ /
341a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
341a5(khri brgyad): lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags te/ de ltar na lam dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de
341a6(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam
341a7(khri brgyad): ma lags so/ /de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
341b1(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma
341b2(khri brgyad): mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad
341b3(khri brgyad): du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni
341b4(khri brgyad): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma
341b5(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /shes rab
341b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
341b7(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog/ /tshe
342a1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
342a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/ de'i
342a3(khri brgyad): phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do/ /chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes she na/
342a4(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen
342a5(khri brgyad): pa med do/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang
342a6(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pa med do/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes
342a7(khri brgyad): te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
342b1(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang
342b2(khri brgyad): dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / gzugs rnams sam/ sgra rnams sam/ dri rnams sam/ ro rnams sam/ reg bya rnams
342b3(khri brgyad): sam/ chos rnams sam/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ shes rab
342b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
342b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /gang las ring du song zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las
342b6(khri brgyad): ring du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song / 'gro ba drug las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
342b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song
343a1(khri brgyad): ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes
343a2(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
343a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa
343a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song
343a5(khri brgyad): ba zhes bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam
343a6(khri brgyad): grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes
343a7(khri brgyad): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi
343b1(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /gzugs
343b2(khri brgyad): zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
343b3(khri brgyad): ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de
343b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug
343b5(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar
343b6(khri brgyad): mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/
343b7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin
344a1(khri brgyad): du| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
344a2(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang /
344a3(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma
344a4(khri brgyad): yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin
344a5(khri brgyad): du nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag
344a6(khri brgyad): ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya
344a7(khri brgyad): ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
344b1(khri brgyad): dang | rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi
344b2(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams
344b3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes
344b4(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces
344b5(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
344b6(khri brgyad): ni| chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang
344b7(khri brgyad): lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /de bzhin
345a1(khri brgyad): du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
345a2(khri brgyad): chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
345a3(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so/ /zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras
345a4(khri brgyad): pa| tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang
345a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
345a6(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba med
345a7(khri brgyad): do| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha
345b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
345b2(khri brgyad): bu| de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
345b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam
345b4(khri brgyad): grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /
345b5(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong
345b6(khri brgyad): ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des
345b7(khri brgyad): na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
346a1(khri brgyad): ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//
346a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi
346a3(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
346a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs
346a5(khri brgyad): des na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir
346a6(khri brgyad): khyod 'di skad du/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa
346a7(khri brgyad): gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
346b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad
346b2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags/ zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /
346b3(khri brgyad): gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /
346b4(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar
346b5(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
346b6(khri brgyad): dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa
346b7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos
347a1(khri brgyad): de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par
347a2(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
347a3(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa
347a4(khri brgyad): de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma
347a5(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs
347a6(khri brgyad): su bgyis pa lags so/ /gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /zhes smra/ rab 'byor
347a7(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /gzugs nyid
347b1(khri brgyad): kyang skye ba med pa'o/ /skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par
347b2(khri brgyad): shes pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang yang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /gang
347b3(khri brgyad): yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing
347b4(khri brgyad): 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so
347b5(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin
347b6(khri brgyad): la| skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
347b7(khri brgyad): bu| rnam grangs des na gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
348a1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
348a2(khri brgyad): chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor
348a3(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bdag gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags
348a4(khri brgyad): so| |shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sems can dang / srog dang / gso pa dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba
348a5(khri brgyad): po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel
348a6(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du shin tu
348a7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
348b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par
348b2(khri brgyad): dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma
348b3(khri brgyad): mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang /
348b4(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad
348b5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i
348b6(khri brgyad): skye bo'i chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong
348b7(khri brgyad): ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs
349a1(khri brgyad): rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong
349a2(khri brgyad): lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na/ gzugs
349a3(khri brgyad): ni skye ba med pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med pa yin/ khams rnams skye ba med pa yin/ skye mched rnams skye ba med
349a4(khri brgyad): pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
349a5(khri brgyad): cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
349a6(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba med pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo'i
349a7(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang
349b1(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems
349b2(khri brgyad): dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te gzugs
349b3(khri brgyad): kyang skye ba med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa yin na ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ nyan thos kyis kyang / nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/ de de
349b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/ 'gro ba rnam pa
349b5(khri brgyad): lnga'ang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub rnam pa lnga'ang thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te chos thams
349b6(khri brgyad): cad skye ba med pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ lan gcig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
349b7(khri brgyad): mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ phyir mi 'ong bas ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang
350a1(khri brgyad): mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis ni rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/
350a2(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong bar byed/ ci'i phyir de bzhin
350a3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
350a4(khri brgyad): pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /kho bo ni
350a5(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yod par mi 'dod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
350a6(khri brgyad): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / skye ba med pa la rang byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas yod par
350a7(khri brgyad): mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba'i 'du
350b1(khri brgyad): shes kyis mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar dka' ba'i 'du shes la gnas pas ni/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi
350b2(khri brgyad): nus pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'on kyang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed na sems can
350b3(khri brgyad): dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ ji ltar
350b4(khri brgyad): bdag bdag ces bya ba'ang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la'ang de ltar sems bskyed
350b5(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur na/ dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
350b6(khri brgyad): ni thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni skye ba med pa la de bzhin
350b7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do/ /chos ma skyes pas kyang 'thob pa ma skyes
351a1(khri brgyad): pa 'thob par mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob bam/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyi
351a2(khri brgyad): 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod la/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyis
351a3(khri brgyad): 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci 'thob pa'ang med la/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med dam/ rab 'byor gyis
351a4(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'thob pa'ang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang yod de/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'thob pa dang / mngon
351a5(khri brgyad): par rtogs pa dag ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs
351a6(khri brgyad): rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa yin te/ don dam par ni 'thob pa'ang med/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med/
351a7(khri brgyad): rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'ang med/ phyir mi 'ong ba'ang med/ dgra bcom pa'ang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang med/
351b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyang med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa
351b2(khri brgyad): med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa bzhin du/ skye ba med pa'ang de lta yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan
351b3(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na skye ba'ang mi skye la skye ba med pa'ang mi skye'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos ma skyes so/ /chos ma skyes so/ /zhes bya bar brjod
351b4(khri brgyad): par spobs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang brjod par spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ chos ma skyes so/ /
351b5(khri brgyad): chos ma skyes so/ /zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spobs sam/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ chos ma skyes so/ /chos ma skyes so/ /zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho bo
351b6(khri brgyad): la med do/ /chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med par brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho bo la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang /
351b7(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma
352a1(khri brgyad): yin zhing gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/
352a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ brjod pa'ang skye ba med/ spobs pa'ang skye ba med/ chos kyang skye ba med de/ gang dag las brtsams te brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin
352a3(khri brgyad): nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o/ /spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o/ /chos ni skye ba med pa'o/ /gang dag las brtsams te
352a4(khri brgyad): brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med
352a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
352a6(khri brgyad): dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
352a7(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang skye ba med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
352b1(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ brjod pa skye ba med do/ /spobs pa skye ba med do/ /chos skye ba med do/ /gang dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/ /phung
352b2(khri brgyad): po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin
352b3(khri brgyad): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du
352b4(khri brgyad): skye ba med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do/ /de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 'gro ba lnga po dag tha dad pa yin gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin
352b5(khri brgyad): no| |rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du
352b6(khri brgyad): yod pa de bzhin du/ 'gro ba lnga po dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha dad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar don dam par ni las
352b7(khri brgyad): kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med/ skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med/ rnam par byang ba'ang med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
353a1(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor/ ci chos ma skyes pa skye'am/ 'on te chos skyes pa skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa skye bar yang mi
353a2(khri brgyad): 'dod la/ chos skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ khyod chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
353a3(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni gzugs ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /de bzhin
353a4(khri brgyad): du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang /

353a6(khri brgyad): mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
353a7(khri brgyad): kho bo ni gzugs skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
353b1(khri brgyad): skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus
353b2(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci ma skyes pa'i chos skye'am/ skyes pa'i chos skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ma skyes pa'ang mi skye la/ skyes pa'ang mi skye'o//
353b3(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar skyes pa gang yin pa dang / ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ skye ba
353b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med
353b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
353b6(khri brgyad): dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
353b7(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ lus kyi 'du byed rnams dang / ngag gi 'du byed rnams dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
354a1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na brjod pa skye ba med/ spobs pa skye ba med/ chos skye
354a2(khri brgyad): ba med/ gang dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni/ chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bzhag
354a3(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni/ gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de nyid las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di
354a4(khri brgyad): ltar chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ji ltar na chos thams cad la mi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
354a5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
354a6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis
354a7(khri brgyad): ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
354b1(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/
354b2(khri brgyad): gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
354b3(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/
354b4(khri brgyad): gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka
354b5(khri brgyad): med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
354b6(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par
354b7(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs
355a1(khri brgyad): so| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka
355a2(khri brgyad): med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med
355a3(khri brgyad): par yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
355a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / lam ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams dang / mi
355a5(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na'ang mi gnas/
355a6(khri brgyad): phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang
355a7(khri brgyad): na'ang mi gnas/ /phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong
355b1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod bas gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /
355b2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol
355b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
355b4(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su sbyang
355b5(khri brgyad): bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su
355b6(khri brgyad): sbyong bar byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do/ /de bzhin du
355b7(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
356a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang
356a2(khri brgyad): yin| 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag tu gyur cing / dge sbyong
356a3(khri brgyad): dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / 'dren pa dang / slong mo pa zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la
356a4(khri brgyad): ni bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog/ me tog phreng 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog phreng / spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/ byug
356a5(khri brgyad): pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/ mal cha dang stan 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha dang stan/ 'tshog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tshog
356a6(khri brgyad): chas/ sman 'dod pa rnams la ni sman/ mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed cing / bu 'dod pa rnams la ni bu sbyin par byed/ bu mo 'dod pa rnams la ni
356a7(khri brgyad): bu mo sbyin par byed/ chung ma 'dod pa rnams la ni chung ma sbyin par byed/ rgyal srid 'dod pa rnams la ni rgyal srid sbyin par byed/ mgo 'dod pa rnams la ni mgo sbyin
356b1(khri brgyad): par byed/ mig 'dod pa rnams la ni mig sbyin par byed/ yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa rnams la ni yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par byed/ sha dang / khrag dang / rkang 'dod pa rnams
356b2(khri brgyad): la ni sha dang khrag dang rkang sbyin par byed la de'ang gnas shing yongs su gtong bar byed de/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o/ /'di ni len pa'o/ /'di ni sbyin pa'o/ /bdag ni ser sna med pa'o//
356b3(khri brgyad): bdag ni sbyin bdag go/ bdag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ /bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /snyam
356b4(khri brgyad): du sems shing sbyin pa de'ang byin nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di
356b5(khri brgyad): la rang bde bar 'gyur zhing / len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig/ ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de ni
356b6(khri brgyad): chags pa gsum la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin par 'du shes pa ste/
356b7(khri brgyad): chags pa gsum po de dag la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
357a1(khri brgyad): zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags shing mi 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten
357a2(khri brgyad): las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/ /de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
357a3(khri brgyad): bu| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ bdag tu mi dmigs/ len par mi dmigs/ sbyin par mi dmigs shing / de'i rnam par smin pa
357a4(khri brgyad): la'ang mngon par dga' ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
357a5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la stobs par byed kyang sems can thams cad kyang
357a6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs/ bdag kyang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs la/ sbyin pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed cing / byang chub
357a7(khri brgyad): kyang mi dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
357b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags la 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o
357b2(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// //
357b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bco brgyad pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten pa'i yang yod/ 'jig rten las
357b4(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i yang yod de/ de la 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag
357b5(khri brgyad): gis ser sna'i sems tshar bcad do/ /zhes dmigs pa la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de'ang bdag dang / sems can dang / sbyin pa'i 'du shes la gnas shing / de
357b6(khri brgyad): bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ste/ dmigs pa la gnas nas/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po'am/ zin pa'am/ ma zin pa'am/ ci bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong
357b7(khri brgyad): ba dang / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas shing / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dmigs pa la gnas te/ bdag tu lta ba la gnas/ sems can du lta ba dang / dge bar
358a1(khri brgyad): lta ba la gnas shing / tshul khrims dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag la bsten pa tshul khrims dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing byang
358a2(khri brgyad): chub dmigs nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / de bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod la/ bdag dang sems can dang / bzod par lta ba la
358a3(khri brgyad): gnas shing / sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa bzod par byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
358a4(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / de lus dmigs shing / bsod nams kyi tshogs dmigs la/ ye shes kyi tshogs dmigs shing / bdag
358a5(khri brgyad): dmigs la sems can rnams dmigs te/ byang chub dmigs shing / brtson 'grus brtsam ste/ de brtson 'grus brtsam pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / de byams pa
358a6(khri brgyad): dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms sgom par byed cing / bsam gtan rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / snyoms par
358a7(khri brgyad): 'jug pa rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ ldang bar yang byed cing / de dag gi ro myang bar yang byed la/ de dag gis rlom sems su'ang byed cing / dmigs pa'i lta ba
358b1(khri brgyad): can du gyur nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni 'jig rten pa'i 'o/ /de gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs/ tshor
358b2(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs shing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du dmigs nas stong pa nyid bsgom ste/ de
358b3(khri brgyad): dmigs pa la spyod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ de'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
358b4(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo ba dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bdag dang gzhan
358b5(khri brgyad): gyi don gyi phyir dmigs nas/ thabs ma yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / phung po gsum pa'i bsod nams thabs ma yin pas sems can thams cad
358b6(khri brgyad): dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes
358b7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ bdag dang / sems can dang / sbyin par bya ba mi dmigs pa'i shes rab 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
359a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / tshul khrims dang / byang chub mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi
359a2(khri brgyad): phyir tshul khrims yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / bzod pa dang / byang chub mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
359a3(khri brgyad): pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / lus dang / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub

359a5(khri brgyad): dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mi dmigs pas byang chub
359a6(khri brgyad): kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang yongs su bsngo ba dug med pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa dang / yongs
359a7(khri brgyad): su bsngo ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba mtshungs pa med pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba dpag tu med pas/ bla
359b1(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa ste/ de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir na/ 'jig rten pa zhes

359b4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis 'jig rten sgrol ba
359b5(khri brgyad): dang / gang dag 'jig rten sel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gang dag gis sgrol bar byed pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten las
359b6(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten las sgrol ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten du sgrol bar byed pa ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/

360a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni/
360a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang
360a3(khri brgyad): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
360a4(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
360a5(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems
360a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi skyes bu'i rtsal yin/ rab 'byor gyis
360a7(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
360b1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad bskyed par
360b2(khri brgyad): byed pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /
360b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
360b4(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
360b5(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas bar gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
360b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs
360b7(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
361a1(khri brgyad): nyid la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha
361a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa na gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur med cing rmongs pa med par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
361a3(khri brgyad): ni| 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba'i phyir/ 'di ltar gnas pa 'dis gnas pa yin par rig par bya ste/
361a4(khri brgyad): de'ang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /

361a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par 'dod na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ltar na sems can thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe

361b1(khri brgyad): so| |legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang dag pa'i tshig brjod pas don de nyid yongs su bzung ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dmigs su phebs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe
361b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/ sems can stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya/ sems can dben pa'i
361b3(khri brgyad): phyir yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya/ sems can ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya zhing / sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med
361b4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/
361b5(khri brgyad): gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya/ gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir

361b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa
362a1(khri brgyad): nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo
362a2(khri brgyad): bo nyid med par rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du khams
362a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / bden pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang /

362a6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs
362a7(khri brgyad): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnas pa 'di dang / yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral lo/ /zhes kho bo smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
362b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor legs so/ /legs so/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
362b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar shes rab kyi
362b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
362b4(khri brgyad): rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg

362b6(khri brgyad): chem mo/ /shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ dbus
362b7(khri brgyad): dma' na mtha' mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
363a1(khri brgyad): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
363a2(khri brgyad): ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag na'ang de
363a3(khri brgyad): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston
363a4(khri brgyad): par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu khor yug kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
363a5(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab
363a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las srog chags 'bum nyi khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi
363a7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad
363b1(khri brgyad): na'ang sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
363b2(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi yum/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas stong
363b3(khri brgyad): g sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal po chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du
363b4(khri brgyad): 'dus par gyur to/ /de bzhin du lha'i dbang po brgya byin rnams dang / rab 'thab bral rnams dang / yongs su dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
363b5(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyang / tshangs pa'i bar dag dang lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tshangs
363b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag ji snyed 'khod pa rnams kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur to/ /rgyal
363b7(khri brgyad): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'
364a1(khri brgyad): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od
364a2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang /
364a3(khri brgyad): cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi gan na/ lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od de
364a4(khri brgyad): dag thams cad ni lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni/ de dag gi nang na mchog tu snang ngo / /phul du snang ngo / /khyad par du
364a5(khri brgyad): 'phags par snang ngo / /rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med par snang ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi gan na lcags
364a6(khri brgyad): nag po ni ka ba tshig pa bzhin du lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin no/ /de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi gan na lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam
364a7(khri brgyad): par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od de dag thams cad kyang lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog

364b2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
