364b4(khri brgyad): 'khod pa de dag thams cad btsun pa rab 'byor la chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
364b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ byang chub

364b7(khri brgyad): ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la/ yid la zung zhig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

365a2(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ba dag bstan par byas/ lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag
365a3(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyis shig /gang dag yang dag pa skyon med pa
365a4(khri brgyad): la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mthu med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi mtshams bcad pa'i phyir

365a6(khri brgyad): par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes

370a6(khri brgyad): dpas stong ste/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
370a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
370b1(khri brgyad): gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa'o ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
370b2(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar gyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi
370b3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran
370b4(khri brgyad): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
370b5(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni/ sangs
370b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas
370b7(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
371a1(khri brgyad): yang ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems
371a2(khri brgyad): dpas stong ste/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
371a3(khri brgyad): ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas
371a4(khri brgyad): stong / theg pa chen po ni theg pa chen pos stong / nyan thos ni nyan thos nyid kyis stong / rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis stong / sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis stong /
371a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/ de ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen
371a6(khri brgyad): po'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer
371a7(khri brgyad): med do/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems
371b1(khri brgyad): dpas stong ste/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med
371b2(khri brgyad): de| kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
371b3(khri brgyad): skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/
371b4(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
371b5(khri brgyad): la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /mig la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /gzugs la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes
371b6(khri brgyad): pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la dmigs
371b7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /chos rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par
372a1(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /sa'i khams la dmigs
372a2(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
372a3(khri brgyad): gnas par mi bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po
372a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
372a5(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
372a6(khri brgyad): gnas par mi bya'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas
372a7(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ de ltar na gzugs zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /rnam
372b1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /de ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//
372b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba'i bar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /gzugs rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde
372b3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba dang / stong
372b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas
372b5(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya
372b6(khri brgyad): ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong
372b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /
373a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub
373a2(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / smon
373a3(khri brgyad): pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba'i bar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab
373a4(khri brgyad): tu phye ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang
373a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye
373a6(khri brgyad): ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ni sbyin gnas so zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du lan gcig
373a7(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sbyin gnas
373b1(khri brgyad): so zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa dang po la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /
373b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sa bcu pa'i bar la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas pa yod na g.yo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
373b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims
373b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
373b5(khri brgyad): par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /yang dag
373b6(khri brgyad): par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul
373b7(khri brgyad): gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /
374a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par bya'o snyam du dmigs
374a2(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par
374a3(khri brgyad): mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen
374a4(khri brgyad): bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams su 'gro bar bya zhing / chos thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du bsgrub cing / gzhan dag
374a5(khri brgyad): la'ang bstan par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas
374a6(khri brgyad): kyi zhing ci 'dra ba de lta bu dag bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
374a7(khri brgyad): la spyad de/ sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems
374b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
374b2(khri brgyad): me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ brjed par bya/
374b3(khri brgyad): mchod par bya zhing / ras bcos bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi sku la gsol
374b4(khri brgyad): bar bya'o snyam du'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa dag bla na
374b5(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mig lnga bsgrub par
374b6(khri brgyad): bya ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /ting nge
374b7(khri brgyad): 'dzin thams cad bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gang dang gang gis rnam par rtse bar 'dod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dang nges rnam par rtse
375a1(khri brgyad): bar bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi
375a2(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi
375a3(khri brgyad): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /byams pa chen po
375a4(khri brgyad): dang | snying rje chen po bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lus la bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i
375a5(khri brgyad): tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu lus la bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi
375a6(khri brgyad): rjes su 'brang ba ni brgyad pa'o zhes bya ba dang / re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /rigs nas rigs
375a7(khri brgyad): su skye ba dang / bar chad gcig pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /tshe zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad pa ni gang zag mgo mnyam pa zhes bya bar dmigs
375b1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ni bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong pa ni
375b2(khri brgyad): 'jig rten 'dir lan gcig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir
375b3(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba ni der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /dgra
375b4(khri brgyad): bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa ni 'di nyid la phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
375b5(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//
375b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas
375b7(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bag
376a1(khri brgyad): chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad do zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
376a2(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du
376a3(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas nas sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du de lta bur
376a4(khri brgyad): yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te/ ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pas/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas
376a5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /bdag gi tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes
376a6(khri brgyad): bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /bdag gi mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan re re'ang bsod nams brgyas yongs su grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam
376a7(khri brgyad): du'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi khyon yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dang / de
376b1(khri brgyad): bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi khyon ci tsam pa de tsam du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /
376b2(khri brgyad): bdag gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje las grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /bdag gi byang chub kyi shing las
376b3(khri brgyad): sems can gang dag gis dri ma nams pa de dag 'dod chags kyi gnod pa med pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gnod pa med cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems 'ga'
376b4(khri brgyad): yang bskyed par mi 'gyur bar sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gang dag dri de la snom par 'gyur ba
376b5(khri brgyad): de dag la lus dang / sems kyi nad 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dri dag 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /bdag
376b6(khri brgyad): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzugs kyi sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya
376b7(khri brgyad): par yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
377a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes
377a2(khri brgyad): bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
377a3(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
377a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig
377a5(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang
377a6(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang
377a7(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos thams cad ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar
377b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
377b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
377b3(khri brgyad): bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci la gnas snyam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs
377b4(khri brgyad): pa ni ci la'ang mi gnas pa yin la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang ci la'ang gnas pa ma yin te/ de
377b5(khri brgyad): ni gzugs la'ang mi gnas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la'ang mi gnas/ 'dus byas kyi khams la'ang mi gnas/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams
377b6(khri brgyad): la'ang mi gnas shing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la'ang mi gnas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang mi gnas pa yin no/ /de skad ces
377b7(khri brgyad): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
378a1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs la gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas
378a2(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
378a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
378a4(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu kha cig
378a5(khri brgyad): 'di snyam du sems te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi skad dang / gnod sbyin gyis smras pa dang / gnod sbyin gyis brjod pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshig gang dag yod pa de dag
378a6(khri brgyad): ni brjod na shes par yang rung gi/ 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smra ba dang / brjod pa dang / 'chad pa dang / ston pa 'di ni shes par mi rung ngo
378a7(khri brgyad): snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag/ gang smras pa
378b1(khri brgyad): shes par mi rung ngam/ lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor/ shes par mi rung ngo / /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag/ 'di ltar yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod de/ gang ma
378b2(khri brgyad): brjod pa de ni thos par mi rung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge med pa ste/ de la ni nyan pa'am ston pa'ang med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
378b3(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la'ang yi ge med pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu dag/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
378b4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul pa mdzad de/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag kyang mngon par
378b5(khri brgyad): sprul la/ sprul pa des sprul pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la chos bstan par gyur na lha'i bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ de la sus kyang ci'ang bstan pa'am/ mnyan pa yod snyam mam/ lha'i
378b6(khri brgyad): bu rnams kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sprul pa lta bu ste/ de la sus kyang bshad pa med cing
378b7(khri brgyad): sus kyang mnyan pa med la/ sus kyang shes pa med do/ /lha'i bu dag/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
379a1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston pa zhig mthong bar gyur na lha'i bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ de la sus kyang bshad pa'am/ mnyan pa'am/ shes pa yod
379a2(khri brgyad): snyam mam/ lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rmi lam lta bu ste/ de la sus
379a3(khri brgyad): kyang bshad pa med cing / sus kyang mnyan pa med la/ sus kyang shes pa med do/ /lha'i bu dag/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi gnyis shig ri khrod gcig tu 'khod de/ sangs rgyas kyi bsngags
379a4(khri brgyad): pa brjod/ chos kyi bsngags pa brjod/ dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod nas de gnyis kyi skad kyi brag ca byung bar gyur na/ lha'i bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ de la gcig gi
379a5(khri brgyad): brag ces/ gcig shos kyi brag ca'i sgra shes par gyur snyam mam/ lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag/
379a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang brag ca lta bu ste/ de la sus kyang bshad pa med cing / sus kyang mnyan pa med la/ sus kyang shes pa med do/ /lha'i bu dag /'di lta ste/ dper
379a7(khri brgyad): na| sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
379b1(khri brgyad): shig mngon par sprul nas/ des sprul pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la chos bstan par gyur na/ lha'i bu dag/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de la sus kyang bshad pa'am/ mnyan pa'am/ shes
379b2(khri brgyad): pa yod snyam mam/ lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ de la sus kyang bshad
379b3(khri brgyad): pa med cing / sus kyang nyan pa med la/ sus kyang shes pa med do/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni zab pa bas kyang ches zab pa ston/ phra ba
379b4(khri brgyad): bas kyang ches phra ba la 'jug pas/ kye ma 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsal bar byed pa'o/ /kye ma 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
379b5(khri brgyad): pa gsal bar byed pa'o snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i
379b6(khri brgyad): bu dag/ gzugs ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
379b7(khri brgyad): lha'i bu dag/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin/
380a1(khri brgyad): phra ba ma yin no/ /mig ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin no/ /gzugs ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba
380a2(khri brgyad): ma yin no/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ sa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
380a3(khri brgyad): rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ tshul khrims
380a4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa
380a5(khri brgyad): ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
380a6(khri brgyad): rnams ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
380a7(khri brgyad): lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
380b1(khri brgyad): pa bco brgyad ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni zab pa ma yin/
380b2(khri brgyad): phra ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'o
380b3(khri brgyad): na chos bstan pa 'di la gzugs su btags pa'ang med dam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par btags pa'ang med dam/ khams rnams dang / skye
380b4(khri brgyad): mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags pa'ang med dam/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams su btags pa'ang med dam/ stong pa nyid
380b5(khri brgyad): thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
380b6(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du btags pa'ang med dam/ chos bstan pa 'di la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur btags pa'ang med dam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi
380b7(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid du btags pa'ang med dam/ byang chub sems dpar btags pa'ang med dam/ sangs rgyas nyid du btags
381a1(khri brgyad): pa'ang med dam/ byang chub tu btags pa'ang med dam/ yi ge rnams su btags pa'ang med dam snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag
381a2(khri brgyad): gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub
381a3(khri brgyad): ni brjod du med cing / bsnyad du med pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mnyan du med cing shes par byar med do/ /lha'i bu dag /de ltar na gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod
381a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa de dag gis kyang bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo / /gang dag lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / gang
381a5(khri brgyad): dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / gang dag dgra bcom pa nyid dang / gang dag rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / gang dag sangs rgyas nyid mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa de dag gis kyang
381a6(khri brgyad): bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ste/ lha'i bu dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin chad bsnyad du med pa dang / mnyan du med par
381a7(khri brgyad): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u dang po zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //
381b1(khri brgyad): de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la chos nyan pa ji lta bu dag tu 'dod par bya snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi
381b2(khri brgyad): sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag /bdag la chos nyan pa ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bur 'dod par bya'o/ /bdag
381b3(khri brgyad): la chos nyan pa ni sprul pa lta bur 'dod par bya ste/ de dag ni cung zad kyang nyan pa med cing / kun chub par byed pa med la/ mngon sum du byed pa med do/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis/
381b4(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ ci sems can de dag kyang sgyu ma lta bu yin la/ chos nyan pa de dag kyang sgyu ma lta bu yin nam/ sems can
381b5(khri brgyad): de dag kyang sprul pa lta bu yin la/ chos nyan pa de dag kyang sprul pa lta bu yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ sems can de dag kyang
381b6(khri brgyad): sgyu ma lta bu yin la/ chos nyan pa de dag kyang sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /sems can de dag kyang sprul pa lta bu yin la/ chos nyan pa de dag kyang sprul pa lta bu yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /
381b7(khri brgyad): sems can rnams ni rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin te/ lha'i bu dag /gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
382a1(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /mig kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /de bzhin
382a2(khri brgyad): du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /sgra dang / dri dang /
382a3(khri brgyad): ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg
382a4(khri brgyad): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
382a5(khri brgyad): dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /tshul khrims
382a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
382a7(khri brgyad): rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma
382b1(khri brgyad): lta bu yin no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams
382b2(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
382b3(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'ang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma
382b4(khri brgyad): lta bu yin no/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa'ang
382b5(khri brgyad): rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /rang byang chub kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /rang sangs rgyas kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /bla na med pa yang dag par
382b6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
382b7(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu yin na/ ci mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes
383a1(khri brgyad): smra'am/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag/ kho bo ni mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes smra ste/ lha'i bu dag gal te/ mya ngan
383a2(khri brgyad): las 'das pa bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos 'ga' zhig yod na'ang de'ang rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /zhes kho bo smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag /'di ltar rmi
383a3(khri brgyad): lam gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe
383a4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung
383a5(khri brgyad): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong phrag du ma dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol
383a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar mthong bar dka' ba/ 'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba/ 'di ltar zhi ba/ 'di ltar gya nom pa/ 'di ltar phra ba/ 'di ltar gzhan ma yin pa/ 'di
383a7(khri brgyad): ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ 'di ltar mkhas pa/ 'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa/ 'di ltar mkhas pa dang / mdzangs pas rig par bya ba 'di len par byed par 'gyur ba
383b1(khri brgyad): su dag yod/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
383b2(khri brgyad): ldan pa dag / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar mthong bar dka' ba/ 'di ltar rtogs par
383b3(khri brgyad): dka' ba/ 'di ltar zhi ba/ 'di ltar gya nom pa/ 'di ltar phra ba/ 'di ltar gzhan ma yin pa/ 'di ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ 'di ltar mkhas pa/ 'di ltar shin tu
383b4(khri brgyad): 'phags pa/ 'di ltar mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig par bya ba 'di len par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag gam/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'am/
383b5(khri brgyad): brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa'am/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
383b6(khri brgyad): gyis yongs su zin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar mthong bar dka' ba/ 'di ltar rtogs par dka'
383b7(khri brgyad): ba| 'di ltar zhi ba/ 'di ltar gya nom pa/ 'di ltar phra ba/ 'di ltar gzhan ma yin pa/ 'di ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ 'di ltar mkhas pa/ 'di ltar shin tu
384a1(khri brgyad): 'phags pa/ 'di ltar mkhas pa dang / mdzangs pas rig par bya ba 'di len par byed par 'gyur te/ de dag ni gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
384a2(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par
384a3(khri brgyad): rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma
384a4(khri brgyad): med pa gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog
384a5(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma med pa rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs smon pa med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /smon pa
384a6(khri brgyad): med pa gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs skye ba med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /skye ba med pa gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam
384a7(khri brgyad): par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs 'gag pa med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'gag pa med pa gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//
384b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
384b2(khri brgyad): par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /smon pa med pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du skye ba med ces bya ba dang / 'gag
384b3(khri brgyad): pa med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams
384b4(khri brgyad): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /
384b5(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
384b6(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin du rgyun
384b7(khri brgyad): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /rnam pa
385a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur
385a2(khri brgyad): ro| |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi
385a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa med do zhes bya ba rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /smon pa med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
385a4(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med ces bya ba dang / 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus
385a5(khri brgyad): byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid 'dus byas kyi khams so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas kyi khams mtshan ma med
385a6(khri brgyad): do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma med pa 'dus byas kyi khams so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas kyi khams smon pa med do zhes bya
385a7(khri brgyad): par rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /smon pa med pa 'dus byas kyi khams so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'dus byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya ba
385b1(khri brgyad): dang | 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid
385b2(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas kyi khams so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams mtshan ma med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas
385b3(khri brgyad): kyi khams so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams smon pa med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /smon pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya
385b4(khri brgyad): bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'dus ma byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya ba dang / 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
385b5(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dag/ rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa/ 'di ltar mkhas pa dang / mdzangs pas rig par bya ba'i
385b6(khri brgyad): bar 'di la len par byed pa ni su'ang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dir chos 'ga' yang ma bshad/ ma brjod/ ma bstan pa'i phyir te/ ji ltar 'dir chos 'ga' yang ma bshad ma
385b7(khri brgyad): brjod/ ma bstan pa de ltar ji ltar 'di len par byed pa'i sems can su'ang med do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan
386a1(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par
386a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rgya cher bstan cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
386a3(khri brgyad): sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar dag kyang bstan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
386a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par
386a5(khri brgyad): spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
386a6(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang bstan cing / byang chub sems dpa'
386a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams rdzus te skye bar 'gyur
386b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / de bzhin du mngon par shes pa yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur
386b2(khri brgyad): zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / brjod par bya ba dang / mchod par byed par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu dag 'grub par
386b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang brjed
386b4(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par g.yeng ba med cing / mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun mi chad pa'i
386b5(khri brgyad): spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las khyad
386b6(khri brgyad): par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur ba dag kyang bstan pa ma yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin
386b7(khri brgyad): te| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang
387a1(khri brgyad): rgya cher bstan to/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
387a2(khri brgyad): po rnams 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang bstan te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan to/ /ci zhig mi dmigs
387a3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis she na/ bdag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du
387a4(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i
387a5(khri brgyad): tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs
387a6(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
387a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i
387b1(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
387b2(khri brgyad): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
387b3(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan
387b4(khri brgyad): to| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po
387b5(khri brgyad): dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher bstan/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
387b6(khri brgyad): rnams 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
387b7(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ theg pa gsum po dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher bstan to/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ theg
388a1(khri brgyad): pa gsum po dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher bstan to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung
388a2(khri brgyad): ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang bstan to/ /phyi stong pa nyid
388a3(khri brgyad): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
388a4(khri brgyad): po rnams 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang bstan to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ rtogs
388a5(khri brgyad): par dka' ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o/ / //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char phab cing
388a6(khri brgyad): bstan pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdag gis me tog dag cig mngon par sprul la/ me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
388a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gtor bar bya'o/ /mngon par gtor bar bya'o/ /
388b1(khri brgyad): mngon par rab tu gtor bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag
388b2(khri brgyad): thams cad kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char phab cing / bstan pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ bdag cag gis me tog dag cig mngon par
388b3(khri brgyad): sprul la/ me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor dang /
388b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gtor bar bya'o/ /mngon par gtor bar bya'o/ /mngon par rab tu gtor bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / stong gsum gyi
388b5(khri brgyad): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dag mngon par sprul nas/
388b6(khri brgyad): me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
388b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag gis me tog de dag mngon par gtor ma
389a1(khri brgyad): thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog chal par bkram par gyur cing / steng gi bar snang la'ang me tog gi khang pa
389a2(khri brgyad): brtsegs pa nyams dga' ba/ yid du 'ong ba zhig tu'ang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag lha'i bu dag gis mngon par
389a3(khri brgyad): gtor ba'i me tog 'di lta bu dag ni bdag gis sngon chad lha'i gnas thams cad na'ang spyod par ma mthong ngo / /gang dag lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag
389a4(khri brgyad): ni yal ga 'gel pa las skyes pa'ang ma yin/ chu las skyes pa'ang ma yin/ thang las skyes pa'ang ma yin te/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa yin no/ /gang dag lha'i bu dag gis mngon
389a5(khri brgyad): par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba yin te/ yal ga 'gel pa las skyes pa ni ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
389a6(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba'ang ma yin/ yal ga 'gel pa las skyes pa'ang ma yin te/ me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa yin
389a7(khri brgyad): no| |rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ 'di skad du me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba'ang ma yin la/ yal ga 'gel pa las skyes pa'ang ma yin te/ me tog 'di dag ni
389b1(khri brgyad): nges par ma skyes pa yin no zhes zer pa ni/ kau shi ka/ gang dag nges par ma skyes pa de dag ni me tog ma yin no/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ ci me tog 'di dag nyi tshe nges par
389b2(khri brgyad): ma skyes par zad dam/ 'on te gzugs kyang nges par ma skyes pa yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang nges par ma skyes pa yin/ rab 'byor
389b3(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma skyes par ma zad kyi/ kau shi ka/ gzugs kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /kau shi
389b4(khri brgyad): ka / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/
389b5(khri brgyad): mig kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par
389b6(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ sa'i khams kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ chu'i khams
389b7(khri brgyad): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par
390a1(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma
390a2(khri brgyad): yin no/ /kau shi ka/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
390a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ nang stong pa nyid kyang nges par ma skyes
390a4(khri brgyad): pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes
390a5(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa
390a6(khri brgyad): de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams
390a7(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lam ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/
390b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang
390b2(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma
390b3(khri brgyad): yin no/ /kau shi ka/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par
390b4(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas nyid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
390b5(khri brgyad): yang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang /
390b6(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/ nges par
390b7(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma
391a1(khri brgyad): gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston pa ni shes rab zab pa yin no/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
391a2(khri brgyad): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kye ma rab 'byor 'di btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston
391a3(khri brgyad): pa ni shes rab zab pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di
391a4(khri brgyad): btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ gzugs ni btags pa tsam ste/ btags
391a5(khri brgyad): pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid yin pas/ rab 'byor ni de dang mi 'gal bar ston to/ /kau shi ka/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
391a6(khri brgyad): pa ni btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid yin pas/ rab 'byor ni de dang mi 'gal bar ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid gang yin pa de
391a7(khri brgyad): ni 'gal ba med pa yin la/ gang 'gal ba med pa de ni/ rab 'byor ston par byed cing / mi 'gal bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched
391b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
391b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong pa
391b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang /
391b4(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
391b5(khri brgyad): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'ang btags pa tsam
391b6(khri brgyad): mo| |kau shi ka/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
391b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyang btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid yin pas/ rab 'byor ni de dang mi 'gal bar ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ chos
392a1(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gal ba med pa yin pa/ 'gal ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor ston par byed cing mi 'gal bar byed pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ de
392a2(khri brgyad): ltar na/ rab 'byor ni btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston to/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de de bzhin te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams
392a3(khri brgyad): cad btags pa tsam du bstan pa de ni de bzhin no/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar chos thams cad btags pa tsam du rig par byas la/ shes
392a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la mi slob bo/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
392a5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / gang la bslab
392a6(khri brgyad): par bya ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
392a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su
392b1(khri brgyad): mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
392b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /nang stong
392b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid la'ang mi slob bo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la'ang mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i nang stong pa nyid kyang yang
392b4(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la'ang mi slob bo/ /yang dag
392b5(khri brgyad): par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs
392b6(khri brgyad): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la'ang mi slob bo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
392b7(khri brgyad): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid la'ang mi slob bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
393a1(khri brgyad): la'ang mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i
393a2(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
393a3(khri brgyad): pos gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du khams rnams
393a4(khri brgyad): dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
393a5(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir rnam
393a6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du
393a7(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol
393b1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis stong / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
393b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/ rnam pa thams cad
393b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ gzugs stong pa nyid ni gzugs stong pa nyid la mi slob/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid
393b4(khri brgyad): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid la mi slob pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gang stong pa nyid la mi slob pa de ni gnyis su dbyer med par stong pa nyid la slob pa yin no/ /
393b5(khri brgyad): de ni gnyis su dbyer med par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob pa yin no/ /de bzhin du de ni gnyis su dbyer med par rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin no/ /kau shi
393b6(khri brgyad): ka |gang gnyis su dbyer med par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa de ni gnyis su dbyer med par
393b7(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang slob pa yin no/ /de bzhin du gnyis su dbyer med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
394a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang slob pa yin no/ /gnyis su dbyer med par nang stong pa
394a2(khri brgyad): nyid la'ang slob pa yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la'ang slob pa yin no/ /de ni gnyis su dbyer med par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la slob pa yin
394a3(khri brgyad): no| |gnyis su dbyer med par yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
394a4(khri brgyad): dang / lam rnams la slob pa yin no/ /de ni gnyis su dbyer med par stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
394a5(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa rnams la slob pa yin no/ /de ni gnyis su dbyer med par rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin no/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
394a6(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin no/ /gnyis su dbyer
394a7(khri brgyad): med par sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la slob pa yin no/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi chos
394b1(khri brgyad): grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
394b2(khri brgyad): pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /rten cing
394b3(khri brgyad): 'brel bar 'byung ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /tshul khrims
394b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel
394b5(khri brgyad): bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams
394b6(khri brgyad): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob
394b7(khri brgyad): po| |nang stong pa nyid 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir
395a1(khri brgyad): mi slob bo/ /stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad
395a2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang / gang rnam pa thams cad
395a3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang / med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
395a4(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang / med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su
395a5(khri brgyad): gzung ba dang / med pa'i bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe
395a6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang / med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
395a7(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang / med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung
395b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs la yongs su gzung ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi
395b2(khri brgyad): phyir gzugs la gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su gzung ba med
395b3(khri brgyad): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams
395b4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang yongs su gzung ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams
395b5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba med pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la de ltar
395b6(khri brgyad): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ltar
395b7(khri brgyad): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab
396a1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba med pa'i
396a2(khri brgyad): tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ltar
396a3(khri brgyad): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na chos thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin zhing / med par bya ba'i phyir ma yin par bslabs nas/ rnam
396a4(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
396a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / blang ba dang / dor ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba yang dag
396a6(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
396a7(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / blang ba dang / dor ba
396b1(khri brgyad): dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar rnam par
396b2(khri brgyad): shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /
396b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
396b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / blang ba dang / dor ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
396b5(khri brgyad): dang | rnam par byang ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
396b6(khri brgyad): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / blang ba med
396b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med par slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
397a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni slob pa med pa dang / nges par 'byung ba med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
397a2(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar
397a3(khri brgyad): bya| shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
397a4(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di skad du/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal
397a5(khri brgyad): bar bya'o zhes zer na/ ci de 'phags pa khyod kyi byin gyi rlabs yin nam/ de khyod kyi mthu yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de ni kho bo'i mthu ma yin no/ /de ni kho
397a6(khri brgyad): bo'i byin gyi rlabs ma yin no/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'o na de su'i mthu yin/ de su'i byin gyi rlabs yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ 'di
397a7(khri brgyad): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yin no/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni byin gyi
397b1(khri brgyad): rlabs med pa yin na/ ci'i phyir 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yin no/ /zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
397b2(khri brgyad): kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byin gyi rlabs med pa'i chos nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ byin gyi rlabs med pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang de
397b3(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byin gyi rlabs med pa'i chos nyid dmigs su med/ de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na'ang byin gyi rlabs
397b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos nyid dmigs su med do/ /de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do/ /
397b5(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do/ /gzugs kyi chos
397b6(khri brgyad): nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs kyi chos nyid dmigs su med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
397b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dmigs
398a1(khri brgyad): su med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par shes pa'i chos
398a2(khri brgyad): nyid dmigs su med do/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams
398a3(khri brgyad): cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
398a4(khri brgyad): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang
398a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med
