398a6(khri brgyad): la| de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid
398a7(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin la/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba dang /
398b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan
398b2(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin
398b3(khri brgyad): nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang
398b4(khri brgyad): ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de
398b5(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin la/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
398b6(khri brgyad): kyi bar gyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ rnam
398b7(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ma
399a1(khri brgyad): yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar chos thams cad ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
399a2(khri brgyad): pas na byin gyi rlabs med pa'i tshul gyis de ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de ni de'i byin gyi rlabs yin no/ /kau shi ka/ gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
399a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka/ gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /gzugs las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /tshor
399a4(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
399a5(khri brgyad): shi ka/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin
399a6(khri brgyad): pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med
399a7(khri brgyad): par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams rnams dang / skye mched
399b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid
399b2(khri brgyad): thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
399b3(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /
399b4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni
399b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir
399b6(khri brgyad): ro| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ de bzhin du tshor
399b7(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
400a1(khri brgyad): med/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang
400a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ de bzhin du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
400a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam par shes
400a4(khri brgyad): pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin
400a5(khri brgyad): la| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin
400a6(khri brgyad): la| gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang
400a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi
400b1(khri brgyad): chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
400b2(khri brgyad): kau shi ka/ 'di ltar chos 'di dag thams cad ni yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar chos thams cad yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med pas na/ gzugs kyang
400b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /
400b4(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi chos nyid las
400b5(khri brgyad): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
400b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad
400b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /
401a1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
401a2(khri brgyad): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
401a3(khri brgyad): ni che ba'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/ /
401a4(khri brgyad): btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu med pa'o/ /btsun
401a5(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/ de la bslabs
401a6(khri brgyad): nas rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams
401a7(khri brgyad): dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / rang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
401b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams
401b2(khri brgyad): yongs su smin par byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par
401b3(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
401b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
401b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu med pa'o/ /byang chub sems
401b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/ de la bslabs nas rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i
401b7(khri brgyad): 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa thob bo/ /
402a1(khri brgyad): thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
402a2(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
402a3(khri brgyad): yongs su dag par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs
402a4(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ gzugs che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang che ba yin no/ /
402a5(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ tshor ba dang / 'du
402a6(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang che ba yin no/ /de ci'i
402a7(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du
402b1(khri brgyad): sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang che ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
402b2(khri brgyad): ka| 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta
402b3(khri brgyad): ste| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba yin no/ /kau shi ka/ gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/ byang chub
402b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang tshad med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
402b5(khri brgyad): kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ /nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs tshad
402b6(khri brgyad): med do/ /gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang tshad med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad
402b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang tshad med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di
403a1(khri brgyad): ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi
403a2(khri brgyad): ka| de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ /nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med do/ /rnam pa thams
403a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang tshad med pa yin te/ kau shi ka/ rnam grangs
403a4(khri brgyad): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ gzugs dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
403a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar gzugs dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/'di lta ste/
403a6(khri brgyad): dper na/ nam mkha' ni dpag tu med do/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyang dpag tu med do/ /nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir gzugs dpag tu med do/ /gzugs dpag
403a7(khri brgyad): tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang dpag tu med do/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
403b1(khri brgyad): dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams
403b2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni dpag tu med do/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dpag tu med do/ /
403b3(khri brgyad): nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dpag tu med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
403b4(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang dpag tu med pa yin te/ kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
403b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di dpag tu med pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa
403b6(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
403b7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di
404a1(khri brgyad): ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
404a2(khri brgyad): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar rnam pa
404a3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
404a4(khri brgyad): bar du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha'
404a5(khri brgyad): yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ ji
404a6(khri brgyad): ltar na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi
404a7(khri brgyad): ka| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /kau shi ka
404b1(khri brgyad): gzhan yang chos kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa
404b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ ji ltar na chos kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
404b3(khri brgyad): kau shi ka/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang de bzhin
404b4(khri brgyad): nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun
404b5(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor/ ji ltar na de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/ rab
404b6(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ dmigs pa mtha' yas pa yin no/ /dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha'
404b7(khri brgyad): yas pa yin te/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang
405a1(khri brgyad): mtha' yas pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
405a2(khri brgyad): 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no/ /lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ ci ltar na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
405a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig
405a4(khri brgyad): bla dwags yin snyam mam/ lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni chos kyi tshig bla dwags kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dwags kyang ma yin te/ 'di lta
405a5(khri brgyad): ste| sems can sems can zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa'o/ /de ni dngos po med par ming du btags pa'o/ /de ni dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o//
405a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'ga' yang sems can du yongs su brjod pa yod snyam mam/ lha'i dbang
405a7(khri brgyad): pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ gang la 'ga' yang sems can du yongs su brjod pa med pa de la sems can mtha'
405b1(khri brgyad): yas pa ci zhig yod/ kau shi ka/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/ sems can sems
405b2(khri brgyad): can zhes gsung du brjod na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de la sems can 'ga' yang skyes pa'am/ 'gags pa yod snyam mam/ lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab
405b3(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de ni med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des na sems can mtha' yas pa'i
405b4(khri brgyad): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ mtha' yas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / skyes pa dang / bud med rnams dang / drang srong gi tshogs
405b5(khri brgyad): rnams kyis/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gang bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / bstan
405b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i chos 'di ni a la la legs par bshad pa'o/ /a la la chos 'di ni legs par bshad pa'o/ /a la la chos kyi chos nyid 'di ni legs
406a1(khri brgyad): par bshad pa'o/ /zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes
406a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral ba de dag ni bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed
406a3(khri brgyad): rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyang / theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs
406a4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po dag rnam par dgod pa'ang mdzad do/ /zhes kyang gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /
406a5(khri brgyad): de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ rnam pa thams
406a6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos gang yang dmigs su med kyang theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po dag rnam par dgod
406a7(khri brgyad): pa'ang mdzad do/ /lha'i bu dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar de dag kyang
406b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
406b2(khri brgyad): theg pa dang / theg pa chen po dag rgya cher bstan cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
406b3(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs
406b4(khri brgyad): pa dmigs su med/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
406b5(khri brgyad): las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
406b6(khri brgyad): lam rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
406b7(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su
407a1(khri brgyad): med la/ lha'i bu dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chos de dag la slob cing / rnam pa
407a2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la'ang slob par byed pa'i phyir te/ lha'i bu dag /de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
407a3(khri brgyad): dang mi 'bral bar spyod pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod par bya ba yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /gang gi tshe nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
407a4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi thad na rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i tshong 'dus kyi dbus na 'dug cing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
407a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
407a6(khri brgyad): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang bral bar ma gyur/ dran pa nye
407a7(khri brgyad): bar bzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams dang
407b1(khri brgyad): bral bar ma gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de
407b2(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying
407b3(khri brgyad): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe/ lha'i bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
407b4(khri brgyad): rgyas mar me mdzad des nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin
407b5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
407b6(khri brgyad): 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
407b7(khri brgyad): bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzugs yongs su mi
408a1(khri brgyad): 'dzin/ mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin/ mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de
408a2(khri brgyad): bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su mi 'dzin/ mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
408a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid mthun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /
408a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams 'dus te/ 'dug
408a5(khri brgyad): par thugs su chud nas de dag thams cad dbang por bzhag ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
408a6(khri brgyad): po'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo gang la la dag shes rab kyi
408a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / tshul bzhin
408b1(khri brgyad): du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
408b2(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur zhing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
408b3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyis glags mi rnyed cing / mtshan
408b4(khri brgyad): ma med pa la'ang mtshan ma med pas glags mi rnyed la/ smon pa med pa la'ang smon pa med pas glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
408b5(khri brgyad): gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyis
408b6(khri brgyad): glags mi rnyed cing / mtshan ma med pa la'ang mtshan ma med pas glags mi rnyed la/ smon pa med pa la'ang smon pa med pas glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
408b7(khri brgyad): ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ rigs
409a1(khri brgyad): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /
409a2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shin tu bsgoms shing / de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
409a3(khri brgyad): bsgoms pa phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
409a4(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i yongs su spyad pa dag gis bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/
409a5(khri brgyad): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'thab bral
409a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge rgyas
409a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab
409b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos pa dang / ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad
409b2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la
409b3(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
409b4(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur na/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni khyim stong pa na
409b5(khri brgyad): 'dug kyang rung / bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung / lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha bar 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar
409b6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shin tu bsgoms shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang shin tu bsgoms
409b7(khri brgyad): la| mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen
410a1(khri brgyad): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang /
410a2(khri brgyad): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi
410a3(khri brgyad): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul
410a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag rtag par rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar
410a5(khri brgyad): bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur/
410a6(khri brgyad): dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams dang / lha dbul po rnams dang / mi dbul po rnams dang / yams kyi bro nad rnams dang / bro nad 'go ba
410a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang
410b1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
410b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong
410b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la brten nas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
410b4(khri brgyad): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de
410b5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
410b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/ rgyal rigs
410b7(khri brgyad): shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /khyim bdag gi rigs shing
411a1(khri brgyad): sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs dag 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i
411a2(khri brgyad): bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /'og min gyi ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu dag 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
411a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po la brten nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
411a4(khri brgyad): bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /rang
411a5(khri brgyad): byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'jig rten
411a6(khri brgyad): na mchis lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig
411a7(khri brgyad): rten na bzhugs lags so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'jig rten na bzhugs lags so/ /chos dkon mchog
411b1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog 'jig rten na mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha
411b2(khri brgyad): dang | mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi ba lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po
411b3(khri brgyad): brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
411b4(khri brgyad): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bar du
411b5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten na yod pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de lta bas na lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rgyun mi chad
411b6(khri brgyad): par bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ brjed par bya/ mchod par bya zhing / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
411b7(khri brgyad): chen po la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / brjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems pa de dag ni nga la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / brjed par bya
412a1(khri brgyad): ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems pa yin te/ kau shi ka/ de lta bas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
412a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po la rgyun mi chad par bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ brjed par bya/ mchod par bya zhing / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ stong gsum gyi stong
412a3(khri brgyad): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sha stag gis/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/
412a4(khri brgyad): mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gang bar gyur nas de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
412a5(khri brgyad): yo byad thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ brjed par byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed
412a6(khri brgyad): pa| pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma bral ba gcig cig la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ brjed par byas/ mchod pa byas na/ de nyid snga ma bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed
412a7(khri brgyad): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
412b1(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
412b2(khri brgyad): rgyas rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ de lta bas na lha dang / mi dang / lha
412b3(khri brgyad): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ brjed par bya/ mchod par bya zhing / bsrung ba
412b4(khri brgyad): dang | bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u gnyis pa ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
412b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems
412b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ngam/ bcangs sam/ bklags sam/ kun chub par bgyis sam/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na/ tshe 'di
412b7(khri brgyad): la yon tan 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
413a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis sangs rgyas
413a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsti stang du bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / brjed par bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyid par 'tshal na'ang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis de bzhin
413a3(khri brgyad): du 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar mchis shing chos nyan par bgyid pa dang / de dag gi chos de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
413a4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bskyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa
413a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / tsho rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshe rabs phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'od phun sum tshogs pa
413a6(khri brgyad): dang | mig phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thabs
413a7(khri brgyad): l a mkhas pas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sprul nas gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams
413b1(khri brgyad): su mchi zhing der mchis nas kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
413b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/ nang stong pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/
413b3(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/ bsam gtan rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/ tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
413b4(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul
413b5(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/
413b6(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid cing /
413b7(khri brgyad): thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen pos 'dul la/ chos ston par bgyid pa ni
414a1(khri brgyad): ngo mtshar lags so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du shes rab
414a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad
414a3(khri brgyad): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
414a4(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba
414a5(khri brgyad): dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
414a6(khri brgyad): bar dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung
414a7(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ de
414b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams
414b2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngam/ bcangs sam/ bklags
414b3(khri brgyad): sam/ kun chub par byas sam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gang dag thob par 'gyur ba de dag legs par
414b4(khri brgyad): rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
414b5(khri brgyad): ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu'am/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'am/ gang zag lhag
414b6(khri brgyad): pa'i nga rgyal can gang la la dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'thab par 'dod/ rtsod par 'dod/ dbral
414b7(khri brgyad): par 'dod/ 'gal bar bya bar 'dod kyang de dag gi 'thab par 'dod pa dang / rtsod par 'dod pa dang / dbral bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar bya bar 'dod pa de dag myur ba nyid
415a1(khri brgyad): du med par 'gyur zhing / 'thab par 'dod pa dang / rtsod par 'dod pa dang / dbral bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar bya bar 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongs
415a2(khri brgyad): su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yun ring por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
415a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas
415a4(khri brgyad): gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'bral ba dang / 'gal bar byed par gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad/ byang
415a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang / gang dag gi ched du sems can
415a6(khri brgyad): r nams yun ring po nas 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can du gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang
415a7(khri brgyad): ste| sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang / gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod par
415b1(khri brgyad): gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod
415b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas le lo can du gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag
415b3(khri brgyad): par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang / gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas rgyun du sems rnam par g.yengs
415b4(khri brgyad): par gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
415b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bkod pa dang / gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'chal ba'i shes rab can du gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems
415b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/ sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod cing / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang / kau shi ka/
415b7(khri brgyad): gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams/ 'di lta ste/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang / kun nas dkris pas yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur pa'i sems can de
416a1(khri brgyad): dag gi rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang / kun nas dkris pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thabs la mkhas pas rnam par
416a2(khri brgyad): bsal nas bsam gtan bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ dran pa nye bar
416a3(khri brgyad): bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
416a4(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
416a5(khri brgyad): bkod cing yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
416a6(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod cing yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
416a7(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la bkod cing yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
416b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur la/ tshe phyi ma la'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
416b2(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can rnams smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du bkod cing / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
416b3(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur te/ kau shi ka/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phyi ma la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yon tan dang / phan yon yin no/
416b4(khri brgyad): kau shi ka/ gzhan yang sa phyogs gang du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/
416b5(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i sa phyogs der ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/ gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams sam/ gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams
416b6(khri brgyad): kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brgal ba dang rtsod pa dang / 'gal bar bya ba dang / gzhig par bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par dkrug par mi nus la/ de'i steng du
416b7(khri brgyad): de dag la yon tan dang / phan yon 'di lta bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis
417a1(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung zhing sdug bsngal mthar byed par yang 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsi ma g+hi zhe bya ba dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhig
417a2(khri brgyad): yod de/ der srog chags skye ba po sbrul gdug pa bkres pas zin cing / kha zas tshol ba zhig gis srog chags kyi rigs 'ga' zhig mthong bar gyur nas/ des srog chags kyi
417a3(khri brgyad): rigs de bza' bar 'dod nas srog chags kyi rigs de'i phyi bzhin bsnyegs pa dang / de nas srog chags kyi rigs de 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag nas/ rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba ga
417a4(khri brgyad): la ba der bros pa dang / sprul gdug pa des/ rtsi de'i dri tshor nas phyir ldog par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rtsi de'i sman gyi yon tan gyis sprul gdug pa de'i dug gang
417a5(khri brgyad): yin pa de zil gyis non pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba de ni de ltar mthu dang ldan pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag shes
417a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ kau shi ka/ der 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gal
417a7(khri brgyad): bar byed pa dag 'byung bar gyur kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzi brjid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthus de dag myur du nye bar zhi bar 'gyur zhing med par
417b1(khri brgyad): gyur te/ gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid du med par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sdig
417b2(khri brgyad): pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed cing / rnam par 'phel bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gang dag nye bar zhi bar byed cing / rnam par 'phel bar mi byed ce
417b3(khri brgyad): na| 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa
417b4(khri brgyad): dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
417b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di nye bar zhi bar byed cing rnam par 'phel bar mi byed pa yin no/ /sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang /
417b6(khri brgyad): bag la nyal dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du lta ba

418a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa dang / sred pa la spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs su 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par 'dzin pa

418a5(khri brgyad): nye bar bzhag par 'dzin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

418b1(khri brgyad): mi byed pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin

418b3(khri brgyad): byin rnams dang / tshangs pa rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang /

424a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur snyam du sems so/ /de 'di snyam du bdag sems rnam par g.yengs par gyur na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrubs pa'i phyir/ slob par yang mi 'gyur la/

424a5(khri brgyad): lta ga la 'gyur snyam du sems so/ /de 'di snyam du gal te bdag 'chal pa'i shes rab can du gyur na/ shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa 'di la'ang slob par mi 'gyur
424a6(khri brgyad): zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das nas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par yang mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
424a7(khri brgyad): byed par yang mi 'gyur na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta ga la 'gyur snyam du sems shing / de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/
424b1(khri brgyad): gang bdag gis ser sna'i dbang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dbang gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gnod
424b2(khri brgyad): sems kyi dbang gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / le lo'i dbang gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par g.yengs pa'i dbang gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
424b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba de ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
424b4(khri brgyad): ma rdzogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
424b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems so/ /kau shi ka/ de ltar rigs kyi
424b6(khri brgyad): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /
424b7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba de dag gis ni tshe 'di dang / tshe phyi ma'i yon tan dang / phan yon de lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka'
425a1(khri brgyad): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
425a2(khri brgyad): 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su 'dul ba dang / khengs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan
425a3(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su 'dul ba dang / khengs pa
425a4(khri brgyad): med par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
425a5(khri brgyad): 'das/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub
425a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la sbyin pa gtong bar bgyid pa'i tshe/ thabs la mi mkhas pas de 'di snyam du/ bdag ni
425a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa
425b1(khri brgyad): dang | mgron po dang / slong mo pa rnams la sbyin pa gtong bar bgyid pa'o/ /snyam du sems na/ de sbyin pa des khengs par 'gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten
425b2(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul khrims bsrung ba ni thabs la mi mkhas pas/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
425b3(khri brgyad): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam du sems na/ de tshul khrims des khengs par 'gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
425b4(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o
425b5(khri brgyad): snyam du sems na/ de 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des khengs par 'gyur lags so/ /de 'jig rten pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom pa na/ thabs
425b6(khri brgyad): la mi mkhas pas bdag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
425b7(khri brgyad): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
426a1(khri brgyad): pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
426a2(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /bdag
426a3(khri brgyad): ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro snyam du sems na/ de ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir
426a4(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa des khengs par 'gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i chos
426a5(khri brgyad): rnams la spyod pa ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa lags pas/ de dag la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su 'dul ba dang /
426a6(khri brgyad): khengs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten
426a7(khri brgyad): las 'das pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa ni sbyin pa gtong ba na sbyin pa po'ang mi dmigs/ sbyin par bgyi ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa po'ang mi dmigs lags te/
426b1(khri brgyad): de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang / khengs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /de bzhin
426b2(khri brgyad): du tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na/ shes rab kyang mi dmigs/
426b3(khri brgyad): shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos rnams kyang mi dmigs lags so/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
426b4(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang mi dmigs| stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
426b5(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po sgom pa'ang
426b6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa'ang mi dmigs lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
426b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang / khengs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ yongs su
427a1(khri brgyad): bzung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ rigs
427a2(khri brgyad): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kha ton du byed dam/ ston par byed dam/ 'don tam/ mthun par byed dam/ tshul
427a3(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la byed pa gang la la zhig g.yul ngo'i gdong la song ste/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs sam/ 'jug gam/ 'gro'am/ 'dug gam/ 'greng bar gyur kyang rung / kau
427a4(khri brgyad): shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ba'am/ klog pa'am/ kha ton du byed pa'am/ ston par byed pa'am/ 'don
427a5(khri brgyad): pa'am/ mthun par byed pa'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la mda'am/ dbyig pa'am/ shing ngam/ bong ba'am/ mtshon cha gang gis 'phangs par gyur kyang / de'i lus la
427a6(khri brgyad): mtshon cha de dag gis phog par 'gyur ba ni gnas med cing skabs med la/ pha rol gyi gnod pas srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba de'i gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
427a7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des yun ring po nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / rang gi 'dod chags kyi mda' rnams dang / 'dod chags kyi mtshon rnams
427b1(khri brgyad): kyang nges par bcom/ gzhan dag gi 'dod chags kyi mda' rnams dang / 'dod chags kyi mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/ rang gi zhe sdang gi mda' rnams dang / gti mug gi mda'
427b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / zhe sdang gi mtshon rnams dang / gti mug gi mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/ gzhan dag gi zhe sdang gi mda' rnams dang / gti mug gi mda' rnams dang / zhe sdang gi mtshon
427b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / gti mug gi mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/ rang gi lta bar gyur pa'i mda' rnams dang / lta bar gyur pa'i mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/ gzhan dag gi lta bar gyur
427b4(khri brgyad): pa'i mda' rnams dang / lta bar gyur pa'i mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/ rang gi kun nas ldang ba'i mda' rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba'i mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/ gzhan
427b5(khri brgyad): dag gi kun nas ldang ba'i mda' rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba'i mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/ rang gi bag la nyal gyi mda' rnams dang / bag la nyal gyi mtshon rnams kyang nges
427b6(khri brgyad): par bcom/ gzhan dag gi bag la nyal gyi mda' rnams dang / bag la nyal gyi mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
427b7(khri brgyad): mo de'i lus la mda'am/ mtshon gyis 'phangs kyang phog par mi 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /
428a1(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba de la/ gal
428a2(khri brgyad): te la la zhig gis sman ma yin pas gtor tam/ byad byas sam/ me'i 'obs nye bar bsgrubs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ dug blud dam/ chus gtor bar gyur na'ang de dag thams
428a3(khri brgyad): cad kyis de la mi tshugs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo yin la/ kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
428a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags bla na med pa yin zhing / kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/ kau shi ka/ de la slob
428a5(khri brgyad): pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni bdag la'ang gnod pa bya bar mi sems/ gzhan la yang gnod pa bya bar mi sems/ gnyi ga la'ang gnod pa bya bar mi sems pa'i
428a6(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes pa dag kyang mi dmigs/ gzhan yang mi dmigs/ gnyi ga'ang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
428a7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/ khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong
428b1(khri brgyad): pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
428b2(khri brgyad): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /mi dmigs pas na bdag la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems/ gzhan la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems/
428b3(khri brgyad): gnyi ga la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob cing / sems can thams cad la lta bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das
428b4(khri brgyad): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
428b5(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang shes
428b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
428b7(khri brgyad): gyi khams dag tu byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang
429a1(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te 'chang
429a2(khri brgyad): na| ma bzung / ma bklags/ kha ton du ma byas/ kun chub par ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas kyang rung ste/ der mi dang / mi ma yin pa glags lta ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par
429a3(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
429a4(khri brgyad): lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'og min gyi ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag 'khod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
429a5(khri brgyad): kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'og min gyi ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rtag par rgyun du srung ba
429a6(khri brgyad): dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed cing / gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas 'chang ba der lha'i bu de dag 'ongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsti
429a7(khri brgyad): steng du byed/ bla mar byed/ brjed par byed/ mchod par byed de/ mchod pa byas nas kyang phyir 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
429b1(khri brgyad): pa 'di yi ger bris shing 'chang na'ang / de la tshe 'di'i yon tan dang / phan yon de lta bu de dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas/ 'dzin pa dang /
429b2(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag lta la smos kyang ci dgos/ kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mir gyur pa'am/ dud
429b3(khri brgyad): 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags gang la la zhig / byang chub kyi snying po'am/ byang chub kyi snying po'i nye 'khor tam/ byang chub kyi snying po'i nang du song na/ de la mi'am/ mi ma yin pas
429b4(khri brgyad): rnam par rtse ba'am/ mtho btsam par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang der bzhugs nas bla na
429b5(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ da ltar byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
429b6(khri brgyad): rgyas de dag kyang der bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par
429b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa dang / khon med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / gcugs med pa la bkod de 'jigs pa med pa dang / khon med
430a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / gcugs med pa la bkod nas kyang sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag lha dang / mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag la
430a2(khri brgyad): bkod cing / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa
430a3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis sa phyogs de sems can thams cad kyi mchod
430a4(khri brgyad): rten du gyur par byas pas na me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis
430a5(khri brgyad): mchod par 'os pa dang / ri mo bya bar 'os pa dang / bsti stang du bya bar 'os shing / phyag bya bar 'os pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/
430a6(khri brgyad): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris
430a7(khri brgyad): shing glegs bam du bgyis te/ bcangs la de la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
430b1(khri brgyad): dang | ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod par bgyid pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
430b2(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod rten du stsal te/ stsal nas kyang yongs su 'dzin zhing 'chang la/ de la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang /
430b3(khri brgyad): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ de las gang bsod
430b4(khri brgyad): nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ de'i phyir de khyod
430b5(khri brgyad): nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob cig /kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa
430b6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
430b7(khri brgyad): lam gang la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing / sku 'di lta bu
431a1(khri brgyad): mngon par grub pa yin snyam mam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
431a2(khri brgyad): d e bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
431a3(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no//
431a4(khri brgyad): de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
431a5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing / sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de lta bas na sku 'di lta bu brnyes
431a6(khri brgyad): pas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
431a7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin te/ kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin la/ de bzhin du de
431b1(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lus 'di lta bu brnyes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin pas/ de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhir gyur pa yin no/ /gzhi de la
431b2(khri brgyad): brten nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yod par grags pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yod par grags pa de las sangs rgyas yod par grags
431b3(khri brgyad): pa yin| chos yod par grags pa yin/ dge 'dun yod par grags pa yin no/ /de ltar na sku brnyes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi gzhir gyur pa yin te/ gzhir gyur
431b4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / ri mo bya bar 'os pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'os pa dang / bsti stang bya bar 'os pa dang / bla mar bya bar 'os
431b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / gsol bar 'os pa yin zhing / de yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang sku gdung de dag la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las
431b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te/ glegs bam du byas shing / gus par bcangs la/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma
431b7(khri brgyad): dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / mchod pa sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa
432a1(khri brgyad): dang | brjed par byed pa dang / gsol bar byed pa nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
432a2(khri brgyad): bu mo des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la mchod pa byas par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger
432a3(khri brgyad): bris shing / glegs bam du byas te/ bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjed par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ de nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du
432a4(khri brgyad): bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'ang 'di las nges par byung ba dang / nang stong
432a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang /
432a6(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'di
432a7(khri brgyad): las nges par byung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'ang 'di las nges par
432b1(khri brgyad): byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'ang 'di las nges par byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun
432b2(khri brgyad): sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'di las nges par byung ba dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'ang 'di las nges par byung ba dang / rgyal rigs shing sA la
432b3(khri brgyad): chen po lta bu rnams dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i
432b4(khri brgyad): ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba
432b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang 'di las nges par byung ba
432b6(khri brgyad): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di las nges par
432b7(khri brgyad): byung ba'i phyir ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
433a1(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dzam+bu'i gling gi mi gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang /
433a2(khri brgyad): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ ri mo mi bgyid/ mchod pa mi bgyid/ brjed par
433a3(khri brgyad): mi bgyid/ gsol bar mi bgyid pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyis na/ de ltar mthu che ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyis na/ de ltar
433a4(khri brgyad): phan yon che bar ma 'tshal lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du
433a5(khri brgyad): sems| dzam+bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag sangs
433a6(khri brgyad): rgyas la nem nur med pa dang / gang dag chos dang / dge 'dun la nem nur med pa dang / gang dag sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang / gang dag chos dang dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa
433a7(khri brgyad): ji snyed cig yod snyam mam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dzam+bu'i gling gi mi de
433b1(khri brgyad): dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag chos dang dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag sangs rgyas la nem nur ma mchis pa dang / gang dag
433b2(khri brgyad): chos dang dge 'dun la ner nur ma mchis pa dang / gang dag sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang / gang dag chos dang / dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa ni nyung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
