433b4(khri brgyad): gang dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bsten pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang gang dag sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims bsgom pa la shin tu brtson pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang gang dag byang
433b5(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang gang dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bsgom pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang gang dag rnam par thar pa brgyad
433b6(khri brgyad): bsgom pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang gang dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de bzhin du gang dag so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
433b7(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pa drug bsgom pa'ang ches nyung ngo / /kau shi ka/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams las gang dag gis kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa dang / 'dod chags
434a1(khri brgyad): zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba dang / gong ma'i cha dang
434a2(khri brgyad): mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa thob pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams las gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed
434a3(khri brgyad): cig yod/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
434a4(khri brgyad): dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams las gang dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bsten pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par
434a5(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i bar dag ni shin tu nyung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bas kyang gang dag byang chub kyi
434a6(khri brgyad): phyir spyod pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag 'khor ba na 'khor bas/ sangs rgyas ma mthong / chos ma thos/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma byas/ sbyin pa ma
434a7(khri brgyad): byin| tshul khrims ma bsten/ shes rab ma bsgoms shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
434b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos/ nang stong pa nyid ma thos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag ma thos/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ma thos/ ting nge 'dzin
434b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma thos/ ma bsgoms/
434b3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos/ ma bsgoms pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ rgyu des na dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams las gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan
434b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i bar dag ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang gang dag byang chub kyi phyir
434b5(khri brgyad): spyod pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang gang dag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de
434b6(khri brgyad): bas kyang gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
434b7(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni ches nyung ngo / /kau shi ka/ 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa mi mnga' bas/ shar phyogs na sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
435a1(khri brgyad): gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / de dag las byang chub sems dpa'
435a2(khri brgyad): gcig gam/ gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par zad kyi/ phal cher ni thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa dag mthong ngo //

435b1(khri brgyad): rab 'chal pa rnams kyis bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu mngon par
435b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas yang dang yang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ 'jug

437b3(khri brgyad): bu mo gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang

444a3(khri brgyad): gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o/ /grogs po dag /shes rab kyi pha rol

444a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur/ lha ma yin gyi ris rnams ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur/ lha'i ris rnams ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / grogs po dag /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ngam/
444a7(khri brgyad): bcangs sam/ bklags sam/ kun chub par byas sam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/ chos kyi tshul dang / dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun
444b1(khri brgyad): chad par mi 'gyur zhing / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyud chad par mi 'gyur la/ grogs po dag /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi phyogs
444b2(khri brgyad): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du'ang 'jig rten du 'byung
444b3(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
444b4(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing yod pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya
444b5(khri brgyad): byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kau shi ka/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chongs shig /lhogs shig /
444b6(khri brgyad): kun chub par gyis shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ gang gi tshe/ lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig
444b7(khri brgyad): tu g.yul sprad par bya'o snyam du sems shing shom pa de'i tshe/ kau shi ka/ khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid la soms la kha ton du gyis shig dang / des lha ma yin de dag gi
445a1(khri brgyad): bsam pa de phyir nub par 'gyur zhing / phyis kyang g.yul sprod pa'i sems bskyed par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo gang dag 'chi 'pho
445a2(khri brgyad): ba'i tshe 'ang de dag gi mdun du khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton gyis shig dang / gal te de dag gis bdag nyid ngan song du skye bar mthong na'ang / de dag gis shes rab
445a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pas/ ngan song du skye ba'i sems bskyed pa de nub cing / lha'i gnas de nyid du phyir skye bar 'gyur te/ kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan
445a4(khri brgyad): pa ni de ltar mthu che ba yin no/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/ lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo gang yang rung ba'i rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par
445a5(khri brgyad): gyur pa de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di
445a6(khri brgyad): l tar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag gis kyang shes
445a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas
445b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams dang / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
445b2(khri brgyad): gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/ /de
445b3(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / nyan thos kyi chos thams cad shes
445b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
445b5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags bla na ma mchis pa
445b6(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
445b7(khri brgyad): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar bgyi ba'i ched du yang dag par zhugs pa'i slad du'o
446a1(khri brgyad): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka/
446a2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo yin no/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags bla na med pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ 'di
446a3(khri brgyad): lta ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas gang
446a4(khri brgyad): dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang mngon
446a5(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/ dge
446a6(khri brgyad): ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'jig rten na yod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /
446a7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
446b1(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'jig rten na yod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
446b2(khri brgyad): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid kyang 'jig rten na yod pa dang / mig lnga dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
446b3(khri brgyad): bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
446b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyang 'jig rten na yod pa dang / kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' la brten nas kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
446b5(khri brgyad): dag 'jig rten na yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag 'jig rten na yod pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i
446b6(khri brgyad): dkyil 'khor la brten nas rtsi dang / skar ma'i tshogs thams cad yod pa yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi
446b7(khri brgyad): lam dang / dge ba'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid
447a1(khri brgyad): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi rtsi dag kyang yod pa yin la/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
447a2(khri brgyad): cad kyi rgyu skar dang / skar ma dag kyang yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang yod pa yin te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig
447a3(khri brgyad): rten du mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid sems can rnams la 'jig rten
447a4(khri brgyad): dang | 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams ston par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lha'i theg pa dang / mi'i theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
447a5(khri brgyad): pa dang | theg pa chen po'ang byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug
447a6(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad la sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
447a7(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob par byed pa dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu
447b1(khri brgyad): thob par byed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon sum du mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /
447b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
447b3(khri brgyad): nges par byung ba'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
447b4(khri brgyad): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di
447b5(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
447b6(khri brgyad): bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am
447b7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni dug gis
448a1(khri brgyad): 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ me dang mtshon dang / chus kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur zhing / nad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis kyang 'chi ba'i dus
448a2(khri brgyad): byed par mi 'gyur te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyal po'i pho brang nas 'tshe ba zhig byung bar gyur na'ang de
448a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ de la glags lta ba de dag gis glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
448a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du 'don
448a5(khri brgyad): cing rgyal po'i pho brang der song na/ de la rgyal po'i bu'am/ rgyal po'i blon po sna chen po la gtogs pa dag kyang gsong por smra bar bya'o snyam du sems/ snyan par smra bar bya'o snyam du
448a6(khri brgyad): sems/ dga' bar bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar
448a7(khri brgyad): bzhag cing snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar bzhag pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
448b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am
448b2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe phyi ma'i yon tan 'di dag
448b3(khri brgyad): dang yang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ nam du'ang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam du'ang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
448b4(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
448b5(khri brgyad): dang | so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang
448b6(khri brgyad): ma gtogs par nam du'ang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/ nam du'ang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam
448b7(khri brgyad): du'ang yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam du'ang dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/ 'od ma mkhan gyi khyim rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/ g.yung po'i khyim rnams su skye bar
449a1(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur/ dmangs rigs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur zhing / de de phyin chad kyang rtag par rgyun du skyos bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i
449a2(khri brgyad): lus thob par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar
449a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing / nam du'ang mngon par shes pa nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
449a4(khri brgyad): kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba na'ang sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
449a5(khri brgyad): yang yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de dag thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol
449a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral bar
449a7(khri brgyad): bya ste/ de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe 'di'i yon tan dang / tshe phyi ma'i yon tan de dag dang nam du'ang 'bral
449b1(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas
449b2(khri brgyad): gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu klan ka 'tshol ba'i bsam pa can rab tu mang po brgya zhig klan ka btsal ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
449b3(khri brgyad): 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la klan ka 'tshol ba'i bsam pa can rab tu mang po brgya po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
449b4(khri brgyad): der dong gi/ gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag ci nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mi 'dong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar/
449b5(khri brgyad): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji tsam zhig bzung ba de bdag gis nges par kha ton du bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom
449b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji tsam zhig bzung ba de kha ton du byas so/ /de nas gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu de dag gis rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor
449b7(khri brgyad): ba byas te/ lam gang nas lhags pa'i lam de nyid nas phyir dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu klan ka 'tshol
450a1(khri brgyad): ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag rgyang ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas gang nas lhags pa'i lam de nyid nas phyir dong zhig gu/ snyam mo/ /de
450a2(khri brgyad): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ lha'i dbang po
450a3(khri brgyad): brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsams te/ des na gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag gis rgyang ring po nyid nas/ nga la bskor ba byas te/ lam gang nas lhags
450a4(khri brgyad): pa de nyid nas phyir dong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag gi nang na gcig la'ang dkar po'i cha yod par ngas ma mthong ngo / /gzhan mu stegs can kun
450a5(khri brgyad): tu rgyu 'di dag thams cad ni zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang / klan ka 'tshol ba'i bsam pas 'ong bar sems te/ shA ri'i bu/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la klan ka btsal ba'i
450a6(khri brgyad): bsam pa'am/ zhe 'gras pa'i sems kyis 'ong bar nus pa de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram
450a7(khri brgyad): zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na ngas ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal
450b1(khri brgyad): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min man chad kyi lha rnams dang / nyan thos gang dag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
450b2(khri brgyad): dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung
450b3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dang / phyogs bcu'i bar du phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
450b4(khri brgyad): bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / lha
450b5(khri brgyad): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
450b6(khri brgyad): 'di yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/
450b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag spyan snga na 'khod cing / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'di
451a1(khri brgyad): dag kyang spyan snga na 'khod pa las na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par
451a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur du nges kyi/ mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa
451a3(khri brgyad): mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'gro bar bsams so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bdud sdig can 'di ni dpung gi tshogs
451a4(khri brgyad): yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'gro bar 'dod de/ bdud sdig can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i bkod pa gang yin pa/ dpung
451a5(khri brgyad): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i yang ma yin/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i bkod pa 'di lta bu ni rgyal po gsal rgyal
451a6(khri brgyad): gyi'ang ma yin/ shAkya rnams kyi'ang ma yin/ li tsa bI rnams kyi'ang ma yin gyi/ bdud sdig can ni yun ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la glags lta zhing / skabs 'tshol ba dang /
451a7(khri brgyad): sems can yang dag pa la zhugs pa rnams la/ gtse ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin pas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gang yin pa 'di ni bdud sdig can gyis mngon par sprul
451b1(khri brgyad): yin gyi/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsam par bya'o/ /dran nas kyang kha ton du bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
451b2(khri brgyad): bsams so/ /dran nas kyang kha ton du byas te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji tsam du kha ton byed pa de tsam du/ bdud sdig can lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid
451b3(khri brgyad): nas phyir log go/ de nas 'khor der rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'og min man chad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag gis lha'i me tog rnams mngon par sprul nas/ bar snang
451b4(khri brgyad): la 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su 'dor zhing 'thor bar byed la/ tshig 'di skad ces shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la
451b5(khri brgyad): gnas pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med par mi 'gyur zhing / dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur la/ dge
451b6(khri brgyad): 'dun yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du
451b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa'i khyad par yang grag par 'gyur la/ phyogs gang logs na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
452a1(khri brgyad): pa 'di yi ger bris te/ glegs bam du byas nas 'chang ba'i phyogs de snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur la/ gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs
452a2(khri brgyad): de'ang mgon yod cing mun pa dang bral bar 'gyur bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dzam+bu gling pa'i mi rnams yun ring du spyod par gyur cig/ ces smras so/ /de skad ces gsol
452a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka/ phyogs gang dang / gang gi 'jig rten gyi khams rab
452a4(khri brgyad): 'byams na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod cing glegs bam la bris pa yod pa'i sa phyogs de ni snang bar gyur pa yin te/ sa phyogs de ni mgon yod cing / mun pa mun nag dang
452a5(khri brgyad): bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i me tog rnams mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su gtor te/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
452a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
452a7(khri brgyad): la bgyid pa de la ni bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de
452b1(khri brgyad): la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag ni rigs kyi bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
452b2(khri brgyad): klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ston pa lags so/ /snyam du 'dzin lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
452b3(khri brgyad): 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni
452b4(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtse ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba thams cad la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
452b5(khri brgyad): mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar dag tu bgyid pa'i de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa dang /
452b6(khri brgyad): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba lags la/
452b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang / 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
453a1(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
453a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su dbyer ma mchis shing tha mi dad de/ gcad du ma mchis pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po
453a3(khri brgyad): brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnyis
453a4(khri brgyad): su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de/ gcad du med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gzhan mu stegs can gyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//
453a5(khri brgyad): sarba mang+galaM//
